64b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhes pa'o/ /la ni la la nA ste rtsa g.yon pa'o/ /ra sa nA ni rtsa g.yas pa'o/ /a ba d+hu ti ni rtsa dbus ma'o/ /'gro ba'i lus rtsa dpag tu med pa'i bshad kyang gtso bo ni de gsum mo/ /rlung gnyis po de a ba d+hu tir 'jug nus na cir
64b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhe na/ la ni lam b+hi ste 'bab pa'o/ /gang 'thab na thig le ste ri bong can 'bab pa'o/ /de 'thung zhig pa ni byang chub kyi sems 'thung zhig pa ste/ de 'thung shes na dga' ba dang bde ba rgyud la skye ba'o/ /de yang rtsed mo'i tshul du 'thung zhes
64b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ rtsed mo ni byang chub kyi sems dbab pa dang/ bzlog pa dang/ dgod pa dang/ 'grems pa bya'o/ /la'i don to/ /wa ni wa ra ste mchog go /mchog gang yin chad ste byang chub kyi sems so/ /de rol pas de dga' ba dang bde bas 'thung shes
64b5(rgyud 'grel): na/ lhan cig skyes pa rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o/ /yang na rol pas te thabs shes rab rol pas so/ /wa ni badzra ni ste rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ni stong pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do/ /de 'phro ba ni lus ngag yid gsum dbyer mi
64b6(rgyud 'grel): byed par gnas pa'o/ /wa ni bi ra ste rtogs par dka' ba'i rnal 'byor ma ste rang gi sems so/ /gang gi tshe na lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rnal 'byor ma de bde ba dang tshim par byed nus na de'i tshe de kho na nyid kyi don mngon sum du 'gyur ba'o/ /wa ni
64b7(rgyud 'grel): wa ba ji ste grag pa'o/ /ci grag ce na DA ma ru ste mi shig pa'i sgra grag pa'o/ /mi shigs pa ni thabs dang shes rab gcig tu 'dres te dbyer mi phyed pa'o/ /wa'i don to/ /sha ni sha ya ste rang rig pa'o/ /rang rig pa ni gang gis kyang mi shigs pa'o/ /
65a1(rgyud 'grel): sha ni sha sha ha ra na thig ste/ byang chub kyi sems dkar po'o/ /de 'dzag pa ni thabs shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe na /rnal 'byor ma'i mgon te lhan cig skyes pa rtogs par 'gyur pa'o/ /shi? ni shi ta ka ra lte bsil
65a2(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'o/ /bsil ba ni dper na sos ka'i dus na nyin mtshan gyi nang nas sems can bkres pa dang/ skom pa tsha bas gdungs pa ltar 'khor ba'i sems can gyi sdug bsngal yang de dang 'dra bas/ de zhi bar bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems phab pas
65a3(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems phab pas dga' ba bzhi'i mthar lhan cig skyes pa'i don rtogs pa'i dus na/ nad dang sdug bsngal dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur bas so/ /sha ni sha sha d+ha ra ste ri bad? can no/ /de 'thung ba ci nam
65a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' zhes gsungs te/ nam mkha' de spyi bo las byang chub kyi sems phab ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid bde ba nyams su myong ba'o/ /'jo ba ni 'jo bar byed pa ste gtum mo la sogs pas so/ /yang na nam mkha' stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /'thung pa ni yang dang
65a5(rgyud 'grel): yang du goms par bya ba'o/ /sha'i don to/ /Sha ni sa ha dza ste/ lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /gang gi tshe lhan cig skyes pa'i mchog gis mnyes pa ste /sems tshim par nus na/ Sha ni Sha pa ra a pa ra ste/ rang dang gzhan du 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bag
65a6(rgyud 'grel): chags 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o/ /Sha ni sa ma ste mnyam pa'o/ /a sa ma ste mi mnyam pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ma la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i rnam par rtog pa med cing/ byang chub chen po 'grub pa la the tshom med de/ /Sha ni sa ra ha ste mnga' bsnun no/ /
65a7(rgyud 'grel): mnga' bsnun gyis ci smras she na/ kye 'ong zhes da pos nas lhan cig skyes pa'i don rtogs na/ phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa la the tshom med do zhes smras so/ /Sha'i don to/ /sa ni sa ya ste ma lus pa'o/ /ma lus pa ni dngos po 'di kun zhes pa ste/
65b1(rgyud 'grel): gzung ba dang 'dzin pa thams cad lung rigs man ngag gis dpyad na chos nyid kyi ngo bor mnyam pa'o/ /sa ni su n+ya ste stong pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer mi phyed pa'i don to/ /'khrul pa log par rtogs pas tha dad du mi bya ste/ de ltar
65b2(rgyud 'grel): na 'ching bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/ /sa ni sa ha dza ste lhan cig skye ba'o/ /lhan cig skye ba'i dga' bas ma lus pa thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du byed pa'o/ /sa ni sa ha dza ste lhan cig skyes pa'o/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i mchog 'di nyams su myong ba'i tshe na/
65b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pha gang gis kyang 'ching mi nus pa zhes pa ste/ rnam par rtog pas 'ching ba yin pa las/ de med pas 'ching par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa'i don to/ /ha ni hA sa ste rgod pa'o/ /ci la rgod ces na / gang gi tshe de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs pa'i tshe na / rang gi sems la
65b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang bde ba skye zhing chim? par 'gyur bas so /ha ni ha ri ya ste 'phrog pa'o/ /ci 'phrog ce na/ rnam par rtog pa ste rnam par rtog pa sems las byung zhing sems kyi rang bzhin du sdud do/ /spro bsdu byas nas bkang yang dga' ba med de/ de stod pa nyid kyi rang
65b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin yin pas bde sdug gi zhen pa med pa'o/ /ha ri ni 'phrog pa'o/ /ci 'phrog ce na/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa'o/ /ha ni ha ra ha ra ste dbang phyug chen po'o/ /dbang phyug chen po ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sems so/ /de lta bu'i sems ni kha dog dbyibs dang cha shas dang bral
65b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de rang gi lus la chings shig pa ste/ rang gi sems dang gnyis su med par gyur na yon tan ci yod ce na /ha ni ha le ste bkur ro? dang rtsed mo'o/ /dka' spyod la sogs pa tshogs mi dgos pas na ku re dang rtsed mo tsam gyi sgo nas bla na med pa'i go 'phang legs par
65b7(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur ba ste /phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /ta'i don to/ /k+Sha ni k+Sha le ste yul lo/ /yul ni pad+ma la sogs pa'o/ /sgo dgu las byang sems lhung na chud zos pa ste/ ye shes la sogs pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro/ /k+Sha ni k+Sha k+Sha ste zad pa'o/ /
66a1(rgyud 'grel): gang zad par byed na/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'am rnam par rtog pa thams cad do/ /gang gis zhe na/ k+Sha k+Sha'i sgra byed nus te ye she stod pa nyid des zad par byed nus kyi/ dngos po'i rtog pas ni slar 'phel bar 'gyur gyi zad pa'am skems par mi nus zhes dgongs
66a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /k+Sha ni k+Sha ra sa na ste bdar rtsub mo'o/ /dper na bye ma reg chod la gang bdar yang gcod par byed pa de bzhin du bla ma'i gdams ngag dbud? rtsub mo dang 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la dga' bar gyis shig dang/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad zad par byas nas byang chub chen
66a3(rgyud 'grel): po mngon du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /k+Sha ni k+Sha man na gcer bu ste lhan cig skyes pa'i sems de rtog pa dang/ sdig sgrib dang/ kha dog dang dbyibs dang/ yan lag dang/ cha dang bral bas na gcer bu'o/ /de lta bu'i gcer bu des 'khor ba dang 'khrul pa thams cad bslus pa ste/
66a4(rgyud 'grel): bslus pa ni de rnams kyi skyon gyis ma gos shing phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob pa'o/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bu dpal sa ra has mdzad pa'i ka kha'i do ha'i bshad pa bris pa 'di/ rgya gar lho phyogs yul ko sA lar sku 'khrungs
66a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sh+rI bai ro tsa na badzra'i zhal snga nas rab 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //samA patA/ */ /sku gsungs thugs 'chi med rdo rje'i mdzod kyi glu rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sar ha'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad
66a6(rgyud 'grel): du/ kA ya ko la? ma rid+ha badzra gI? tI/ bod skad du /sku'i mdzod 'chi med rdo rje'i glu /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye'o bdag dang byed par 'dzin pa ral pa can/ /bram ze gcer bu sang ga pa dang ni/ /kho na nyid gzhi 'dod pa'i rgyad pan pa/ /thams cad
66a7(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen zhes zer nas rang ma rig/ des ni bslu bar 'ong ste thar lam ring/ /bye brag pa dang mdo sde sngags pa dang/ /rnal 'byor pa dang dbum la sogs te/ /gcig la gcig skyon 'gel zhing rtsod par byed/ /snang stong mkha' mnyam de nyid mi shes pa/ /lhan cig skyes
66b1(rgyud 'grel): la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs gsal mar mer mar nag bzhin/ /kho na nyid lhan rang snang mar me lta bur gsal/ /rang rig gsal bas 'gro ba kun la khyab/ /dbyer med tshul gyis ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems
66b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis dran pa sna tshogs rgyu/ /ngo bo nyid la snang tshul cir yang 'char/ /mun pa lta bu'i bag la kun gnas kyang/ /de nyid rnyed pa'i rnal 'byor sgron me 'bar/ /snying po'i don ni rtog ge'i yul las 'das/ /mngon du mi gsal dran pa'i mthu yis bsgribs/ /rtog
66b3(rgyud 'grel): med nges shes dran med bde ba'i lam/ /ci phyir bgrod med 'bras bu blo las 'das par snang/ /lhan cig skyes pa thugs kyi gter mdzod nas/ /dag dang ma dag 'khor 'das gzugs su snang/ /snang yang skye ba med pa'i dang du gcig/ de nyid mi g.yo tha snyad rang
66b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin med/ /phyag rgya chen por 'gyur med bde chen dang/ /rgyu la mi bltos 'bras bu blo las 'das/ /phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yin/ /tha snyad lam gyi don la mtshon te sbyor/ /brjod bya brjod byed med pa snying po'i don/ /kun gyi brjod bya dran med rig
66b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyings/ /mos pa'i shes pas rtogs pa tha dad kyang/ /dran med 'di la la brdzun pa yod re skan/ /lam gyi rtsol bas 'bras bu so so yang/ /dran pa 'di la bden pa yod re skan/ /btang snyoms dbang gis re 'jog tha dad kyang/ /skye med 'di la gnyis yod re skan/
66b6(rgyud 'grel): yid la bya dang mi bya snyad 'dogs kyang/ /blo 'das 'di la btsal du yod re skan/ /snang ba'i rkyen gyis dran pa skye 'gyur yang/ /stong pa'i dran med rkyen las 'da' ba med/ /rtog med don la bya bral blta ru med/ /rang la gzhug nas tshol ba e re 'khrul/ /kye'o rdo rje lta
66b7(rgyud 'grel): bur rtogs dka' kho na nyid/ /ma shes rtsol bas sgra phyir 'brang sems kyis/ /bya ba med pa'i don dang phrad par dka' / /bya ba'i rang bzhin mi bya shes gyur na/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs pa nyag gcig yul las 'das/ /sku ni mi 'gyur chos nyid khong stong lags/ /lus
67a1(rgyud 'grel): la mi gnas bya dang byed pa bral/ /lam bslad lam gyis 'bras bu mthong mi 'gyur/ /skye med dang la mi 'byed rgyal ba'i thugs/ /dran med dang la mnyam gzhag bde ba che/ /bde chen mi rtog rgyun tu rang la gnas/ /yid la mi byed snang ba rang sar
67a2(rgyud 'grel): dag/ rkyen ni dran pa ma 'gags ye shes gsal/ /rtsa ba gcig rgyas skyon med pad+ma bzhin/ /'gro ba kun la lhan cig skyes bzhin gnas/ /gzhan yod log mthong stobs kyis bslad mod kyang/ /ji bzhin thog ma'i pad+ma me tog bzhin/ legs mthong stobs kyi phyag rgya che mi g.yo
67a3(rgyud 'grel): gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog mas bslad gyur kyang/ /dus gsum 'gyur med rtsa ba bdag nyid che/ /rnam shes rlung dang 'og sgo sngags la sogs/ /ye nas spyod bral rang gzhan btang bzhag bral/ /'khor bar mi sems mya ngan 'das mi bltos/ /dus gsum srid gsum sku
67a4(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs la 'dus/ /gang la ma 'bad blang dor lta ba med/ /mdza' dbus mi 'byed dbu ma drang po'i lam/ /bcas bcos bral na thugs kyi lam mchog ste/ /bgrod 'jug rims sogs pha rol phyin pa'i lam/ /nye lam bzhag nas ring du 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /lhan
67a5(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes la gnyen po 'gran zla bral/ /kho na nyid la sku bzhi ye shes lnga/ /nyon mongs la sogs tshogs pas 'khor ba'i lam/ /yul du gang skyes mi spyad yul med mthong/ /ngo bo nyid la dga' dang mi dga' med/ /'dzin rtog gnyis bcas ma bcos chos
67a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi sku/ /dbang po rang yan ma zin stong par gnas/ /smar med nyams su myong ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /rang gi rgyud la sbyar te shes par bya/ /dri ma med pa'i don la phyag rgya che/ /rgya mtshon mkha' lta bu'i nyams myong 'byung/ /dbang po yul bral ltung ba'i g.yangs med/ /dran pas
67a7(rgyud 'grel): zin pas khyod nyid chags pa ste/ /rang btad bzhag pas spros pa bslar la ldog 'char nub med na rnam rtog mun pa nub/ /chos nyid ro mnyam bung ba'i me tog mtshungs/ /skyon dang yon tan dbyer med nyid du mtshungs/ /ngo mtshar che ste nyams myong smrar ma btub/ /bden
67b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dbyer med ji ltar chu bzhag bzhin/ /lhan cig skyes dang rnal 'byor de mi 'bral/ /dngos cig bsam pa du mar dran mthong yang/ /dran med gcig yin du ma nyid du yin/ /gang zhig lhan cig skyes dga' bde chen stong/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa blo las 'das par spyod/
67b2(rgyud 'grel): chags lam gnyug ma'i don la sbyor 'dod na/ /nang dang phyi rol ma dmigs bdag gzhan min/ /de nyid don shes rang bzhin grol bar bstan/ /sku gsum chos skud dbye ba med mod kyang/ /nyams su blangs na 'bras bu so sor 'gyur/ /kye'o dbyer med rtogs na lta ngan myur
67b3(rgyud 'grel): du 'joms/ /skye med stong pa dbyer med thug phrad do/ /yin par shes na nags 'dab rten dang bral/ /thug phrad ma shes mtshan ma'i snying rje ni/ /'khor ba'i gnas su ci spyad zag pa'i rgyu/ /stong dang snying rje dbyer med skye ba med/ /gang zhig 'khor dang myang 'das re dogs
67b4(rgyud 'grel): dral/ /lus sems ma rnyed dran med rang gar gzhag/ de nyid blo yis ma rnyed rang byung yin/ /mnyam gzhag rjes thob zhi gnas mtshan nyid de/ don dam ma yin blo yis bsgom du med/ /lus ngag sems kyis gzugs sogs rtsol med gsal/ /sna rtse la sogs
67b5(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs dang nam mkha' dang/ /rtsa la reg? par ma spyad gnyug mar gnas/ /snang ba thams cad bde ba yid ma byed/ /dran pa snang tsam sgyu mar shes tsam gsal/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan cha med gzung bas stong/ /btsal kyang med la bltas kyang mthong ba med/ /sgyu mar snang
67b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dran pa de dran te/ /dran pa med las cor yang mthong ba med/ /dran par snang yang de la 'dzin pa med/ /dran pas reg kyi de reg gi bsam bral bas/ /bsam du med pas bral bas skye ba med/ /dran pa skyes kyang yul la mi spyod par/ /cir yang ma grub stong
67b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang sor gzhag/ ji ltar byas kyang phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad/ yan lag bzhi ldan phyag rgya chen po bzhi/ skye med don rtogs pa yi yan lag dang/ /bden gnyis tha mi dad kyi yan lag dang/ /snang skye med thug phrad nyid du rtogs/ /dran pa?  gzung du med pa'i yan lag
68a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /stong pa rkyen dang dran med blo las 'das/ /dngos po dgag bsgrubs med pa'i yan lag go/ de nyid gzhir ldan 'dod pas dben pa dang/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod par bcas pa dang/ /dga' dang bde dang dben par gnas la
68a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /tha snyad de nyid mtshon pa'i yul du gsungs/ /gzhir ldan rab 'bring tha mar gsungs pa yang/ /dman pa'i don du mkhas pas rab tu bshad/ /phyag rgya chen po gang la gnas mi byed/ /blang dor bral ba'i don du de bzhin bshad/ /gtsang rmer mi
68a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byed gang yang dngos grub dpag tu med/ /lhan cig skyes dang yul la gtum mo spar la sogs/ /dam tshig bdag gi kho na nyid dang rnal 'byor bsgoms/ /dngos po thams cad mnyam nyid chen po la/ /rtog pa spang zhing mi rtog bsgom pa ci zhig 'gyur/ /bla ma
68a4(rgyud 'grel): la gus gsang ba'i 'dul sdom de ru rdzogs/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur so so'i mtshan nyid dang/ /bum pa gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang/ /ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba la sogs kun/ /thun mong mthu skyes phyag rgya che la reg mi nus/ /kye'o phyag rgya che la 'bras
68a5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i bdag nyid sku gsung thugs ldan pas/ /'bras bu de yang snying po'i don la 'thad kyi drang dang nges pa'i don la min/ /lam dang 'bras bu'i snying po thams cad bcud 'dus dang/ /theg chen bla na med pa'i dngos dang theg pa dag gi khyad par dang/ /kun gyi
68a6(rgyud 'grel): snying por gyur nas gsang ba bla na med/ /phyag rgya chen po nges pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /dran dang dran med gnyis su med pas skye med de/ /blo las 'das shing nam mkha' lta bur cir mi gnas/ /las kyi phyag rgya dpe dang chos kyi phyag rgya'i lam/ /phyag rgya chen po
68a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dam tshig phyag rgya gzhan don te/ /chos kyi phyag rgya man chad bsten pas mthar mi 'gro/ /re dogs mthar lhung 'du 'dzi bya ba'i skyon du 'gyur/ /kho na nyid la gnyen po dbyer med rang sor bzhag/ /rnam rtog ji snyed shar yang lhug pa nyid la shar//
68b1(rgyud 'grel): dran pa rang sar grol nas dran mad lhung pa nyid/ /gang yang longs spyod snang bar shes shing dran med gsos/ /rang bzhin nyams rnyed skye med dag tu ldan/ /kun la khyab cing 'bab chu lta bur gnas/ /mar me ltar gsal rang rig byang chub sems/ /'gog pa med
68b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin dran rig rang gis stong/ /yang dag kho na nyid ni gang zhe na/ gzhan yod na kun gyis mthong bar rigs/ /rang la yod kyang lkog gyur bla ma'i zhal/ /sems nyid sangs rgyas kho na nyid yin te/ /dran pas bslad cing de nyid gzhan du brtags/ /sangs
68b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas yin phyir yon tan gang zhe na/ yon tan ras dang dkar po lta bu ste/ /kho na nyid kyi yon tan phyag rgya che/ /ngo bo yon tan so so tha dad min/ /phyag rgya che dang bzhi pa la sogs 'og ma kun/ /yon tan so so ma yin tha dad min/ /dran med yon tan rgya
68b4(rgyud 'grel): mtsho ma 'gul bar/ /dran par mi 'gyur chu yi rba rlabs med/ /skye med yon tan mi 'gyur brag dang 'dra/ /brag ca grag tsam rjes su 'brang ba med/ /blo las 'das shing yul du ma gyur pa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i yon tan nam mkha' 'dras dran pa sems can sems
68b5(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba yin/ /de phyir stong pa gzhan nas btsal mi dgos/ /bzhi ru snang yang gcig gi yon tan ni/ /phyag rgya bzhi ru snang ba ci phyir mtshon/ /gong gi khyad par dag gi bzhi ru byung/ /phyag rgyu chen po gsum du rtogs mi byed/ /gang la mi gnas phyag rgya
68b6(rgyud 'grel): chen por spyod/ /me tog sbrang rtsi sbrang mas 'thung dang 'dra/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thabs yin te/ /ro dang phrad nas ro la zhen pa med/ /de ltar kun gyis shes par 'gyur ma yin/ /snying po'i don gyi 'gro drug khyab med kyang/ /'gro ba dran pas bcings
68b7(rgyud 'grel): te pra tra'i srin/ /sems las dran pa byung phyir 'khrul pa'i rgyu/ /yid la mi byed shes na sangs rgyas nyid/ /'khrul pa de la thabs dang shes rab med/ /kye'o dbyer med shes na thabs mchog de kho na/ /sangs rgyas sems can chos rnams thams cad kun/ /rang gi 
69a1(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid dag dang lhan cig skyes/ /yid la mi byed yid la skyes tsam na/ /dran pa'i snang ba nub ste bden brdzun med/ /de phyir de nyid kho na'i yul ma yin/ /dper na mig gi yul du sgra mi snang/ /rnam par mi rtog dran pa'i yul ma yin//
69a2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i rkyen gyis dran pa bsal tsam na/ /dran pa'i snang ba nub nas mthong ba med/ /ye shes 'on long lkugs par mi 'gyur ram/ /ma dran pa la 'on long lkugs rgyu med/ /bems po la sogs tha snyad kun dang bral/ /snang ba nub ces bya ba'i tha snyad ni//
69a3(rgyud 'grel): dran pa phyags te dran med gsos su spungs/ /de nyid skye med blo las 'das pa ni/ /dran pa me dang skye med ye shes mes/ /gzung 'dzin bsregs sbyangs blo las 'das phul bas/ /smon lam dbang gis skye ba phyis mi brgyud/ /de phyir phyag rgya chen
69a4(rgyud 'grel): po sngon song la/ /su la mi brten gang la dag ma lus/ /bcu la zhugs dang tshogs dang zas 'gyed byed/ /rig byed grong khyer krog pa dag dang mtshungs/ /phyag rgya chen po dang las gzhan med phyir/ /mchod rdzas dran pa 'gron dang mchod gnas
69a5(rgyud 'grel): rang shes pas/ /mchod pa rang gi dran pa med la mchod/ /blo las 'das kyi skye med tshogs la rol/ /phyag rgya chen po gzhan la mi bltos phyir/ /bsgom bya rang la bsgom byed rang gi sems/ /blo 'das rang la dmigs pa nyid dang bral/ /de nyid 'bras bu
69a6(rgyud 'grel): yin phyir gzhan la rag ma lus/ /bsgom bsgrub sngags bzlas rang gi sems yin te/ /yi dam lha yang rang gi sems yin pas/ /de phyir mkha' 'gro lung ston la sogs rang gi sems/ /sems ni dran pa cir yang snang bar ston/ /ma dran pa ste
69a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dmigs su med/ /phyag rgya chen po rang las gzhan med phyir/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la sogs te/ /pha ma dkon mchog rang bzhin byang chub sems/ /mchod dang bsnyen bkur byas na dran pa'i rgyu/ /tha dad med na skye med rang sar grol/ /blo las
69b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das la bya dang mi bya med/ /sangs rgyas sems can mtshon tshul so so yang/ /lhan cig dag tu skyes te rig ma rig/ gang zhig snang yang dran par mi rtogs na/ /sems can nyid ni 'bras bu skye ba med/ /gang zhig mi snang dran par rtog ce na/ /sems can nyid
69b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'bras bu skye ba med/ /gang zhig mi snang rten pa rtog ge pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /gang zhig dran med yid la 'chad byed na/ /sems can snang yang sangs rgyas dag dang mtshungs/ gang zhig dran pa sangs rgyas rtogs 'dod na//
69b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas snang yang sems can khyad par med/ /des na snang brtags gnyis la brtag du med de por/ /bor yang rang las gzhan med 'gro rgyun 'chad/ /rang las yod snyam rtog ge dran pas bslad/ /snang ba bsal la mi rtog mi zhen sems/ /de phyir yod
69b4(rgyud 'grel): dang med pa'i rtog pa gnyis bral te/ /gnyug mar gnas na gang ltar byas kyang bde/ /dran ba 'od gsal 'dzin pa'i snying po can/ /zhen pa gnyis dang bral te rang bzhin gnyug mar bzhag/ des na phyag rgya chen po zung du rab 'jug ste/ /dran pa dran med skye med zung du 'jug/
69b5(rgyud 'grel): dran med mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin dang/ rten 'brel glo bur skye ba'i dran pa gnyis/ /skye ba med pa'i dang du ro gcig phyir/ /des na skye dang skye ba blo las 'das/ /'od gsal stong dang zung du 'jug la sogs/ /ma bcos ma byas skye med rang sar grol/ /de la sku gsum chos
69b6(rgyud 'grel): sku longs sku dang/ /sna tshogs snang ba sprul sku zhes su bshad/ /gnyug ma ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin te/ /snying rje stong dang dbyer med skye ba med/ /las kyi phyag rgya la brten nyams myong ni/ /bcos ma yin phyir rkyen gyis stobs las byung/ /gzhan la bltos phyir kho na nyid ma
69b7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bcos ma ma yin kyang/ /nyams su myong bas ma grub nyid mi mthong/ /phyag rgya chen po nyams su myong 'gyur na/ /dran pa sna tshogs skye ba med par shes/ /dngos por snang ba ngo bo nyid kyis stong/ /sems can skye ba med dang dbyer med don/ /snying
70a1(rgyud 'grel): rje thabs kyis mtshon bya dpe yis bstan/ /sna tshogs snang yang blo 'das yul mi g.yo/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor de nyid rtag tu blta/ /spyod lam thams cad phyag rgya che la gnas/ /dngos po'i gnas lugs skye med dang la gzhag/ rlung gi rkyen bcas
70a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho dangs pa la/ /rba rlab chu la gnyer ma glo bur skye/ /de nyid rgya mtsho dag dang dbyer med do/ /dran pas rkyen byas rtog pa glo bur skye/ /de nyid sngar gyi dran pa med dang ni/ /skye med blo 'das dag gi ngo mtshar mtshungs/ /de ltar phyag rgya che la skyes pa sngar med bzhin/ /phyis
70a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang rkyen gyis stobs kyis skyes srid kyang/ /skye ba med pa de dang dbyer med do/ /gzugs can ma yin kun la khyab pa dang/ /mi 'gyur ba dang dus rnams thams cad pa'o/ /nam mkha' lta bur skye 'gag med pa dang/ /thag pa de nyid sprul gyis stong pa dang/ /chos sku longs
70a4(rgyud 'grel): sku sprul sku dbyer med de/ ngo bo nyid ni blo yi yul las 'das/ /phyag rgya chen po skad cig mngon sangs rgyas/ /de nyid sems can don du gzugs skur byung/ /rgyu 'thun 'bras bu rnam smin 'bras bu dang/ /dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu gzhan don byed/ /go 'phang khyad par brjod
70a5(rgyud 'grel): las 'das par bshad/ /kye'o ma bcos phyag rgya bde ba che/ /dran med klong du rang shar ba/ /skye med nam mkha' lta bur khyab/ /blo las 'das pa'i dang la gnas/ /snang ba spros bral bde ba che/ /dran med cir yang mi rtog pa/ /dran pa sna tshogs sems su gsal/ /brtags
70a6(rgyud 'grel): shing btsal na dmigs su med/ /skye ba med pa 'dzin dang bral/ /'dzin dang bral phyir rgyu ba med/ /dran pa sgyu ma rang rig tsam/ /sgyu med thar med dran med gsal/ /skye med don dam kun gsal bas/ /thams cad blo las 'das par snang/ /khams gsum
70a7(rgyud 'grel): blo 'das ye shes nyid/ /lhan cig skyes pa de kho na/ /dran pa'i rtsa ba ma lus thag bcad de/ /dran med skye ba med pa'i dbyings la dgod/ /de nyid ma bcos blo yi yul las 'das/ /dran rig sems kyi rang 'bar nyid du gsal/ /gsal bas rnam rtog 'khor
70b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i grogs su 'gyur/ /thar pa'i lam ni kho na nyid shes nas/ /rang 'byung ji bzhin bsam bral dang la gnas/ /dran pa rang gsal dngos por grub pa med/ /bcos med dgongs pa skye med bde chen 'di/ /mngon sum snang bas ngos gzung gang yang med/ /dran
70b2(rgyud 'grel): med yul du cir yang mthong ba med/ /rten dang bral bas slob pa gang yang med/ /gang la yid la byar med phyag rgya che/ /mtshan ma'i dran rig sna tshogs ji snyed pa/ /de nyid phyag rgya che la dbye ba med/ /rtog dang mi rtog gnyi gso so min/ /rtag chad mdza' la mi
70b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas skyon dang bral/ /rang gi de nyid rtogs na gzhan las min/ /rten 'brel mya ngan 'das lam bstan pa dang/ /skye ba med par rtogs na phyag rgya che/ /de nyid mi shes las kyi phyag rgya dang/ /dam tshig chos la sogs pa rtsol 'dod pa/ /de nyid mtshon pa'i dpe tsam
70b4(rgyud 'grel): don mi nus/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyag rgya che brten pa/ /shes pa rang lugs so ma nyid la 'byung/ /'dod med rang gzhag gnyug ma'i ngo bor gnas/ /tha mal snang ba'i shes pa 'di nyid blo/ /yin min dran pa'i sems la rang gzhag yin/ /yid ches rin
70b5(rgyud 'grel): chen gdams ngag yid bzhin gter/ /yid la bya dang mi bya med par rang bzhin bzhag/ rang rig phyag rgya chen po nyid yin pas/ /phyag rgya chen po nyid la nyid kyis bstan dran pa sna tshogs don la sems ma 'jug/ phyi nang bral bas rtsod med phyag rgya dang/ phyag rgya chen po srog
70b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'dod pa med/ /'dod pa byung na de yang dran pa'i rgyu/ /rang sems phyag rgya chen po la/ /dran pa ma dran tha dad skye ba med/ /'khrul dang ma 'khrul blo yi yul las 'das/ /dran pa'i zhen rtog brtas pas 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /'od gsal phyag rgya chen po gnyug ma'i ngo
70b7(rgyud 'grel): bo nyid/ /gang yang 'gyur med byang chub sems su gcig/ kho na nyid la gzung 'dzin ngo bo bral/ /snang ba don ldan ye shes nyid du mthong/ /bsam pas brtags pas dran pa'i tshogs su rgyus/ /snang ba skye ba log pa'i stobs kyis mthong/ /dran pa dran med dang
71a1(rgyud 'grel): la shes 'jug pa/ /lus ngag yid kyis 'bad kyang dran rgyu med/ /gnyis su med na 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med/ /dran pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin 'di/ /sna rtse'i phyag rgya dag la ye nas med/ /des na phyag rgya chen po bsam med blang
71a2(rgyud 'grel): dor gzhag/ kye'o phyi nang zab dang mi zab bskyed rims dang/ /yongs grub ngo bo nyid dang dbugs dbyung dang/ /rgyas gdab las dang chos kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste/ /phyag rgya chen po ngo bo nyid kyi rim/ /dam tshig phyag rgya yongS
71a3(rgyud 'grel): su grub pa'i rim/ /kun brtags yongs su grub pa'i rgya/ /las kyi phyag rgya dbang gi ngo bo dang/ /dga' ba bzhi ldan thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /chos kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs snang ba ste/ /dga' ba bzhi'i lhan cig skyes pa nyid/ /phyag rgya chen po skye ba med pa la/
71a4(rgyud 'grel): gzung 'dzin dran bral ngo bo blo las 'das/ /dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu mngon sangs rgyas/ /dam tshig phyag rgya mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor te/ /'bras bu lha yi dkyil 'khor 'gro ba'i don/ /rje bcun pha ma thabs dang shes rab mtshon/ /dga' ba bzhi ldan dam
71a5(rgyud 'grel): tshig phyag rgya che/ /de ltar thabs kyi sbyor ba kun 'dul yang/ /zab mo chos kyi phyag rgyas gtan la dbab/ /sems nyid phyag rgya chen po rang la bstan/ /dga' bas gzung ba'i dran pa gad ba dang/ /mchog dags 'dzin pa'i dran phyed btang ba dang/ /lhan cig
71a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes dags dran pa dkar bas dang/ /dga' bral snang ba skye med dran pa gsal/ /de bzhin zab mo'i chos kyi phyag rgya bstan/ /dga' bzhi ye shes gang du skyes pa dang/ /tha mi dad cing yongs su thim par gnas/ /rtogs pa'i nyams myong dag la gnas pa dang/ /yid la
71a7(rgyud 'grel): ma dran rtog pa tha mi dang/ /dpe dang lam ste tha snyad 'dul bar bstan/ /sems nyid phyag rgya chen po 'chad ba ni/ /skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang 'char/ /blo las 'das pas ma skyes ngo bor bstan/ /ma skyes pa dang skyes pa'i dngos po gnyis/ /tha dad med de
71b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyug ma'i ngo bor bzhag/ dran pa sna tshogs gang la rgyu ba 'di/ /dran med 'jug pas rtog pa mi 'gag pa/ /shes paS rang lugs gzhag na gnas par 'gyur/ /snang dang stong dang gnyis 'dzin skye ba'i rgyu/ /tha mi dad par gon bde ba che/ /nyams myong shar pas mi mthun 'dzin
71b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bral/ /dran pa med de 'di 'dra'i yul med pa/ /dran pa med dang snang stong tha mi dad/ /ma skyes mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /mnyam gzhag rjes thob med de rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la/ /snang dang skye ba dran pa gang skyes kyang/ /de nyid stong pa dran pa med gnas pas/ /dran
71b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yid la byir med snang stong dbyer mi phyed/ /de nyid thug phrad skye med nyams myong la/ /snang ba'i ngo bo stong pa bde chen shar/ /chab rom chur bzhu btung du btub bzhin do/ /gang snang skye med bde ba chen por tshor/ /btang snyoms dran pa med de rtog pa ma bkag kyang//
71b4(rgyud 'grel): blo las 'das pas rmongs pa bsgoms dang bral/ /'di la gnas na bde chen nyams 'byung ste/ /dang por snang ba stong par myong ba'i nyams myong 'byung/ /chab rom snang yang chu ngo shes bzhin du/ /dran pa'i snang ba ma 'gags par/ /stong pa bde dang tha mi dad par 'byung//
71b5(rgyud 'grel): chab rol? chu ? bzhu ba'i gnas skabs bzhin/ /dran pa dran med skye ba med la thim/ /thams cad tha mi dad pas bde ba chen por gcig/ /de nyid chab rom chu ru bzhu ba bzhin/ /thams cad rang bzhin thug phrad shes gyur na/ bcing dkrol dag gis ma gzung dran pa'i rjes ma 'brang
71b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dud bus bcings pa bzhin du sems mi bsgri/ /'jur bu klod na grol zhing sems nyid gang dgar btang/ /gzings la 'phur ba'i bya rog bzhin/ /de nyid shes na snang ba longs spyod yin/ /lcags kyus btab pas glang chen thul ba bzhin/ /bya bral bzhag pas glang chen lom?
71b7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin/ /dran pa dran med ngo shes gnod pa med/ /snang dang stong ba shes pas rtog dang bral/ /skye bar gnas pas dbyer med dran mi rgyu/ /de nyid khyab bdag dgra rkun ngo shes bzhin/ /snang ba stong par thim pas lan tshwa chur thim bzhin/ /dran pa dran med thim pa
72a1(rgyud 'grel): de kho na/ skye ba rnam pa gnyis la skye rgyun med/ /thug phrad skye med ye shes shar bas na/ /dran pa blo yi yul med phyogs med ye shes 'char/ /spra ba me mched rab 'bar me bzhin du/ /nyams myong smrar ma btub pa gzhon nu'i bde ba
72a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /sna tshogs snang yang dran par mi 'gyur ba/ /dal ba'i bab chus rba rlabs mi 'gyur bas/ /rang gi ngo bo gsal bas mar me dran/ /de ltar phyag rgya chen po mkha' la gnas bzhin du/ /rtogs pa'i spyod pas blang dor mi byed pa/ /srog chags pa ta ri bzhin
72a3(rgyud 'grel): zhen chags med/ /blo 'das 'bras bu 'dod la med grub pa/ /sman mchog nang na pre ta ji bzhin nyid/ /kye'o de ltar mkhas pa thabs zin dag gis ni/ /dran pa med la skye med rgyas btab ste/ /dran pa med pas dran med rgya yis btab/ /snang bas stong pa la
72a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gdab/ /stongs pas snang ba la rgyas gdab/ /dran dang snang ba bde ba'i ror shar na/ /stong dang dran med rgya yi thebs pa yin/ /snang dang dran pa stong pa'i rgya dang ni/ /dran med gnas pa dag gi rgyas gdab na/ /snang dang dran pa bde ba'i ror shar nas/ /mtshan
72a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i bsgom pas ma dpyad mtshan ma'i blo las 'das/ /dran dang snang ba dag la skye med rgyas gdab pa/ /skye med dag la blo 'das rgya yis thebs/ /dran pas dran med bde ba'i rgyas thebs pas/ /stong par ma song chad pa'i mthar ma lhung/ /gnas pa skye ba dag
72a6(rgyud 'grel): la rgyas thebs pas/ /dngos por ma song rtag pa'i mthar ma lhung/ /thams cad blo las 'das shing skye ba med/ /thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgyu dang ldan/ /de ltar shes pas btang snyoms mthar ma ltung/ /dran pa 'khor ba'i dngos po dang/ /dran pa bde pa'i rtog pa
72a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /btang snyoms lam du khyer bar byed pa dang/ /rigs pas gzhigs nas stong pa btang snyoms dang/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig btang snyoms pas/ /bden pa gnyis bral gnyis med btang snyoms bsgoms/ /gang du ma dran bsam gtan btang
72b1(rgyud 'grel): snyoms mchog/ lung du ma bstan btang snyoms sgom ma yin/ /shes pa sor gzhag dran med nyams 'tsho ba/ /dran pa'i mtshan ma dran med lam du khyer/ /bde ba lam khyer blo 'das ma dmigs pa/ /gnyis la mi rtog bde ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /kye'o nyams dang bral
72b2(rgyud 'grel): bas gzung 'dzin gnyis las grol/ /de nyid phyag rgya chen po'i don mthong 'gyur/ /'bras bu mthar thug rin chen gter chen la/ /phyag rgya che la gnas 'dod gang/ /dri med 'bras bu rtogs par shog /sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa/ /sku'i mdzod 'chi med rdo
72b3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i glu zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ bA ka ko Sha sh+rI raM pa ra badzra tse ta/ bod skad du/ gsung gi mdzod 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'i glu/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye'o ting 'dzin rtse gcig ro snyoms khyad par can/ /dngos
72b4(rgyud 'grel): dang dngos med yig rtogs 'khor rgyu btang bar bya/ /snang dang stong pa zung du 'jug pa dbyer med de kho na/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin thams cad 'byung zhing thim par gnas/ /bdag dang gzhan don gnyis med dran med gsal ba'i dang/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rnam grangs
72b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag med brjod las 'das/ /dngos dang dngos med yongs su btang na 'khor 'das med/ /rdzing bu bla gab med na phyogs bzhir 'khor lo yangs/ /byis pa ma shes rten 'brel 'khor bar 'jug pa'i rgyu/ /shes rab zhan pas dngos 'dzin bdag gzhan don mi
72b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /mar me spar yang dmun long dag la snang mi srid/ /bdag gzhan don 'dod dngos 'dzin rang gis rang la 'dzin// rtog pa yin phyir btang mi btang la brtag par bya/ /snang med rang rig rtog pa'i tha snyad kun dang bral/ /thabs dang bral phyir dag don mi 'grub mchan
72b7(rgyud 'grel): mar 'gyur/ /dbyer med don la gnas pas de nyid ston pa dang/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/ /bla ma la bstan lung 'brel gdams ngag rjes su ston/ /lung dang rigs pas rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs 'dod pa/ /bla ma la bsten gdams ngag ldan pa 
73a1(rgyud 'grel): dag las rnyed/ /bsnyen bkur byas na bde ba mchog thob 'gyur/ /dri ma dang bral bya phyir bla ma'i zhabs la 'dud/ /mchod na byin brlabs chen po 'byung bar rgyal bas bshad/ /kye 'o grong khyer tsam o sham ku su na mkhar song
73a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /thar pas 'bad na rgyal ba'i sa la gdon mi za/ /brjod bya rjod byed dbang bskur byin brlabs skye zhing 'phel ba'i gnas/ /sngon du slob mas bya dang slob dpon bya ba'i rim pa dang/ /rjes su slob mas bya dang zab mo dbang bskur ba/ /phyag rgya mchod
73a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bstod pa dag gis gsol ba gdab/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis gsol gdab rig pa rtsal dbang dang/ /phyag rgyal brten gsang ba'i dbang bskur sdom sbyin dang/ /gnang ba sbyin dang rjes su spro ba brtan pa ste/ /slob mas rdzas dbul zab mo'i dbang bskur dam
73a4(rgyud 'grel): bca' dang/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs bstan pa ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyi rim pa bstan pa dang/ /nyams myong bsgom par bya ba'i brjod bya la sogs kun/ /gang la mi gnas bya sar ko ne gang la rten mi 'cha'/ /'dod pa med pa'i bde ba dag la mi gnas te//
73a5(rgyud 'grel): ya zung med phyir gang la rten dang rten byed bral/ /gnyis med rnal 'byor rang la 'char ba'i nyams myong bde/ /bdag tu rtog pa'i dngos po btang na nam mkha' i mdza' ltar yangs/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer dag tu 'jug 'dod na/ /tshogs drug thug phrad char
73a6(rgyud 'grel): ba rgyun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /snang ba stong pa skye med thug phrad rkyen la rag ma lus/ /gnyis med goms pas lam myur zung du 'jug mi ldog/ sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin yin par shes na rtsol ba med/ /gong gi ro snyoms spyod pa dag la brten nas 'bras bu thob/ /spyod
73a7(rgyud 'grel): pa byas na 'gro ba 'khor ba dag las thar par the tshom med/ /bdud dang mi mthun phyos las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor mi bya btang snyoms rnal 'byor min/ /mkhas pa'i ye shes myur du thob cing sgrib pa zad/ /mtshan ma'i spyod pas drang
73b1(rgyud 'grel): don mkhas kyang rmongs rnams 'ching/ /ro snyoms phyag rgya chen po la brten nam mkhar 'gro/ gnyis med spyod lam rgyun du brten na tshe 'dir thob/ /snang ba sgyu ma'i yul la mi gnas rtog yul med/ /'jig rten chos brgyad 'ching bar mi nub btul zhugs mchog/ snying rje thabs zin
73b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa chags med mkha' ltar yangs/ /phyag rgya chen po yan lag bzhi ldan thabs kyi mchog/ bzhir ldan phyag rgya gcig gi cho 'phrul gcig gi dang/ /gnyis med dang la phyag rgya chen po glod de bzhag/ byang chub sems ldan btang gzhag med na glang chen 'dra/ /rtog pa'i ngo
73b3(rgyud 'grel): bos sab mo rta ltar snang 'dod na/ /rtog med ? de rnal 'byor bya/ /sku bzhi mthar phyin 'bras bu bde ba chen po'i dang/ /skye bar snang ba lam gyis lus rnams ni/ /sku gsum mthur ldan rtog pa rnam par bral/ /shes dang shes bya rang rgyud dag pa'i yul/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin
73b4(rgyud 'grel): skye ba'i rkyen snang yang/ /ma skyes pa'i yul las 'da' mi myong/ /dngos po dngos med btang snyoms la sogs kun/ /'byed pa med de dran med skye med yul/ /phyag rgya che la rtag tu mtshan nyid bral/ /phung po dag pas gsang pa'i yul las 'das/ /dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid phyag rgya'i
73b5(rgyud 'grel): yul/ /rang rgyud ma yin shes rab thabs dang bral/ /sna rtse la sogs de nyid ma zin na/ /de nyid dag la sbyor yang don dam min/ /rang rig rdo rje gnas te sems dpa' i rnal 'byor ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo 'di 'drar med/ /rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs bral ba'i ngo bor mtshungs/ /grag
73b6(rgyud 'grel): tsam nyid na gang du 'ang sleb pa med/ /dam tshig bsgrub dang 'bras bu rnam sbyar ba/ /mtshon bya mtshon byed tshig gi tha snyad lam/ /dam tshig nyams na thabs sogs nyams gang na/ /blo las 'das pa'i yul du slob pa med/ /brtul zhugs spyod pas phyi dang nang 'gyur ba//
73b7(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid dang ldan na khyad par can/ /de nyid mi ldan du da 'gro dag dang mtshungs/ /de nyid sbas pas ye shes skyes bsgomS pa/ /thabs bral dam tshig 'gal yang nyes pa med/ /'di dang pha rol grangs la mi bstod par/ /da lta nyid du mngon gyur phyag rgya che/ /de nyid spangs
74a1(rgyud 'grel): na nam yang phrad mi 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po skad cig thos pas kyang/ /smod dang ldan mi ldan la mi ltos par/ bstan pa tsam gyis rtse gcig 'di yis thob/ /gang zhig dran pa dag la ma yengs pa'i/ /lhan cig skyes don bsgom dang ldan pas
74a2(rgyud 'grel): thob/ de nyid rang yin gzhan gyi chos mi tshol/ /dur khrod wa sogs tshol phyir 'brangs te 'phung/ /kye'o bram ze rigs dan khyim 'dres 'tshol slong bzhin/ /bzang ngan 'dres pa gcig la gcig gnod de/ /mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor mtshan mar reg/ mtshan ma med
74a3(rgyud 'grel): la bltas pa nam yang med/ /mtshan ma dus dang grangs la bltos par 'gyur/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa khyad par bsam mi bya/ /gnyis med 'dus pa rnal 'byor mchog ldan gang/ /gang yang ma shes dran med yengs pa'i yul/ /bran? pa'i gyur sbangs de
74a4(rgyud 'grel): la goms par bya/ /thun mong ma yin gsang sngags khyad par can/ /thog ma nyid nas bden pa'i ngo bor gnas/ /dngos grub bsdus pas lhan cig skyes la thug/ de nyid khyad par rang rig yul las 'das/ /de nyid bde ba'i gnas dang dngos po stong/ /chos
74a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams dag pas rang bzhin bde ba'i don/ /gang la mi gnas blo yi yul las 'das/ /yul med gnas med rten dang bral bas stong/ /e baM dngos grub ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu/ /rdo rje 'chang dang rang rig bla ma'i bka' / /'dus pa'i rgyud du dri med phyag rgya che/ /kun rdzob
74a6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phyag rgya la sogs kun/ /'khor los sbyang rgyal dmangs kyi 'khor dang mtshungs/ /rdzogs pa phyag rgya nyi zla'i skar phran bzhin/ /dga' bral dga' ba mchog tu dga' la sogs/ /lhan cig skyes dga' 'khor lo'i rtsa ba nyid/ /dri ma med par dag byed de yi
74a7(rgyud 'grel): dgongs par gsal/ /de nyid ldan pas rtag tu ye shes myong/ /dbyer med thugs kyi stong nyid go 'phangs yangs/ /lus ngag thabs ldan thabs la brten bsgom pa/ /dran pa skyed byed rgyu rkyen 'bras bu smin/ /las can drang phyir grol ba'i thabs su sbyor//
74b1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phyag rgya nyams myong brod pa skyed/ /de nyid ldan goms nyams myong grol ba'i lam/ /pad+ma rdo rjer sbyor ba mthong 'dod dang/ /chags can lam gyis de nyid grol mi 'gyur/ /gzhan yang las kyi phyag rgya nyams myong dag bsten la/ /tha mal lus la phyag
74b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po sbar/ /phyag rgya chen po kun tu khyab pa'i dpe/ /rin po che dang nam mkha' lta bur mtshungs/ /phung po lnga sogs gsang ba mchog tu 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa lhan cig gnas/ /kho na nyid ni bla ma'i bka' drin gyis/ /mtshon cing bsgrub mi dgos
74b3(rgyud 'grel): par rang la rnyed/ /phyag rgya chen po mchog nyid dri ma bral/ /go 'phang thob par bya phyir spyad par bya/ /rtag chad gnyis med mnyam sbyar gcig nyid bzhag/ lung dang man ngag dag gis rig pas shes par bya/ /kho na nyid ni bsgrub na gdon mi za/ /phyag rgya chen po
74b4(rgyud 'grel): gsal te shes sgom na/ /kho na nyid ni rtogs par the tsom med/ /de nyid shes na goms pa'i stobs kyis spyod/ /de nyid ma shes steng sgo 'og sgo dang/ /rig ma la rten gsum po gtsor byed dang/ /chu bya la sogs nya dang du da 'gror mtshungs/ /rang rig rgyud
74b5(rgyud 'grel): la tha snyad 'jal byed dang/ /phyi nang gzhig nas rang bzhin med 'dod na/ /'jig rten ca co yin mod khyad med mtshungs/ /bden dang rten 'brel sgo nas thar 'dod dang/ /dbang po bsubs pas thar lam 'dren 'dod dang/ /byis pa chang pa stong pas 'drid dga' ste/ /des na
74b6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba byed 'dod thar med brdzun gyis bslus/ /grangs can rigs sogs gcer du bye brag 'dod/ /byed dang rgyur lta la sogs byin 'khyam/ /kye'o des na 'khor ba ji ltar btang bar 'gyur/ /rgyu rkyen med pas rtags yul ma yin pa'i/ /sems kyi de nyid phyag rgya che la gnas/ /de
74b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid stobs kyis mtshan ma dang bral zhing/ /tshe gcig phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur/ /kye 'o ngo mtshar gsang ba'i spyod yul 'di/ /sman pa'i rgyal po rtog las skye med 'char/ /ye shes lnga sogs mtshan nyid rang la ldan/ /dang po las can rigs kyis kho na mthod/ /mtshan
75a1(rgyud 'grel): ma la bsten dran pas g.yeng ba'i rgyu/ /kho na nyid la phyi rol ma dmigs na/ /mtshan mo'i spyod yul dran med dang la thim/ /mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor khams gsum 'khor pa'i lam/ /mtshan ma'i dngos po bag med sa bon bcas/ /dran med
75a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor nam mkha' i dkyil dang mtshungs/ /so sor med na ngo bo ma skyes phyir/ /skye bo gzhan gyi blo yi spyod yul min/ /de nyid lta la mkhas bas spyad byar 'byung/ /dran pa rnam rtog gzugs su gnas pa dang/ /dran med khams gsum dag pa'i gnas su spangs//
75a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid ma skyes dngos grub kun gyi gnas/ /phyi dang nang rol ma dmigs thams cad 'grub/ /kye'o phyag rgya chen po yon tan mchog ldan gang/ /bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dngos grub kun gyi gzhi/ /bla ma dkon mchog mi spang yon tan 'byung/ /gang zhig dang
75a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems ldan brgya lam na/ /rnal 'byor gzungs kyi gzhung 'di rtogS par shog/ gsung gi mdzod 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'i glu sar has gsungs pa rdzogs so// //
75a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs skye med rdo rje'i gus ra has mdzad pa bzhugs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta ko'a a badzra tse ta/ bod skad du /thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye'o lhan cig skyes
75a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ye shes ni/ /rang gis nyams su myong ba de kho na/ /rig dang ma rig rang rig gsal ba de kho na/ /mar me mun bsal rang gis rang gsal rang la sang/ /'dam gyi pad+ma 'dam la ma zhen kha dog legs/ /gzung 'dzin dri ma ma spangs snying po bsal/ /nags
75a7(rgyud 'grel): khrod gnas pa'i ri dags gcig pur rgyu/ /rgyu la ma zhen 'bras bu de kho na/ /snang dang mi snang yul med gsal/ /dngos stong ma dran dran med brjod pa med/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnams gsum nyams su bde/ /zhen pa med phyir rtog ge'i yul las 'das/ /sna
75b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dran phyir rjes su 'brang ba med/ /gsal dang mnyam pa'i ye shes snying po nyid/ /mun sel nyi ma sgron me'i kha dog ltar/ /rang rig rang la 'bar na 'dzin rtog zad/ /sgrub pa zad phyir dran med yengs pa med/ /gnyis dang yod dang med dang tha snyad ma skyed cig
75b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po bsam med blo las 'das/ /rang rig rdo rje 'dzin pa rnal 'byor pa/ /'da' dka' lhan cig skyes pa'i mar me ni/ /thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa'i don/ /skye med stong pa 'od gsal stong par ris dang bral/ /khyad par can gyi ye shes
75b3(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid/ /gnyis la mi bltos bde ba rgyun mi 'chang/ /rang 'byung rtog med bag chags brtsad nas gcod/ /sems can sangs rgyas khyad par bsam yas kyang/ /spyod lam dag na rgyun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /dran pa'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab kyang/ /gdod
75b4(rgyud 'grel): nas dag pas dran med dbyings la thim/ /rang don skye med gnyis bral rtogs pa'i don/ /'bras bu dag pas blo 'das yul med bral/ /rtog pa'i thabs rgyun rang bzhin kun la khyab/ /thabs kyi 'gro don snying rje bsam yas kyang/ /ye shes rang bzhin
75b5(rgyud 'grel): skye 'gag med par rtogs/ /thabs kyi bde ba skyes kyang de med ma zin 'ching/ /grol ba'i ye shes rang la lhan cig 'byung/ /bsgom bya bsgom byed dmigs pa'i blo las 'das/ /sangs rgyas sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /skye med rtogs pa'i yul na blor mi snang/ /de nyid sad
75b6(rgyud 'grel): pas bde bstong pas mtshon/ /bsgom bya'i ngo bo snang ba'i rkyen las byung/ mi rtog rtogs pas kun rdzob tha snyad 'grub/ /gnyis su med pa'i snang pa rkyen med la/ /rang bzhin dag pa skye ba'i rnam 'phrul shar/ /bral dang ma bral mi rtog blo las 'das/ /gnyis med rtogs byar
75b7(rgyud 'grel): skye med yul du 'gyur/ /stong par ? bas de nyid rtogs mi 'gyur/ /blo las 'das pas mon bsam yul ma yin/ /mdza' gsum rtag 'dod dag gis rnyed par dka' / /dga' bzhi dag la dmigs kyang de nyid dka' / /tshogs drug rang chas ye shes mchog ldan pas/ /gnyis med bcud
76a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi snang par ngal 'char/ /kye'o phyag rgya chen po rtogs bral kun gyi gzhi/ /dngos grub 'byung pas ngo mtshar rmad du che/ /gnyis med bag chags sad nas rang rig bral/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ /mtshan nyid bstan pas nyan thos la
76a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs skrag/ rtse gcig bltas na yon tan mthar thug ldan/ /rtse gcig byas kyang cung zad bsgom du med/ /rnam rtog dang 'bar dran med gsos su zhi/ /dran pa med snang me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /tha snyad bral bas skye med blo 'das lam/ /mtshan ma'i dran pa dri med
76a3(rgyud 'grel): bag chags bstan/ /thog mdza' bral zhing snga phyi'i dus mi dmigs/ kye'o de phyir dngos med ye shes rtogs pa'i lam/ /ji ltar bag chags bral ba'i tshul zhen/ /gnyis su ma gzung gdod mdza' bral bas zhi/ /bag chags bral bas phyogs med rgyu ba stong/ /zung du
76a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid/ /shes rab rnam gsum yul dang thabs su gsungs/ /dpe dang bral bas mtshon pa'i yul las 'das/ /skye ba 'di la dam pa'i snying po min/ /thabs kyi sbyor bas tshogs drug rang sar zhi/ /phung ba lnga sogs yon tan dag pa'i zhing/ /kun mkhyen
76a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med snang yul zhen dang bral/ /don dam smra med kun rdzob rtog rtse tsam/ /mya ngan 'das lam 'khor ba'i snang ba nyid/ /bla ma dam pa'i dgongs pa thug phrad du/ /rnyed nas 'khor ba'i lam las grol bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dgongs pa'i nyams rnyed rdzogs sangs rgyas
76a6(rgyud 'grel): ma nor lam du lhan cig kho na yi/ /kye'o gnyis med don du gsang sngags brda yis bkrol/ /yon tan mi zad rgya mtsho nor bu mtshungs/ /thabs mchog zin na bcu bzhi sa la gnas/ /gang du gnas kyang ye shes dang las rnyed/ /gter rnyed bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don
76a7(rgyud 'grel): la rmongs/ /snying gi ga'u pad+ma me tog dkyil/ /thabs dang ldan pa sbyor bde nas 'gyed/ /'khor lo'i phyogs kyi rtsa gnas gang du yang/ /'dod dang bral bas chags med nam mkha' la/ /gyen thur 'dren dang 'khor lo bskor dang yang/ /thabs kyi 'dren tshul don gyi
76b1(rgyud 'grel): gting mi rnyed/ /gzungs dang 'phangs dang sbyar dang sbar ba yang/ /blun po dbugs mi bde dang khyad med mtshungs/ /rtogs par 'dod pas de nyid rtag tu blta/ /gus dang dang bas bla ma dkon mchog brten/ /gsang pa'i yon tan bla ma mchog las byung/ /don ldan mtshan
76b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid nyon mongs g.yul las rgyal/ /gsang ba'i don nyid don dang rab ldan pa'i/ /bla ma slob dpon lung dang rab lnga nas/ /mi gnyis sgo nas 'gro ba grol 'gyur shog/ //thugs kyi mdzad skye med rdo rje'i glu snying po gsang ba'i don/ /dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa
76b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// // */ /sku gsung thugs yid la mi byed pa zhen bya ba sa ra has mdzad pa bzhugs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du /kA ya kAka? tsit+ta a man si ka ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku gsung thugs yid la mi
76b4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa zhes bya ba/ mtshan ma rab tu mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sku yi khyad par bdud bzhi dang tu 'joms mdzad cing/ /rnal 'byor rnam par grol bas mdzad pa gang gis ni/ 'dod pa'i don ni yang dag sbyin par gang 'gyur
76b5(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /'gro la byams pa'i cha lugs mchog gi don sngon pa/ /don dam rab tu mi gnas dgongs pa rgyal ba'i thugs/ /gang gis sems la 'di kun bsam du med do kye/ /khyod ni phrin las yan lag mang po ston mdzad cing/ /dgyes shing nam mkha' i khams kun thams cad
76b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gengs par byed/ /gsung mchog yan lag drug cus sgra skad sna tshogs sgrogs/ /thugs kyi khyad par dgongs pa dbyings las mi bskyod kyang/ /thams cad tshim zhid mgu nas rab tu ston par byed/ byams dang snying rje gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar snyon? /mahA
76b7(rgyud 'grel): de ba u ma de ba rab tu 'joms par byed/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de/ /thar ba'i sgo ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi lam 'di nyid/ /gang yang gtso mchog ldan pa'i sbyor bdag gis rab tu mi dbye bar/ /rnal 'byor chen po tha mi dad pa yin 
77a1(rgyud 'grel): gang gis de ni mi shes pa'i/ /di ma'i tshul gyis gang yang mthong ba med/ /gang gis de kun 'chad bar byed pa de yis ni/ /gzi mdangs gnyis las brten te las kun ston par byed/ /bdag med ro gcig khyab par byed pa'i gzugs ldan ni//
77a2(rgyud 'grel): 'din mi gnas kun kyang 'gro bar byed/ /sngags dang mdo sde kun gyi rgyal por dbang bskur bas/ /'di dag kun gyi rtsa ba yid la mi byed par/ /khyed kyis gcig dang gnyis la ma sems kyi/ /kun rdzob dran pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs par ston pa/ /don dam mi dmiD
77a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi dbyings su ro gcig nyid/ /dug lnga la sogs nad kyis nyen pa'i mun pa sel/ /thog ma'i mdza' dang tha ma'i dngos gzhi ma mthong bar/ /'dus ma byas la yid kyi dmigs su med do kyi/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi bar na ming dang bral 'dug pa/ /yan
77a4(rgyud 'grel): lag log na gcig gi ngo bo nyid/ /shes par bya dang bya'o cog gi tha snyad kun/ /'di las gzhan du lta ba mtshan mas myong bar 'gyur/ /sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba zlos pa ji bzhin te/ /ma mthong pa nyid byis dang bar nas shor bar 'gyur/ /yengs dang gnas
77a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar na ngo bo 'di zhes med/ /rgyu med rkyen bral skye ba med pa gnyis par na/ /log par lta ba'i tshogs kyis 'di la gzhol du ? wang gur gum tsan dan thig le bris pa bzhin/ /zla ba bzang po rgya skar 'od kyis 'gebs pa nyid/ /snying po'i 'od kyis yan lag zil
77a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /'di nas 'di ru zad ces 'di byung brtags dka' nyid/ /gang gis nam mkha' dag la longs spyod pa'i/ /'dod pa'i yon tan 'di la 'phel 'grib med par 'byung/ /gang zhig nor bu dri ma med pa 'chang ba yi/ /sems kyi yon tan gter chen
77a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di las 'byung 'gyur te/ /mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu blta ba nyid/ /chos nyid mtshon pa'i ngo bo 'di zhes 'das 'gyur ba/ /blo mchog rnams kyis kyang ni phibs par nus ma yin/ /gnyis med tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs gang nyid/ /'di nas song ba gang?
77b1(rgyud 'grel): yang med par shes pa de/ /'di ni mi gnas gang na 'ang gnas pa med/ /yul med 'di la rtag tu lta ba dang bral nyid/ /'di nas gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs mtshams de kun na/ /'jigs par byed pa'i sgra yis ma khyer bar/ /ci bde ba dang lhan cig dag tu byos/ /kye'o grogs
77b2(rgyud 'grel): dag 'di la sems gnyis yod de med kyi brtag pa kun/ /rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod de smyon pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/ /spro bar gyur nas rgya mtshor ltung ba nyid/ /tshangs pa rdul dang mtshan ma'i yun pa dag dang ma bral ba/ /de nyid gnyis bral rtogs par 'dod pa gang//
77b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtshos dang gshag mar nor bu 'gyur mthong nyid/ /brtul zhugs mya ngan 'da' ba' i spyod pa gang byed pa/ /'di ni mi shes de 'drang ston par byed/ /bden pa gnyis bral sgro skur med pa'i gnyug ma gang/ /gang du mthong ba med pa de yin te/ nges par grub cing 'di la
77b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin med par 'gyur/ /gang gis ma mthong ba las de ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /theg pa gsum gyis mya ngan 'das ston pa/ /'di ru ma shes de nyid mthong ba med/ /rnam grol lam ston bye brag gang duAng phye ba med pa de/ /byis pa rnams kyis shes par 'gyur ma yin
77b5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig 'di 'dod chags dang bral bar rtogs pa de/ /sdug bsngal gsum 'am brgyad la sogs pa kun spangs nyid/ /bden pa gnyis las mi 'da' thabs tshul sna tshogs kyis/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad 'od zer g.yas g.yon rab tu 'gyed/ /bu ma'i la kha sbub ma dag
77b6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid dag ston pa/ /tshang tshing 'brel pa'i yul drug la sogs rab tu 'joms/ /thams cad mkhyen ldan sus kyang mthong ba med pa de/ /grags pa la sogs kun gyis bstod dang bskyod pa med/ /kye 'o 'di ltar gnas na kun gyis shes 'gyur te/ /thog mdza' 
77b7(rgyud 'grel): med nas srid pa'i rgya mtsho g.yengs 'gyur pa/ /sdug bsngal nyid kyi rtsa ba 'di ru byas/ /'di la shes dang nyon mongs la sogs pa'i/ /dri mas ma gos 'dam gyi pad+ma bzhin/ /kha dog ma 'dres yul la so sor snang/ /sgyu mar rtogs tsam gar mkhan mig 'phrul
78a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /'du byed sna tshogs gang la bsags pa de/ /glo bur rten 'brel dag las goms pa'i stobs/ 'di goms gang yang shes par mi 'gyur te/ /ma goms pas na thams cad shes par 'gyur/ /'dres pa'i chos ni gang yang
78a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas par mi byed do/ /skugsungs thugs dang phyag rgyal sogs rim pa kun/ /'di la skad cig tsam du rtogs par ma byed cig/ 'jig rten bstan bcos ngag dang glegs bam gyis/ /gsung gi bdag nyid brjod par bya ba min/ /nyi ma zla ba gnyis su gnas
78a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa/ /de dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas ni/ /gang gis gang spyod de yis rab tu brgyan/ /skye ba med pa'i rnam par nges brjod pa'i/ /dbus su brjod pas mdza' rnams rab tu spangs/ ji ltar bstan pas go bar mi 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten khams su gtan
78a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byams rigs chad de/ /bag chags las kyis mnar ba ma tshor bas/ chos nyid dri ma med pa'i don mi mthong/ /gang yang 'di dang bral ba med pa de/ /dran 'dzin lus las myur du skad cig grol/ /rdo rje'i sems ni yongs su brtag dka' ba/ /sems
78a5(rgyud 'grel): la sems su ma mthong ro bsnyams nas/ /phyi nang bsam gtan rtse mos btags pas stong/ /rnal ma'i don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ ye shes shes rab gsang ba'i dbyangs la rdzogs/ /rang gis ma mthong mtshan nyid kun ldan zhes ni bsngags
78a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yongS? 'gyur ba'i/ dran med mnyamm pa'i dbyings la skur gsal mos pa med par spyod/ thugs rjes mi gzigs sku gsung thugs kyis mgos pa/ gnyis su ma mthong gsum gyi dri ma bral/ /sna tshogs par snang gang la ngos gzung med pa ste/ lus ngan yid gsum
78a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pa'i rtsol bas gdungs par ma byed cig ngas ni rdo rje'i gru dang long gtam rgyob gsod dang/ 'gro ba kun gyis shes pa dag dang gar? bder spyod/ ma bsgrim mi blta mi spyod 'di dang 'bral ma myong/ ye nas ma bcos thams cad 'byung 'jug go 'phang/ /kye'o sna tshogs
78b1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang rung ba 'di la bsam pa'i sems bral bas/ /yid kyi rtog pa sna tshogs 'di ni dran pa'i sems yin te/ /gang yang gzugs dang rtsa ba med pa dag las skyes pa yin/ /tha mal shes pa ma bzung bde chen rgyal po nyid/ /mtshan nyid cir yang ma mthong
78b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs cha kun dang bral/ /'khrul pas brtags pa'i bsam brjod 'di ni glo bur te/ /blo las byung phyir blo yi bsgom du gal yod/ /gang la yan lag med pa de nyid kun gyi khyim du ltung bar 'gyur/ /go ba'i tshe na ci yang med pa ste/ /dngos kun ci yang gsal
78b3(rgyud 'grel): pa mthong ba med/ /gang la mya ngan 'das dang srid pa kha sbyar ba/ /gnyis su snang ba khyod la brten dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyal ba la sogs kun tu sprul ba sna tshogs ston mdzad pa/ /dag pa'i rigs rnams kun la khyod kyis spyod/ /mi bsam thugs rje rang 'thung? sprul
78b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /nor bu rin chen lta bur 'phel 'grib med par 'byung/ /dngos po med pas nams kyang rtogs min pas/ /btang gzhag med cing rang bzhin rnam par grol/ /'dzin med yid la bya med rnal 'byor bsam gtan nyid/ /gang la mi bsgom btsal ba med pa de/ /bsam du
78b5(rgyud 'grel): med pas yid la mi byad ro snyoms kye/ /ye shes mkha' 'dra bsam bral ma bcos snying po'i don/ /'di la blo yis bsam zhing brjod du med do kye/ /ye btang rang yan tshogs drug lhug pa'i spyod pa 'di/ /tshogs drug rjes su sbyor ba'i mkhas pas btang gzhag med
78b6(rgyud 'grel): kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor lhag pa'i bsam bral bas/ /de bzhin nyid la mi gnas gang la rang bzhin med par grol/ /'od gsal rdzogs dang thim dang 'gags par 'gyur ba gang/ /ji ltar bsgoms dang chags par 'gyur ba mtshan ma ste/ /phung po khams dang skye
78b7(rgyud 'grel): mched yan lag thams cad kun/ /gcig gi dbyings na mi mngon phra ba'i tshul du gnas/ /rgya mtsho'i dbyings nas nor bu rin chen rnyed 'gyur ba/ /chu srin dung dang gdug pa can gyis mthong mi 'gyur/ /phrag dog srid pa'i nyon mongs la sogs pa'i/ /mtshan ma'i dbyings
79a1(rgyud 'grel): nas yongs bzung med par mthong/ /gsum la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug par byed pa ni/ /rnam rig bden pa gnyis kyi sgo nas rtsol bar byed/ /ji ltar snang bzhin 'jig rten tha smad lam/ /rnam thar sgo gsum bslad pa rnam pa
79a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /mtshan ma'i yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor te/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'di la gnas mi byed/ gang zhig shel sgong dag pa lta bur ni/ /dri ma gnyis gral srid dang 'das grol te/ /rin po che ltar dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung/ yongs su zad pa zad phyir
79a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid med/ dngos med bden pa gnyis bral gcig gi dngos po stong/ /mtshan ma thams cad ye nas med pa'i phyir/ /mthong thos la sogs mdza' yi rtog pa med/ /med la med par 'dzin pa tha snyad de/ /'di ni tshor bar nus pa ma yin no/ /'di ni rtsa ba
79a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rjes su rtog par ma byed cig /'di la gang tshe rtog par byed pa dang/ /bskal par bgrang kyang de nyid rnyed pa min/ /mgal me rtsub shing lta bur me mched 'bar ba bzhin/ 'di kun mched nas thams cad sreg par byed/ /kye'o grogs dag rgya mtsho nor
79a5(rgyud 'grel): bu lta bu'i sems ni 'di nyid yin te/ /kye/ /ma he'i rwa ru seng ge'i 'o ma gang slugs pa/ /nor bu rin chen 'bar ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs pa rnams nyi mas rab tu skams pa'i 'od zer ba'i/ /ngan 'gro la sogs log par lta bas 'jigs
79a6(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa de/ gang dag rnyed pa de dag gzhal gyis mi lang ngo/ /ji ltar chos kyi dbyings su snang ba de srid du/ zag pa med gang thams cad de yis spyad pa yin/ /dug sprul phag rgod glang chen seng ges zos pa bzhin/ /de bzhin srid dang mya ngan 'das pa
79a7(rgyud 'grel): khyur mid brdas/ /bskal pa brjod du med pa brgya stong du ma ru/ /nyon mongs la sogs bsags pa'i sa bon ni/ /sems gcig snang par 'gyur pas 'bras bu gcig tu log par 'gyur/ /sgron me khang bur nor bu gnas gyur pa'i/ /'od kyis thams cad
79b1(rgyud 'grel): zil gyis mnan par 'gyur/ /dman pa'i lta spyod nyan thos la sogs pa'i/ /sems de yang dag blangs nas 'jug par 'gyur/ /'di la gang na byang chub sems dpar gyur pa de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dka' bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /sems kyi skad cig
79b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di la mdza' yas mu med de/ /yan lag thams cad skad cig 'di la log par 'gyur/ /chos rnams thams cad kho na nyid la rdzogs par 'gyur ba yi/ /gzhan med gang zhig gang nas 'ongs par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /zla ba'i snying po mun pa'i g.yul las rgyal
79b3(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur pa gang/ /'jig rten rmi lam lta bu 'di la yang dag rnyed par 'gyur/ /brdzun pa gang yin 'di la yang dag sus mthong ba/ /bltar med de la gzugs su mthong bar ga la 'gyur/ don dam par ni gang yang yod par 'gyur ba ma yin na/ /pha rol gzhan du
79b4(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas 'gro ba 'dod pa'i gang zag de/ /'di las gzhan du 'gro ba'i khyad par bse dri can bzhin no/ /'di ni pha rol rtol bas gang du ma bor bar/ /gcig kyang phyin pa med par 'dis rtol lo/ /kye 'o gang 'di tha snyad lam 'dis btsal ma yin/ thar pa rtag tu
79b5(rgyud 'grel): byi la lta bu'i mchongs pas nags su ltung bar 'gyur/ /gal te stag dang wa mo lta bu'i stobs ni go bzlog na/ /de nyid yod pas de la ci zhig phan par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nyid shes na mi bsam mi rtog par/ /gzugs mthong cir yang snang ba'i yul ni de du stong par
79b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /'di la yengs nas de la gnas par 'gyur ba ma tshor ro/ /dran dang shes bzhin gnyis ni bar gyis de la gang yang ma mthong ste/ /chos kun stor na 'di yi khong na gnas par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di la dngos po med cing bsam du med pa de/ /khyod kyis rtsa mchog
79b7(rgyud 'grel): can du gnyis ka med par byos/ kye'o sangs rgyas kun gyi yan lag bzhi pa 'di kun gsum du ston par ni/ /khyed kyis yang nas yang du bsams bas mthong pa gang yang med mod kye/ /'khor ba'i ngan pas rten 'brel dag las 'byung ba ni/ /sna tshogs par snang rang
80a1(rgyud 'grel): gi ngo bo ma skyes phyir/ /mi 'gyur bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dag dang lhan cig skyes/ /sems kyi don dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i yon tan nyid/ /chos rnams thams cad gnyis
80a2(rgyud 'grel): su gdong nas ma byung ste/ /gnyis dang gcig gi dran pas du ma dag dang 'bral bar 'gyur/ /gang yang brjod par bya yi dngos po gang zhig rang gis stong pa ste/ /blo las 'das phyir mtshan ma rab tu 'joms/ /de med pa de gang yin gang nas gnas par
80a3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan gang tshe thob par 'gyur pa la/ /bral bas 'di las gzhan du song bas ma mthong ngo/ /gsang sngags 'di kun rtsa pa de las bskyed par ni/ /de med pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yang yod pa ma
80a4(rgyud 'grel): yin kye/ /su zhig 'di la rtog par byed pa'i blon po de/ /bskal pa brgyar yang mchog gi don mi mthong/ /gang zhig yid la byed pa'i mtshan mas brgyal ba kun/ /btang gzhag bral dang thob par mi 'gyur rgyal srid bzhin/ cung zad drod thob byang chub
80a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dag/ gang du g.yos pa med pa mtshor ro/ rnam par rtog can lam du zhugs pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems kyi thig le rlung la gang bskyon pa/ /sa bon nges ni 'khor ba 'di ru zags par 'gyur/ /yang dag pa yi de nyid thob par mi 'gyur
80a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /chang tshing dra ba'i gseb du 'dral bar 'gyur/ shes rab mig gis log par tshar bcad na/ gzhan gyi log par lta ba rang gi de ru gral/ /dka' thub la sogs gzhan du 'bad pa med/ /bdag med par ni rang byung gang yang rnam pa sna tshogs nyid/ /rgyu rkyen/
80a7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs 'brel ba 'di ru stong par byos/ rnal 'byor 'di la bdag gi gnas su 'dug pa ma mthong ngo/ sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i long pa gang 'chal 'dis/ /srid pa'i dra ba/ bur na rgya mtshod mchod par byed/ /de la gru med rgya mtsho'i thabs su zags par 'gyur/
80b1(rgyud 'grel): thog mdza' med pa'i phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das grol nyon mongs rgya skems par 'gyur/ /de la sems rgyan 'chad do snyam du sems shing stong par yid la ma byed cig/ /gang la don gyi brtul zhugs chen po 'di nyid ma thob par/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa'i
80b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis de la ma reg kye/ /byin gyis rlabs dang brlab bya med pas ngo mtshar che ba nyid/ /gnyis med sgro skur bral ba 'di las gnas pa gang rten dang bral pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur/ /'gro ba kun gyis de ltar shes par 'gyur gang ni/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das
80b3(rgyud 'grel): pa kun gyi don shes 'gyur/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams rang gi sems yin par/ /gzhan du blta ba med par thag chod bsam med blo 'das nyid/ /de la bsgoms ang ma bsgoms rnam par rtog pa dang/ /mtshan ma dgag dang spang par bya ba mi dgos te/
80b4(rgyud 'grel): de la ci bya gang yang ma byas de nyid gsal bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar rnam rtog ma bkag ma spangs par/ /gzhan du ma mthong de nyid gsal 'gyur na/ /de ni gang la gnas kyang gzhan du mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /ma bsgoms ched du ma byas 'bral ba med pa'i dang
80b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te/ /dus rnams kun tu 'di don shes pa'i mtshan ma 'di la rtog par ma byed cig/ rang la lhan cig gsal ba'i snang srid 'di la rtog med cing/ /de las gzhan du rtog pa'i blo can 'dis ni rgya mtsho nang gi nor bu rnyed mi 'gyur/ /gang nas byung zhing gang du
80b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i 'dzin pa 'di ni skye ba med 'gyur na/ /rgyun tu 'gag pa med pas gzung 'dzin de ma skyes pas ye shes nyid/ /ngo bo de la dri ma ma spangs de nyid ma bsgoms par/ /nags khrod dag na gnas pa'i glang po yan par khyab?/ /mtshan ma'i yul gyi rnam g.yeng
80b7(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /gnod cing de la g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ /mtshon cha bral ba'i chom rkun dag gis bsad bcad ma yin no/ /mtshan ma de nyid snying po med 'gyur ba/ /sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad lta bur rang bzhin med par byos/ /gang mthong sems 
81a1(rgyud 'grel): yin de la dngos po med 'gyur bas/ /dran med blo la mi gnas chos rnams thams cad ni/ /de las byung zhing de ru snang nas de nyid las 'gyur bas/ /'di la gzhan du g.yo ba gang yang med pa nyid/ de la de nyid tsam du mkhyen gyis yid la ma
81a2(rgyud 'grel): myed? kye/ /kye'o grogs dag blo la ci skyes sems de ni/ /dus rnams kun tu gsal ba ma yin no/ de la gsal rgyu ci yang med pa ste/ /brtsad pa kun dang bral bar ni/ rang gnas pas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar tshul 'chos byas pa'i sangs rgyas 'di kun ni/ /dge
81a3(rgyud 'grel): slong ma yin rgya mtsho'i nang du ltung/ 'di nyid las ni gzhan dag tu/ /gcig kyang lta bar mi byed pa/ des ni thams cad mthong ba'i dge slong yin/ gang zhig brdzun la goms pa'i gnas brtan des/ /srid pa nyam thag 'di las 'byung bar nus ma yin//
81a4(rgyud 'grel): gang gis srid pa'i chu bo 'di brdzun par/ shes pa de ni gnas brtan mchog thob 'gyur/ rnal 'byor de yi spyod yul ni/ /lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i yan lag kun/ /'di kun shes na dbab du yod pa ma yin no/ /de nyid shes pa de la de kun mthong ba med//
81a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar 'de las ma gtogs pa'i/ 'du shes yul gzhan dag las ni/ /skye bar 'gyur ba yod ma yin/ /yul can gang gi phyogs dag tu/ /gnyis su mthong ba med par 'gyur ba de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs de nyid grol pa yin/ /gang zhig phyogs su lta bar
81a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa de/ /mtshan ma'i dran rig phra rabs goms pa yin/ gang zhig 'di las goms 'gyur bas/ /spyod pa ji ltar byas pa kun/ don dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ /nyam thag mtshan mas myur du 'ching bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di dang phyogs su ni//
81a7(rgyud 'grel): gtad la gom su yod pa yin/ /bsam med yid la goms su med/ kye'o grogs dag rig pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa ni/ /ye shes bla na med pa'i dbang bskur chen po ste/ /rdzogs ldan dpal ldan? bla ma dag gis ni/ /bskur du med pa'i tshul gyis thob
81b1(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa ni/ /mchog gi rnal 'byor rnams kyi dbang bskur te/ /thob bya med pa'i tshul du thams cad rdzogs de nyid ma shes log sred can gyi dbang rnams ni/ /mtshan ma'i rtog pa dag gis gzungs du thags par 'gyur/ /'di la nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa las
81b2(rgyud 'grel): bsags kun/ /shes rab ting 'dzin mi dgos rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ /khro gnyer med pas zug rdu thams cad 'joms par ni/ /ma skyes pa yi tshul gyis 'dzin par mi byed do/ /snang ba 'gag pa 'di la gsal ba'i rtog pas yid la ma byed cig/ phyin ci log dang rnam par
81b3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa thams cad ni/ /nyon mongs lnga yi gnas su thams cad thags? par 'gyur ba yin/ gzhan dag 'di nyid shes pas 'khor ba'i dra ba dag gis stong pa nyid/ /u dum pa ra lta bur dkon 'gyur ba'i/ /rmongs pa'i mun sel snying po gsang ba'i don/ sus kyang shes par
81b4(rgyud 'grel): med par kun la gsal 'gyur ba/ /snying gar gnas pa'i don la dri ma med 'gyur te brtul zhugs spyod bas gang de mthong ba ma yin no/ /'di rnams rdzogs la sbyor bar nus pa de/ /yan lag thim nas spyod pa nyid du gnas/ /kye grogs dag kyang dang rdza rigs ji bzhin du/ /gang
81b5(rgyud 'grel): gis khengs par myur du thob par 'gyur/ /rim par sbyang ba gang yang yod pa ma yin no/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du ro gcig dang/ /khyod kyis rdzogs par 'gyur bas thob pa ma yin no/ gang tshe 'di la rtsa ba med par rtog pa ni/ da lta nyid du gnyis med nges par 'gyur
81b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yin/ /ji ltar sin bu spyod bas bcings par gang 'gyur ba/ 'di rnams ral chags pas 'chid par 'gyur ba ste/ /chang tshing 'di la za bar nus pa gang gis ni/ /'khor lo thams cad rgyun tu bskor bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs gsal ba//
81b7(rgyud 'grel): 'di kun gang gis yid lam byas par/ /ston pa'i bla ma rdo rje 'dzin la 'dud/ /sku gsung thugs yid la mi byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa
82a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //bla ma nag pos rang 'gyur du gnang ba'o// //gu ya sa ma pa ta smi si// */ /do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag dpal ri ? zhabs kyis mdzad pa bzhugs// * / /rgya gar skad du/ /ngo ha ko Sha
82a2(rgyud 'grel): nA ma ma hA mu dra u pa de sha/ bod skad du/ do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag/ dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhan cig skyes ba'i ye shes chos kyi sku bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar dngos dang dngos med snang
82a3(rgyud 'grel): stong dang/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu g.yo dang mi g.yo ba/ /thams cad ma lus nam mkha' i rang bzhin las/ /dus rnams kun tu nam yang g.yo ba med/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes ni rab brjod kyang/ /nam mkha' i ngo bo cir yang grub pa med/ /yod dang med dang yod min med min
82a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /de las gzhan du 'ang mtshan pa'i yul las 'das /de ltar nam mkha' sems dang chos nyid la/ /tha dad cung zad yod pa ma yin te/ /tha dang ming ni glo bur btags pa tsam/ /de la don med brdzun gyi tshig tu zad/ /chos rnams thams cad rang gi
82a5(rgyud 'grel): sems yin te/ sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan rdul tsam med/ /gang gis gdod nas sems med rtogs pa yis/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dam pa rnyed/ /chos kyi za ma tog ces yongs su gdags/ /de yang log pa'i chos gzhan ma yin
82a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ /gzod nas lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no/ de yi de nyid bstan du yod min te/ /brjod du med pas sus kyang go ba med/ /gal te bdag po yod na nor yod de/ /ye nas bdag med de la ci zhig yod/ /sems yod gyur na chos kun yod rigs te/ /sems
82a7(rgyud 'grel): med pa la chos zhig su yis rtogs/ /sems dang chos su snang ba thams cad ni/ /btsal na mi rnyed tshol mkhan gong nas med/ /med pa dus gsum ma skyes mi 'gag pas/ /de nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ni/ /rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas lugs yin/ /de
82b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir snang ba thams cad chos kyi sku/ /'gro pa sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /'du byed las kun ye nas chos kyi dbyings btags pa'i chos rnams ri bong dwa dang 'dra/ /kye ma nyi ma sprin bral 'od zer kun khyab kyang/ /mig med rnams la mun pa rnams su snang//
82b2(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pas kun la khyab gyur kyang/ /rmongs pa dag la de nyid shin tu ring/ /'gro ba rnams kyis sems med ma rtogs pas/ /btags pa'i sems kyis sems nyid rab tu bcings/ /ji ltar gdon gyis brlams pa'i smyon pa dag/ dbang med don med sdug
82b3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal byed pa ltar/ /dngos 'dzin rnam tog gdon chen zin pa yi/ /skye bo don med sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig byed/ /kha cig blo yi dbye bas rmongs rnams bcings/ /bdag po khyim du bzhag nas gzhan du tshol/ /kha cig gzugs brnyan dag la don du 'dzin/ /kha cig rtsA? ba
82b4(rgyud 'grel): bor nas lo 'dab 'breg/ ji ltar byas kyang bslus pa ma tshor ro/ /kye'o bus pa rnams kyis de nyid ma rig kyang/ /de nyid dang las g.yos med nga yis rtogs/ /nga yis nga yir thog mdza' shes gyur pas/ /nga yis nga mthong dang nyid gcig pur lus/ /gcig?
82b5(rgyud 'grel): po nyid la bltas pas gcig ma mthong/ /mthong bya mthong byed bral bas brjod du med/ /brjod du med pa su yis go bar 'gyur/ /gnyug ma'i yid la gang tshe sbyang gyur pa/ /de tshe ri khrod nga yi rtogs par 'jug/ seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan phal par min/ /ji ltar nags na seng ge'i nga
82b6(rgyud 'grel): ro yis/ /ri dags phra mo thams cad skrag gyur kyang/ /seng phrug rnams ni dga' bas rgyug pa ltar/ /gdod nas ma skyes bde chen 'di bstan pas/ /rmongs pa log rtog can rnams skrag gyur kyang/ /skal ldan rab tu dga' bas spu zing byed/ /kye'o ma yengs sems kyis
82b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gis rang la stos/ /rang gi de nyid rang gis rtogs gyur na/ /yangs pa'i sems kyang phyag rgya chen por 'char/ /mtshan ma rang grol bde ba chen po'i dang/ /rmi lam dag gi bde dang sdug bsngal kun/ /sad pa'i dus na rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ /re dang dogs
83a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bsam pas kun bslangs nas/ /dgag dang sgrub pa'i bsam pa su zhig byed/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams kun/ /de nyid mthong bas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ /re dang dogs pa'i blo na zad gyur pas/ /spang dang blang ba'i 'bad rtsol ci byar
83a2(rgyud 'grel): yong/ /snang grags thams cad sgya me smig rgyu dang/ /gzugs rnyan dang mtshungs dngos po mtshan ma med/ /sgyu mar snang mkhang sems nyid nam mkha' i ste/ /mdza' bral dbus med sus kyang shes mi 'gyur/ /gam gA la sogs chu klung sna tshogs pa/ /ba tsho can
83a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgya mtshor ro gcig ltar/ /btags pa'i sems dang sems byung sna tshogs kun/ /chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig shes par byos/ /gang zhig nam mkha' i khams ni yongs btsal kyang/ /mdza' dang dbus med mthong ba yongs su 'gag/ de bzhin sems dar chos ni
83a4(rgyud 'grel): yongs btsal bas/ /snying po rdul tsam rnyed par ma gyur te yongs su chos ba'i sems kyang mi dmigs pas/ /ci yang ma mthong ba nyid de mthong yin/ /ji ltar gzings la 'phur ba'i bya rog ni/ /phyogs rnams bskor zhing slar yang de ru 'bab/ /'dod pa'i
83a5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis bstan pa'i rjes bcad kyang/ /dang po'i sems nyid gnyug ma nyid du 'bab/ /rkyen gyis mi 'gul re ba'i yi chang pa/ /dogs pa'i lkugs sa zhig pas rdo rje sems/ /rtsa ba chod pa'i sems nyid nam mkha' 'dra/ /sgom du med pas yid la mi bya ste//
83a6(rgyud 'grel): tha mal shes pa rang lugs gnyug ma la/ /bcos ma'i dmigs pa ngag gis ma bslad de/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems la bcos mi dgos/ /ma bzung ma btang rang dga' nyid du zhog/ gal te ma rtogs blo la sgom rgyu med/ /rtogs pa can la bsgom bya
83a7(rgyud 'grel): sgom byed med/ /ji ltar nam mkhas nam mkha' dmigs su med/ /de ltar stod pas stod pa sgom du med/ /gnyis med shes pas chu dang 'o ma ltar/ /sna tshogs ro gcig bde chen rgyun chad med/ /'di ltar dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du/ /yid la bya ba med cing ma bral gnyug
83b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dang/ /de nyid skyong la sgom zhes tha snyad gdags/ /rlung ni mi bzung yid ni mi bcings bar/ /ma bcos shes pa bu chung lta bur zhog/ dran tog byung na de nyid rang la ltos/ /chu dang rlabs gnyis tha dang ma rtogs cig/ yid la mi byed phyag rgya chen po la/ /sgom rgyu rdul tsam med
83b2(rgyud 'grel): pas mi sgom ste/ /sgom med don dang 'bral med sgom pa'i mchog/ gnyis med lhan skyes bde ba chen po'i ro/ /ji ltar chu la chu gzhag ro gcig ltar/ /ji bzhin dang du de bzhin gnas pa'i tshe/ /dmigs 'dzin zhen pa'i yid ni rab tu zhi/ /kye'o/ /gnyis med gnyug ma'i
83b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gang de la/ /spang dang blang ba'i dngos po ci zhig yod/ /ngas ni chos kun ma btang bas/ /bu khyod 'di gyis bya ba mi smra'o/ /ji ltar nor bu de dngos med pa ltar/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa de dngos med pa ste/ /'du byed sna tshogs cal col bar smras kyang/ /rnal
83b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor blo ni gcig las mi 'da' o/ /gcig nyid na ni gcig kyang yod min pas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rtsa ba bral gyur te/ /smyon pa bzhin du rtsis med yan pa la/ /byar med spyod pa bu chung bzhin du gnas/ /e ma srid pa'i 'dam skyes pad+ma lta bu'i sems/ /nyes pa gang gis
83b5(rgyud 'grel): gang la gos pa med/ /za zhing 'thung la gnyis sprod bde ba dang/ /gal te lus sems rab tu gdungs gyur dang/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gang la spyod gyur pa/ /gang gis ma bcings ma grol gos pa med/ /rtogs pa'i rang spyod rtsis med dang de nas/ /rmongs pa'i 'gro ba
83b6(rgyud 'grel): nyam thag mngon gyur tshe/ /mi bzod snying rje'i shugs kyis mchi ma 'byung/ /bdag gzhan bzlog nas phan pa nyid la 'jug/ don la brtags na dmigs pa gsum bral bas/ /yang dag ma yin rmi lam sgyu 'dra ste/ /chags thogs bral bas dga' zhing skye med pa/ /skyu
83b7(rgyud 'grel): ma mkhas pa sgyu ma'i don byed mtshungs/ /gdod nas ngag pa nam mkha' i rang bzhin la/ /spangs dang thob pa'i dngos po 'ga' yang med/ /yid la byar med phyag rgya chen po ni/ /'bras bu gang du 'ang re ba ma byed cig/ re ba'i sems ni gdod nas ma skyes pas/ /spangs dang
84a1(rgyud 'grel): thob pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod/ gal te gang gis thob pa'i dngos yod na/ /bstan pa'i phyag rgya rnam bzhis ci zhig byed/ /ji ltar ri dgas 'khrul pas gdungs pa yis/ /smig rgyu'i chu la rab tu rgyug pa ltar/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'dod pas rab
84a2(rgyud 'grel): gdungs bas/ /ji ltar 'bad kyang slar ni ring par 'gyur/ /ye nas ma skyes rang bzhin rnam dag pas/ /de las khyad par cung zad yod min te/ /btags pa'i yid ni dbyings su dag gyur pa/ /de la rdo rje 'chang zhes btags pa tsam/ ji ltar e tha? bskam po'i
84a3(rgyud 'grel): smig rgyu dag/ chur snang chu ni gnyis su med pa ltar/ /gzod nas dag pa btags pa'i yid sangs pa/ /de la rtag chad gnyis su brjod du med/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing bzhin du/ /smon lam dbang gis re ba yongs skor ba/ /de yang 'jig rten tha snyad kun rdzob
84a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ //dam pa'i don du 'ga' yang yong ma yin/ /de ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag dpal ri khrod pa chen po sa ra ta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rI bai ro tsan rak+Shi tas rang 'gyur
84a5(rgyud 'grel): du mdzad pa'o// / */ /ngo ha ma'o gyi snying po don kyi klu'i 'grel ba bzhugs so/ */ /rgya gar skad du/ rdo ha koSha h+ri da ya artha gI ta TI kA nA ma/ bod skad du /do ha mdzod kyi snying po don gyi glu'i 'grel pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
84a6(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros dang/ /dpal ldan rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po mnga' bsnun gyi/ /ji bzhin dgongs pa lon pa dpal ldan sar ba'i/ /zhabs kyi rdul la sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /snying po'i don ni blo yi yul
84a7(rgyud 'grel): du ma gyur pas/ /bdag 'dras tshig tu brjod kyang don dang shin tu ring/ /chig dang don gyi 'brel ba med de'o na yang/ dran rig sgron me 'di la brten ba'i don 'grel 'di/ mu stegs sa la sogs gzhan gyi gzhung la mi smod de/ /rtogs na de dag snying po'i don las ma g.yos
84b1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ 'on te log par rtogs pas grol bar mi 'gyur te/ /don la dgos pa med pas zhib tu ma gsungs so/ /gzhan gyi gzhung gi rtsa ba'i rjes la 'grel bas bshad/ /bdag 'dra'i lugs kyis bshad pa'i rjes la rtsa ba bri/ /de yang sde snod rnams kyi lung tshig mi 'dren la//
84b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang rgyud rnams lung chig bris pas rdzogs pa med/ /dpal ldan ri khrod zhabs kyi thugs dgongs 'ba' zhig la/ /bsten nas gsung gi bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'i brjed byang 'di/ bdag dang bdag 'dra mos pa rnams kyi don du ni/ /don gyi gdam dag 'ba' zhig bsdus nas bri bar
84b3(rgyud 'grel): bya// //de la re zhig do ha ko Sha grI ti 'di la don rnams pa gnyis so/ /snying po'i don sa rtogs pa la brgal? ba dang/ rtogs pa gsal bar byed pa'o/ /ma rtogs pa la brgal ba ni/ phyi rol mu stegs pa dang/ nang pa sangs rgyas pa la'o/ /de yang mu stegs bdag tu lta
84b4(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ rtag pa dang bde ba dang/ khyab pa dang/ gcig bu dang bzhi khas len te/ mi gsal ba'i mtshan ma dang/ gsal ba'i mtshan ma zhal bzhi pa la bzhed re/ /de las 'gro ba'i don du rigs rnam pa bzhir gzigs nas/ ston pa rnam pa bzhir sprul pa/ tshangs pa dang/ dbang
84b5(rgyud 'grel): phyug chen po dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ drag po 'jigs byed dang bzhi'o/ /de yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bram ze'i rigs dang/ rje rigs dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ dmangs rigs rnams kyi don du'o/ /de la bdag rtag pa ni/ tshangs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/ bdag bde ba ni dbang phyug
84b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po yab yum gyi zhal nas gsungs/ bdag kun la khyab pa ni khyab 'jug gi zhal nas gsungs/ bdag gcig pu ni drag po'i 'jigs byed kyi zhal nas gsungs/ de la tshangs ba'i zhal bzhi nas bram ze'i don du rig byed bzhi gsungs kyang don dam pa'i lta ba ma rtog
84b7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ de nyid mi shes bram ze ni/ des brjod kyi rig byed dang/ mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang/ snyan ? kyi rig byed dang/ srid srungs kyi rig byed bzhi po tshul tsam bsgoms pas ma rtogs pas/ gyi na rig byed bzhi dag 'don/ lus dag par byed pas/ dag dag par bye
85a1(rgyud 'grel): pa chu/ sems dag par byed pa rtsA? ku sha/ rang bzhin dag par byed pa'i skud pa'i spyod pas ma rtogs pas/ sa chu ku shi'i dag byed dang/ sbyin sreg phyi nang gi srog dang ma bral yang phung po me la sreg/ don dam pa'i 'bras bu ma rtogs
85a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir na/ khyim na gnas shing me la sreg/ tshe 'di la ni tsha ba'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i don med/ phyi ma'i tshe la ni grol bar mi nus pas/ don med sbyin sreg byed pa ni/ yang dag pa'i lta ba ni ma rtogs/ sgrib pa 'ba' zhig dang la gnod pas/ du
85a3(rgyud 'grel): bas mi la gnod pa bas/ da ni dbang phyug chen bo'i zhal nas gsungs pa rje'u rigs kyi chos/ legs ldan dang/ dbyu gu pa dang/ tha dad pa dang/ dang pa'i spyod pa dag la brgal ba/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba la phyi rol gyi dbyug gu la brtsis nas sam/ pho smos kyi bde ba la
85a4(rgyud 'grel): brten nas legs pas grol bas mthong bas/ dbyu gu dbug gsum legs ldan gzugs/ de yang bdag la yab yum gnyis su bsgoms pa 'am/ pho smos dang ba ltar 'grogs pa 'am/ rlung dang pa ltar shes nas grol par 'dod pas/ tha dad pa dang dad
85a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bstan pa dag/ pho smos kyi bde ba 'am/ dbyu gu rlung rgyu ba'i bde ba myong na dkar po'i chos sam nag po'i chos la khyad med pas/ chos dang chos min mi shes par mnyam zhing/ don dam pa'i bde ba ma yin pa la don dam pa yin snyam pas/ 'gro ba rnams
85a6(rgyud 'grel): ni brdzun pa nyid du gol/ da ni khyab 'jug gi zhal nas gsungs pa rgyal rigs kyi chos/ brtan pa dang g.yo ba la khyab pa'i e ri la brgal ba/ de kho na nyid ni ma rtogs pa'i lci ba 'am/ mi rus kyi thal bas lus la/ e ri thal bas lum la byug gas su/ khyab
