128b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ b+hA ba sany+tsa ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dngos po sbyong zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos po med la dngos por shes/ /dngos med skye ba yod ma yin/ /rtag tu skye ba dngos po nyid//
129a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos 'khrul nam mkha' i me tog bzhin/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams ni/ /skye ba mkha' dang mnyam nyid mchog/ thams cad rang bzhin gyis mkha' mnyam/ /des na srid pa dam pa'i dngos/ /rgyu med 'bras bu med pa
129a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /las kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin/ /'jig rten pa med 'jig rten med/ /'di dag thams cad bden ma yin/ /ma skyes pas ni dngos po gang/ /ji ltar gzhan las shes par 'gyur/ /mo gsham gyi ni bu nyid kyang/ /de tshe skye bar gyur ma yin/ /'jig
129a3(rgyud 'grel): rten gzod nas ma skyes te/ /gang gis kyang ni sprul ma yin/ /don med 'khrul pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /zla ba bzang po'i grong khyer bzhin/ /'jig rten rnam par rtog la 'byung/ /rnam rtog sems las byung ba ste// gang phyir lus las sems byung bas//
129a4(rgyud 'grel): de phyir lus la rnam par brtag/ gzugs stong tshor ba rang bzhin med/ /'du shes med cing 'du byed med/ /sems byung med de dngos po med/ /de phyir mi rtog rang bzhin no/ /des na sems min chos kyang min/ /lus min khams la sogs pa min/ /gnyis
129a5(rgyud 'grel): su med pa'i lam 'di ni/ /de nyid rig pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /dmigs pa med pa'i chos 'di kun/ /dmigs pa med par rab tu bstan/ /dmigs pa med par rab tu bstan/ /dmigs pa med pa'i blo byas na/ /dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ /spyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson
129a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grus/ /bsam gtan las byung bsten par bya/ /dus mi ring ba nyid na ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs la gnas gyur pas/ /sems can kun la brtse bar bya/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang mchog/ lha nyid dus mi ring bar
129a7(rgyud 'grel): 'thob/ /'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/ /tha snyad tsam du rab tu 'jug/ dngos po med la tha dad pa'i/ /brjod bya yod pa ma yin te/ bdag nyid gang dang gang gis ni/ /chos rnams gang dang gang brtags pa/ /de ni de la yod min te/ /chos rnams kyi ni
129b1(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid de/ /ming gis ming nyid stong pas ni/ /ming la ming ni yod ma yin/ /chos rnams thams cad ming med pas/ /ming ni brtags pa tsam nyid do/ /mi bden par gyur chos 'di dag/ brtags pa nyid du rab tu 'jug/ gang la brtags pa de
129b2(rgyud 'grel): med na/ /stong pa nyid du brtags pa gang/ /mig gis mthong ba'i gzugs rnams ni/ /de nyid rig pa zhes de bshad/ /'jig rten log pa'i nga rgyal can/ /kun rdzob bden pa zhes 'dir 'jog/ gang du tshogs pa'i rkyen mthong ba/ /'dren pa gsal bar gyur pa yin//
129b3(rgyud 'grel): blo dang ldan pas don dam la/ /brtags te grags pa nges par mthong/ /gzugs ni mig gis mi mthong zhing/ /yid kyis chos rnams mi rig pa/ /'di ni mchog tu bden pa ste/ /'jig rten gang gis kyang mi shes/ /dngos po spyod ba zhes bya ba
129b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang /bod kyi lots+tsha ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
129b5(rgyud 'grel): dge'o/ /*/ /'phags pa klu grub zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed lnga'i 'grel pa bzhugs so// */ /slob dpon klu grub snying po'i zhal snga nas/ /re ba'i dpe ni ser skya 'dra/ /dogs pa'i? rgyal bu gzhon nu ste/ /gzhan du 'dzin pa smig rgyu chu/ /bdag
129b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin phung byed nyi zer gzugs/ /snang ba gnyis ldan ni tso'i bya/ /dor ba phrul ma 'khrul pa'i gzugs/ /lta bas nga rgyal chos kyi wa/ /sgom la der 'dzin a nu lta/ /spyod pas nga rgyal 'dzin na pa/ /dka' bas rlom sems bzang skyod bu/ /dbang gi bu grol
129b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod kos la/ /rtogs pas chog zer dpal gyi bu/ /bla ma bla bral bla med gang ga mo/ /bka' la skur 'debs kriSh+Na pa/ bde bas grub 'dod thangs bzangs krung/ /stong pas de bzhin gdol pa mdza' / /de rnams bral ba'i shes pa ni/ /nor bu rin chen thob pa 'dra
130a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon yul bar na ser khyim bdag pra mo ha dang/ ser skya mo gru spyan mo gnyis/ chu bo na rany+dza na'i 'gram ne'u sing spos ngang can du dus byas pa las/ mos nyin mtshan lnga zhig tu bsdad kyang 'ongs par ma gyur to//
130a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas yi mug ste ma'i drung du phyin pa dang/ mas smras pa/ kye bu mo mdangs rab tu zhum par gyur pa ci'i phyir/ zhes pa dang/ bu mos smras pa/ kye mtshan mo gnyis dang gnyis gsum par/ /khyim bdag gzhon nu la bsdad pas/ /yid gtungs
130a3(rgyud 'grel): pas ni yi chad gyur/ /zas dang bral ba lto ba ltogs/ zhes zer ba la/ mas 'bras chan pa na li gang byin pas/ myur du zos pas glo ba'i sul du song nas mgo 'khrugs so/ /de nas sman? pa bshes gnyen chen po la bltas pa dang/ 'di dag
130a4(rgyud 'grel): ni tshul ji lta bu yin zhes pa dang/ gong gi tshul bshad do/ /sman pas smras pa/ gang gis gang la re ba ni/ /zhi bar mi 'gyur ba der mi 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'phel ba ste/ /re ba med pas bde pa'i mchog/ 'di dag ni re bas 'phung bar
130a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba bstan pas ste/ re ba med par bya ba'i man dag ste dang po'o// 1 //sngon gyi dus na rgyal bu mgron bzang zhes bya ba zhig la/ yab thu ba'i stongs kyis/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur te/ kye rgyal bu sgo srungs la nan
130a6(rgyud 'grel): tan gyis shig khri gzhan la ma shor bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig/ zhes smras nas tshe'i dus byas par gyur to/ /de nas chos sbyin byed pa'i dus su bram ze mdun na 'gro rgyal po'i pho brang du byung ba la khri phrogs kyis dogs te langs nas sgo'i?
130a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba la phyin pa dang/ /nu bo 'gro bas rten pas khri phrogs so/ /de nas ser skya mas/ khyod 'o na 'bad par 'gyur ba ci'i phyir zhes pa dang/ rgyal po ni babs kyis smras pa/ bdag la yab kyis gdams pa bzhin/ /khri stan shor gyis dogs pa na/ /sgo'i bya
130b1(rgyud 'grel): ba la phyin pas/ /nu 'os bdag gis bde ba phrogs/ /zhes pa dang bram zes smras pa/ dogs pa dang bcas sems kyis bde mi rnyed/ /nyam pa dang bcas rtag tu bde mi 'gyur/ /gang la ngogs yod de 'jigs yod pa'i phyir/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis dogs
130b2(rgyud 'grel): pa spang par bya/ /dogs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag ste gnyis pa'o// 2 //sngon ri bya rkang la/ dge slong sog ma med kyi phyin pa dang/ rab tu skom gyis gdungs par gyur pa la/ smig rgyu zhig chu ru 'khrul te/ 'thung du phyin pa dang/ rab
130b3(rgyud 'grel): tu ngal bar gyur nas sngo'i ldum bu za zhing 'dug pa la drang srong rkang rmig gis smras pa/ bgrod bka' 'khor pa'i thang chen la/ /gzhan du btsal 'dod mi dag ni/ nyon mongs tho bas gdungs 'gyur te/ sgom pa smig rgyu'i chu 'tshol 'dra zhes so/ /de dag ni
130b4(rgyud 'grel): sgom bya srang par bya ba'i man ngag ste gsum pa'o// ? //sngon rgyal po brla skyes la/ btsun mo lnga brgya la bu stong yong de/ sras nam ga ru drang srong dpal dga' mo blangs te/ de gcig pu med pas rab tu gces par byas/ rgyal bu yang dag
130b5(rgyud 'grel): la ni gces pa med de/ bdag la ni sdug bsngal zug rdu cung zad tsam yang byung bar bdas pas/ bdag tshe'i dus byas na 'khor thamS cad 'phung bar 'gyur ro snyam sems so/ /de nas nang par zhig khrus byas te/ khang bzang gi rtse mor kha shar phyogs su bltas
130b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ nyi zer la mig cung zad mtsums? nas bsdad pa dang nyi zer gyi bya gyu la dur khrod byung bar mthong nas/ bdag la dri mas gos par 'gyur snyam nas bros pa dang/ khang bzang gi rtse mo nas lhung? ste/ che'o dus byas so/ /de nas dge bsnyen blo gros bzang pos
130b7(rgyud 'grel): smras pa/ bdag tu 'dzin pa ches pas sdug bsngal 'byung ba ste/ /bdag bde 'dod pas gzhan gyi gnod pa byung/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su dor byas nas/ /sems can kun kyang sman pa bzhin du bya/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag
131a1(rgyud 'grel): ste bzhi pa'o// 4 //sngon dze ta'i 'tshal du rgyal bu don thams cad grub pa dang/ bdud nag po lha sbyin gnyis bya ni tso'i lus gcig las/ mgo bo gnyis su gyes pa cig tu skyes par gyur to/ /de nas lhas
131a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi mgo bo gnyid log pa'i dus su/ /don grub kyis shing gi rtsa brlog pa dang/ sman ya smra dang/ dug ha la gnyis rnyed pa la/ bcud ni mnyam por phan/ ro ni bdag ? myang ngo/ zhes nas smad? chos pa dang/ bdud lta sbyin sman gyi sgregS pa byung
131a3(rgyud 'grel): ?/ /de nas rab tu khros pas lha sbyin byis dug pos pas gnyis ka 'bud par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de nyid mthong ba'i mkhas pa yis/ /sman lta bu'i bsod nams mi bslad zhing/ /dug lta mi mthun dor mi bya//
131a4(rgyud 'grel): blang dang dor bas 'phung bar 'gyur/ /blang dor dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag ste lnga pa'o// 5 //sngon grong khyer ser skyar bram ze nyi ma sbyin zhes bya ba la/ rims nang sel bar nus pa'o/ nor bu chen po mu rig la ba zhes bya ba yod de/
131a5(rgyud 'grel): khyim bdag de la khyim thab gnyis yod pa las/ gnyis ka la bu med par gyur nas/ grong khyer bde ba can du khyim bdag mo sa man ta zhes bya ba dang/ 'dod pa'i dus btab nas phyin pa dang/ sngar gyi khyim bdag mo gnyis phyi bzhin du byung bar gyur to//
131a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas shing sdong po rul ba gcig gi khong du gab po/ /de nas khyim thab gnyis phyir log pa dang/ khyim thab mos man ta dang phrad nas nyal po byas pa dang/ khyim bdag gi mgo'i cod pan la gser gyi thur ma gnyis gyen du 'greng pa la/ mig yor gyi mi
131a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su 'khrul te bram ze la smras pa/ kye bzhin bzang po skol ni mi gnyis kyis nye ba nyid du non nas gda' o/ /zhes pa dang bram ze la smras pa/ de ni da'i khyim bdag mo gnyis lags te/ 'o skol gyi spyod lam rgyal po la smras ma nges par chad pa gcod?
131b1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur bas sa phyogs gzhan zhig tu bros la gshegs so zhes na/ na dpe'i tshal du phyin pa dang/ thung mar yin pa do shes te/ sa man ta rab tu 'khrul pas 'gyed pas smras pa dang/ /khyim bdag mos man tas blu blangs pa/ 'o skol mi yis
131b2(rgyud 'grel): skrag nas bros pa dang/ 'khor ba dor bar 'dod na sgrub pa 'dis/ dang po bzhi stong pa nyid nas sdug bsngal byung ste/ gnyis med la gnyis su brtags pas gdungs par 'gyur/ /blang dor dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag ste drug pa'o// ? //
131b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon mi yul ma ga ta chos ma kau rim zhes bya ba grong khyer gyi mdza' i spyil po zhig na/ ngur smrig gi tshos blug pa'i bur snod cig gi nang du kha shing los gcang de/ /mo rang gi me tog thur phyin pa dang/ /dud khrod kyi wa gcig gis tshos kyi steng du
131b4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pas sdib ste/ lus chos kyi mdog gis spangs so/ /dur khrod tu phyin pa dang/ spyad ki dang phrad nas/ kye cha zhe mchog tu gyur pa khyed su yin zhes pa la/ /mo na re bdag ni lha'i ri dags shar na zhas bya ba yin te/ lus dri dang mdog tu ldan pa'o
131b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas dom dang stag dang sbre'u dang/ seng ge rnams la spyad kis ched du brjod pa kun kyang 'khor bar gyur to/ /de nas zla brgyas pa nya'i dus su ma'i drung du phyin te/ da ni mchog go/ bla na med pa'o// phul lo/ /ri dags kyi rje mor byung pa'o/ /zhes
131b6(rgyud 'grel): pa las mas smras? pa/ kye bu mo tshad pa'i chu las khrus byas nas/ /sman pa'i sa la gnas na bde/ rgyud ngan pags pas nga rgyal pa/ /yun du 'grogs na 'phrung bar des/ zhes brjod pa la/ bags pa'i nga rgyal stong du ma btub po/ /de nas log
131b7(rgyud 'grel): steg can zan gyi tshogs su phyin pa dang yang gis skad ston pas war gyur cig/ /seng ge'i skad ston pas brgyal lo/ /de nas ri dags can zan thams cad kyi spu tshom pa re btogs te rtug pa dang bsres so/ /de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis tshigs su
132a1(rgyud 'grel): bcad de smras pa/ sems kyis stobs kyis mi 'gro zhing/ pags pas nga rgyal 'gro byed pa/ /rgyun tu bde bar ma gyur te/ /spu dang bral bas wa nyid phung/ /bde bas 'bras bu sgrubs pa la/ /zhe 'dod med pas mi 'gro zhing/
132a2(rgyud 'grel): grub mdza' nga rgyal 'gro byed pa/ /wa bzhin thal bar brlag par 'gyur/ /rang gi lta ba nga rgyal ba dang bral bar bya ba ste bdun pa'o// 7 //sngon ko sa la'i yul du/ dge slong ya shu ha zhes bya ba cig gis/ tshigs drug 'gegs
132a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsam gtan byas pa las rlung 'byung 'jug 'pho ba dang bral bas lo lnga brgya snyed thub bo/ /de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dga' sbyangs mdangs kyis/ smras pa/ dge slong sems kyis sems la ltos/ /shes rab pha rol phyin drug
132a4(rgyud 'grel): pas bstan pa la skur pa btab nas/ sngar gyi 'du shes med pa la zhen pas/ lha tshe ring por skyes so/ /de nas yang skye ba dran pas bstan pa la bskur pa btab pa dang/ dngos su sas thobs phye nas/ mnar med pa'i dmyal bar seng//
132a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni sgom pa dmigs pa dang bral bar bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// 8? //sdon bram ze'i 'dzin pa zhes bya ba bsil khong na nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ rigs kyi bu gtsang ma'i spyod pa long zhig/ de las byang chub mchog tu skyed nas/ shes rab dang
132a6(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni mchog ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming tsam yang mi grob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes rjod kyang mngon par zhen pa dang ma bral lo/ /de bdud dga' ra ba dbang phyug
132b1(rgyud 'grel): gis byin gyis brlabs nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bde ba thob ste/ slar ngan song du lhung ngo/ /spyod pa'i zhen pa dang bral bar bya ba ste dgu pa'o// ? //sngon rgyal po bzang skyong bya ba'i bu mos/ dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo zhes bya ba la/ lus ngag
132b2(rgyud 'grel): yid gsum longs spyod kyi sgo nas/ lo drug tu bsnyen bkur byas so/ /tshogs kyi lam rtags bcu gsum dang ldan pa'i spyod pa bcu phrag gnyis su byas so/ /dus ji snyed du thos pa yang de snyed du sbyangs pa las/ dge slong ma dpal mo zhes bya bas
132b3(rgyud 'grel): smras pa/ kye bdag gis 'khor pa thams cad kyi snying po/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid khyod la sbyin gyi/ khyod 'khor ba'i dogs pa las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /zhes pa dang/ bu mos smras pa/ kye dge slong ma snga ma'i dga' ba de rnams
132b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'bras bu mchog go/ de las mchog tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu ni mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ /kho mi mi 'dod do/ /zhes pa dang/ dpal mos smras pa/ chos kyi gsang nyid mi shes par/ /bya dka' byas bas 'bras 'dod pa/ /rgyal po bdag gi pho nya bzhin/
132b5(rgyud 'grel): dka' bas mang yang don chung 'gyur/ /dka' bas mang po byas pa chog par 'dzin pa dang bar bya ba ste bcu pa'o// 10 //dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las/ dpal mchog dang po dbang las 'byung/ /lus ngag yid kyi tha ba dag/ dbang
132b6(rgyud 'grel): gis rab tu smin byas na/ /dpal mchog dang po thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la rgyal po ko sa las mthong nas/ /rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi la/ dbang lan bcu bdun du byas so/ /de nas rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi/ kyai rgyal po dam pa ni sa bon lta bu'o/ /rgyan
132b7(rgyud 'grel): du goms pa ni chu lud kyis myu gu skyed pa lta bu'o/ /spyod? ba ni lo tog 'os su rung bar byed pa lta bu'o/ /des na rgyal po chen po sgom pa goms par bya bar rigs so/ /zhes brjod kyang/ sngar gyi lung gi nges par blo sgyur du ma btub po/ /der mkha' 'gro 
133a1(rgyud 'grel): mas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ dbang gis ye shes mtshon byas shing/ /'os su rung bar byar 'dod kyang/ /goms bral chu shing 'bras bu ltar/ /lan cig skyed na zad 'gyur nyid/ ces pa'i phyir na goms par bya'o/ /dbang
133a2(rgyud 'grel): kho nas chog par 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// 11 //dpal DoM b+hi he ru ka'i slob ma/ shi ri sid+hi zhes bya ba zhig gis/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rnal 'byor pa pho mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo tshogs pa'i dus su smras?
133a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ chos rnams stong par rtags pa yis/ /de yi mdza' la sbom du med/ /gal te sgom na dman 'gyur te/ /dper na rgyal po rgyal por ni/ /slar yang 'dod pa med pa bzhin/ /bud+d+ha thams cad stong nyid du/ /gcig par rtogs na sgom mi dgos
133a4(rgyud 'grel): sbom sogs sbyin sreg thal ba 'dra/ zhes pa/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis/ kye bud+d+ha'i gsang ba'i yongs su 'phrogs par byed pa'i log sred can khyod nyon cig/ tshes gcig gi zla ba mthong bas/ nya gang ba yin nam/ byas pa nas tsas ma
133a5(rgyud 'grel): thogs nas stobs rdzogs pa nyid dam/ sa bon btab pa nyid nas 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa nyid dam/ rgya mtsho nang gi nor bu mthong bas lag tu yengs pa nyid dam/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis sems can gyi don nus pa nyid dam/ zas mthong
133a6(rgyud 'grel): ba tsam gyis bkres pa gsos pa nyid dam/ mi rigs pa'i phyir/ rtogs pa'i gtso bo la gags goms pa'i 'khor gyis mnyes par bya na/ zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /rtogs pas chog par 'dzin pa ni srun pa'o/ /phyi
133a7(rgyud 'grel): rol pa'o/ /bdud kyis mngon sum du byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /rang nyid 'thung bar byas pa'o/ /zhes nas bsad de mkha' 'gro ma'i longs spyod du byas so/ /rtogs pas chog par 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya bas te/ bcu gnyis pa'o// 12 //rgyal bo d+harmA
133b1(rgyud 'grel): pA? ba'i bumo/ /gang gA mo bya ba zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo rgyud thams cad bltas pa las/ rtogs pa ji lta ba skyes te bsgyoms so/ /de nas byang chub chen po la srin po'i mchod pa'i nub mo/ /rnal 'byor pa thams cad tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i
133b2(rgyud 'grel): sar gang gAs phyin pa dang/ rnal 'byor pas/ thams cad mkha' 'gro mas byin gyis brlabs nas/ lus 'degs so/ /dag gis spro ba byas so/ /yid kyis kun tu zhe sdang bar byas so/ de nas bang gA mo'i sngar gyi rtogs pa med par gyur nas/ rnal
133b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa rnams la smras pa/ kye bdag gis 'os su ma rung ba ci byas pa/ khyed kyis bshad du gsol zhes pa dang/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gsung mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ /bla ma las ni dngos grub rnyed/ /rig ma las ni bde ba 'byung/ /bla ma bral
133b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub ni/ /khri phrag 'bad kyang thob mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyis dngos grub 'byung byed pa/ /dug dang bcas pa'i zas bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro kun gyi 'tshe ba dang/ /bar chad sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya bas dad par byas so/ /bla ma la ma bltos
133b5(rgyud 'grel): pa spang bar bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// 13 //karna'i rgyal po'i bu srid sna zhes bya bas/ dbu ma mchog tu byas te/ dka' dang bstan bcos thams cad skur pa btab pa dang/ byang phyogs kyi gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas/ smyo bar gyur te/ de nas yab
133b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal pos sngags mkhan rnams la zhu ba byas te/ bgegs bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas pa dang/ dpal nA ro pa'i zhal nas/ sangs rgyas dgongs pa dpag bsam shing lta bu'i gsung dag la/ sems can blo yis theg pa sna tshogs byas/ /phyogs mdo phyogs
133b7(rgyud 'grel): su 'dzin pa'i bdud chen gyis/ /'di dang ma 'ongs gnyis kar bslu bar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i blo la thams cad bden pa nyid/ /don dam yul du gang yang yong ma yin/ /de nyid rnal 'byor sems su dbyer mi phyed/ /bka' la skur pa 'debs pa dmyal ba'i
134a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas su 'gro/ /de'i phyir bka' mdza' dag la skur pa mi bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o// 14 //rgyal po thang bzang glu zhes bya ba zhing/ dpal kam pa la la dbang slangs te/ u rgyan gyi dur khrod na/ bde ba bsgom
134a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'dug pa las/ dur khrod kyi yi dags thams cad kyis/ bar du gcod cing sems rab tu yongs so/ /de rnal 'byor ma legs smin kar la zhus pa dang/ de yis smras pa/ las kyi phyag rgya bde ba'i gru/ /stong pa'i skam sa rnyed nas ci byar yod/ /bcos ma'i bde la
134a3(rgyud 'grel): bcos ? yid zhen na/ /'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal bar nus ma yin zhes pa/ lha lcam la rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod par byas so/ /bde ba la zhen pa spang bar bya ba ste/ bcwa? lnga pa'o// 15 //gdol pa dza zhes bya ba zhig
134a4(rgyud 'grel): gis/ slob dpon chen po ku ku ri pa la brten te/ don dam sems la dmigs pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa phyogs gcig pa bsgom pa las/ chos thams cad brten med du zhen par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yul dzA landa rar/ rims nad kyis ni/ phal cher
134a5(rgyud 'grel): tshe'i dus byas so/ /lo tog thams cad ser bas bcoms so/ /lo lngar char ma bab nas/ bram ze gsang tshib mkhan la dris pa dang/ sa phyogs 'di ni mi nang pa sangs rgyas pa la gnas thas/ phyi rol gyi grub mdza' gsang bar smra ba la/ phyogs
134a6(rgyud 'grel): te gnas pas/ bkra mi shis pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'jig rten 'di la gzhan 'phung zhing/ ma 'ongs pa la rang phung bar byed do/ /zhes pa dang/ dpal ku ku ri pas thos te/ gdol pa dza'i byung du byon nas smras pa/ dang po dngos po'i chos rnams ni /stong
134a7(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyis bzlog par bya/ /stong pa nyid la zhen ches nas/ /dngos 'dzin pas kyang 'phung bar gyur/ /dug sbrul shin dar ya kan/ /dug la sngags btab sman gyi mchog/ gang la rgyas btab bde 'gyur phyir/ /zhen pa mthong la gnyis med bsgoms/
134b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes nas dbang gsum pa mdzad do/ /de ltar slob dpon klu sgrub kyis 'das pa'i dpe bcu brjod pas /mdo rgyud dang 'thun pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rig par bya'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dpe drug brjod pas grub pa thob pa dang mthun pa'i phyir thams
134b2(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen par rig par bya'o/ /sbyon bcu drug dang bral ba'i shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa yin pa'i phyir/ nor bu rin po che dang 'dra'o/ /slob dpon klu grub snying po'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa'i tshogs su bcad pa phyed dang lnga zhes bya ba/ de'i
134b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grel pa rdzogs so// //dpal gyi ril mnga' bdag chen pos/ rje btsun ri khrod kyis gnang pa'o/ /des rje btsun ka ro pa la brgyud do/ /des rje btsun nA ro pa la brgyud do// // */ /rnam par mi rtog pa rab tu byed pa Arya de bas
134b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa bzhugs/ / */ /rgya gar skad du/ ni dri kalba pra ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis/ /dngos po gang dang gang brtags pa/ /yongs
134b5(rgyud 'grel): su brtags pa 'di nyid dag/ rang bzhin yod min pa kho na/ /slob dpon klu sgrub zhal snga yi/ /lam las phyi rol song gyur cing/ /legs par mngon pa'i thabs med pa'i/ /kun rdzob de nyid bden pa las/ /nyams pas thar pa'i dngos grub ni/ /yod
134b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin de dag nyams/ /gang zhig las las byung ba yi/ /rnam par rtog pa gang ci 'ang rung/ /de dag spangs pa'i rang bzhin las/ /mya ngan 'das pa gzhan na ni/ /yod min yul ni gang du yang/ /rnam par mi sems bdag nyid do/ /gang yang dga' 
134b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sems la bde ba 'byung gyur cing/ /nyams su myong ba'i sar phyin pa/ /de yang kun tu rtog pa tsam/ /gang de 'dod chags bral ba yi/ /rang gi ngo bo de dag dang/ /gnyis po gang yin pa de ni/ srid pa'i rgyu yi mchog yin no/ /dngos po
135a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos po las mi skye/ dngos po dngos med las kyang min/ /dngos po skye ba rtag tu spang/ /dngos 'khrul nam mkha' i me tog bzhin/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun/ /skye ba mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid/ /rkyen ni mkhang
135a2(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam kun des/ /srid par gyur pa bden pa yin/ /rgyu med 'bras bu med gyur cing/ /las kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin/ /'jig rten pa med 'jig rten med/ /mi bden par gyur chos 'di kun/ /ma skyes pas ni dngos pa gang/ /ji ltar gzhan las
135a3(rgyud 'grel): shes par gyur/ /mo gsham bu yi bu yang ni/ /de ltar shes par mi nus so/ /'jig rten bzong nas ma skyes te/ gang gis kyang ni sprul pa med/ /don med 'khrul pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin no/ /rnam rtog las gang 'jig
135a4(rgyud 'grel): rten 'byung/ /rnam rtog sems las byung ba ste/ /gang phyir lus las sems byung pas/ /de phyir lus la rnam par brtag/ gzugs stong tshor ba rang bzhin med/ /'du shes med cing 'du byed kyi/ /dngos po yod pa ma yin te/ /rang rig gsal
135a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdag nyid do/ /de la shes dang shes bya med/ /sems dang sems las byung ba med/ /'byung po med de de yi phyir/ /rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin no/ /de ni sems min lus kyang min/ /khams rnams ma yin chos kyang min/ /gnyis su med pa'i lam
135a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'di/ /de nyid rig pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /dmigs pa med pa'i chos 'di kun/ /dmigs pa med las rab tu grol/ /dmigs med blo yi dang byas na/ /dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen
135a7(rgyud 'grel): pa arya? de ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po ma hA kA ru Na dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa sarba nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa zhes bya ba/
135b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu zad pas ni 'dam gyi pad+ma skams/ /sbrang rtsi bros pas gar sod cha yang med/ /rtsa ba lo ma sdong po me yi sbyor bas zad/ /nag po na re dbang po'i bzhad rgad la ni ltos/ /za zhing 'thung dang gnas nas yal ga bcag
135b2(rgyud 'grel): nas song/ /kye 'di ni bdag gi la ni gtum mo lta bu yin/ /rgyun gyi bu mo lta bus pad+ma bsregs/ /yon tan brgya ni skyon gcig gis ni zad par byas/ /rgya mtsho zad pas pad+ma rnams kyang skams/ /de tshe sgo bcu las ni du ba byung/ /'jig rten pa ni nag
135b3(rgyud 'grel): po med ces zer/ /nag po theg chen zab mo'i nags na gnas/ /sems ni stong zhing gnyug ma'i dang du rdzogs/ /phung po gzhad gang gyur kyang 'phyod pa med/ /'o ma'i nang na mar yod pa ni mi mthong bzhin/ /'dod pa yod 'jig rten pas ni ma mthong
135b4(rgyud 'grel): ngo/ /'jig rten 'tsho ba'am ni 'chi ba gang yang med/ /'di lta'i longs spyod nag po rnal 'byor pa/ /pad+ma bzhin du lus cha skams gyur kyang/ /nag po ci yi phyir na shi zhes bya/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa'i slob dpon chen po nag pos mdzad pa'i tshigs su
135b5(rgyud 'grel): bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shi bai ro tsa na badzras bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ do ha ko ? bod skad du/ do ha mdzod/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po khams dang skye mched
135b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang po rnams/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las/ /ma lus de las byung zhing de ru thim/ /lhan skyes dngos dang dngos med gtam mi 'dri/ /stong pa snying rje de ru ro mnyam 'dod/ /yid la ma byed gnyug ma'i rang bzhin la/ /brdzun pa rnams kyis skur pa ma
135b7(rgyud 'grel): 'debs shig/ rang dbang yod pas rang nyid 'ching ma byed/ sems la mya ngan 'das pa rgyab la sod/ /khams gsum stong pa gos pa med la 'jug/ sems ni mkha' 'dra mnyam pa'i bde bar zhugs/ /dbang po yul rnams skad cig tsam ni der ma mthor?
136a1(rgyud 'grel): thog ma spangs shing 'di ru tha ma spangs/ /bla ma mchog gi zhabs kyis gnyis med bstan/ /sems ni gang du zhi gyur pa/ /der ni rlung yang thim par 'gyur/ /rang rig pa yi de nyid 'bras bu ni/ /su zhig la ni gang
136a2(rgyud 'grel): gis ji ltar bstan/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams kyi spyod yul min/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de nyid bgrod bya min/ /gang la bla ma'i zhabs ni mnyes pa yi/ /kye ho gang zag de yi spyod yul min/ /rang rig de nyid 'bras bur ni/ /tai
136a3(rgyud 'grel): lo pa yis de skad bstan pa yin/ /yid kyi spyod yul du ni gang gyur pa/ /de ni don dam ma yin no/ /de nyid bla ma'i gsungs gis bstan par bya ba min/ /des na slob mas go pa lta yin no/ /lhan skyes 'bras bu bdud rtsi'i ro/ /de nyid su zhig la ni ci zhig
136a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /gang du yin ni zhi ba dang/ /yid dang rlung gnyis mnyam par zhu/ /der ni rnam kun spangs pa la/ /khams gsum de ru gnas pa yin/ /rmongs pa gnyug ma'i rang bzhin shes par gyis/ /de cho gti mug dra ba ma lus chad par 'gyur/

136b1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi rang bzhin la/ /gang zhig rang rig shes par bya/ /bdag nyid 'gro ba bdag nyid sangs rgyas te/ /bdag nyid dri ma med cing bdag nyid yid la mi byed pa/ /de la 'gro ba med cing gos ma med/ /yid ni rje btsun nam mkha' rje btsun ma/ /nyin
136b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan du ni gar byed lhan cig skyes la rol/ /skye dang 'chi ba dag las grol bar 'gyur/ /gnyug ma'i yid la rgyun du gnas par gyis/ /'bab stegs dka' thub nags la ma brten cig/ khrus dang gtsang sbras bde ba mi rnyed do/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang
136b3(rgyud 'grel): phyug lha/ /byang chub yod bzhin gsum la bkur mi bya/ /lha rnams ma mchod 'bab stegs ma 'gro zhig/ lha rnams mchod kyang thar pa thob mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par mi rtog sams kyis sangs rgyas mchod par gyis/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das la gnas

136b5(rgyud 'grel): zos kyang rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod yon gyis ni 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro/ /kye'o rnal 'byor pas ni las la skur mi 'debs/ /skad cig bzhi dang 'ga' ba bzhi ru de ru sod/ /skad cig dga' ba de yi bye brag shes par gyis/ mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid
136b6(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa shes par gyis/ /kye'o mchog dang dga' bral 'di ni dpyad par bya/ /bla ma mchog gi zhabs la gus par gyis la legs par long/ /gang zhig dga' ba mchog dang dga' bral gyis/ /kye'o skad cig der ni lhan skyes rtogs
136b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /yon tan rin chen dpral ba'i glad rgyas gzhag bya ste/ /'dod pa mo yi ze 'bru las ni 'di nyid shes par bya/ /skad cig bye brag de ru lhan skyes par shes pa/ /de ni tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor par brjod do/ /thog ma tha ma gzung ba 
137a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa spangs/ /bla ma mchog gi zhabs kyis gnyis med bstan/ /mi g.yo dri med rnam par rtog pa med/ /shar ba nub pa spangs pa 'di ni snying po yin/ /'di ni mya ngan 'das par rab tu brjod/ /yid kyi nga rgyal gang du
137a2(rgyud 'grel): chad gyur pa/ /skyon dang yon tan spungs pa 'di ni don dam mo/ /rang rig la ni gang yang med/ /sems dang sems med rtag tu spongs/ /kye'o lhan cig pa'i rang bzhin du ni gnas par bya/ /skye ba med cing 'chi ba med/ /rtsa ba med cing
137a3(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo med/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med/ /gang du yang ni mi gnas so/ /bA? ma'i man ngag gis ni snying la chud/ /kha dog ljongs? shing rigs med pa/ /snang ba thams cad de la rdzogs/ /yid ni gsod la sems ni rtsa ba med par gyis/ /sems
137a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi lhag ma zug rngu thong/ /'di ru sku bzhi phyag rgya bzhi/ /khams gsum ma lus de tshe dag bdag dang 'gro ba khams gsum stong/ /dri ma med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa la/ /dge dang mi dge gang yang med/ /yid ni gang du 'gro 'dod pa/ /de la

137b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam bya ba bsam gtan dkyil 'khor phyag rgya med/ /de rnams bsgoms pas rnam par dag mi 'gyur/ /lta stangs mchings dang las rnams byed pa dang/ /sgo rnams dgag par bya ba ma yin no/ /des ni lhan cig skyes pa'i lam mi shes
137b2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig srog dang rtsol ba gang pa can dang ni/ /bum pa can gyi rlung la bstod byed pa/ /des ni bdag nyid nges par slu bar byed/ /gang gis lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du ni/ /gtum mi?  spor bar byed cing nan tan gyis/ /sgo bcu la ni sgo
137b3(rgyud 'grel): lcags 'jug par byang/ /gang zhig spyi bor pad+ma dkar po bsgom/ /rmongs pa des ni dang po'i thar pa mi rnyed do/ /dril can rkan dang sna rtser bsam byed dang/ /steng dang 'og dang bsdoms nas shing btsugs dang/ /mgrin pa'i phugs su 'od zer 'bar
137b4(rgyud 'grel): byed dang/ /dpral bar zla ba rtag tu sgom byed pa/ /nam mkha' i rtse mor mi g.yo'i sna rtser bsgom/ /la la 'og tu pad+ma rdo rje lta/ /la la dbu rgyan 'ching zhing 'degs par byed/ /la la tshangs pa'i gnas gzhi sgom par byed/ /la la rang grib stong par

137b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni 'gul zhing 'gul zhing re la gnas/ /rang gis stong pa snying rje byed par rtsom/ /des ni srid pa spo thabs mi shes so/ /stong pa snying rje rtogs zhes zer zhing gnas/ /dpal ldan bde chen gtam yang me 'dri'o/ /la la dbang phyug u
138a1(rgyud 'grel): ma re la gnas/ /bdag nyid srid pa'i 'ching ba'i zhags pas bcings/ /la la khu ba khrag dang rnam snang za/ /bya rog bya rgod bzhin du bdag nyid 'khol/ /la la gnas gsum skad cig gsum du bsgom/ /la la snying ga'i pad+ma 'khor lo
138a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chang/ /la la hUM phaT zer zhing phreng ba 'grang/ /byol song rnams ni 'khrul pa rgyun mi 'chad/ /dbang dang dbang bskur mang po gsungs pa rnams/ /bla ma rnams la slob mas len par byed/ /de nas brtsams shing brtsams shing slob ma rnams la 'chad//
138a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur gyi ni phyogs kyang ma mthong ngo/ /la las gser 'gyur rtsi ni lta byed pas/ /des ni khyim pa rnams ni dbul por byas/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mi bde ba la sbyar/ /nags la skyes pa'i rtswa dang shing rnams dang/ /shing lo me tog rnams kyis skyid
138a4(rgyud 'grel): ma bstan/ /dus su bsam gtan 'jig rten pa rnams byed/ /des ni mchog gi thar pa mi shes so/ /cal col mang pos smras pas ci zhig bya/ /ji ltar smras pa de dag thams cad brdzun/ /gdams ngag pa rnams gsal po'i gnas lugs nyon/ /gang gis
138a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal bor thar pa grol brnyed/ /sems ni g.yo zhing smyon pa lta bur mthong/ /skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa gsum po rtogs par gyis/ /mgul rgyan dang ni phyag rgya ma lus mthong/ /des ni mgon po ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten pa ni yi ge rnams
138a6(rgyud 'grel): la gtod/ /yi ge med pa de ni snying la mchud do/ /gdams ngag pa rnams nyon cig ngas ni bshad par bya/ /khams gsum bor nas dpal ldan theg pa che/ /dang po'i mgon po la ni dge dang mi dge med/ /ma lus khyad cing bde chen stong pa nyid/ /byed pa 'phrog pa rang
138a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid spyan ras gzigs/ /zad pa med cing gzhan du song ba med/ /de ni mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyis ni ting 'dzin skyes byas kyang/ /dang po'i mgon po de ni ma mthong ngo/ /de lta'i sems ni snying la ma chud do/ /de la lus dang ngag dang yid med de/ /dpa' 
138b1(rgyud 'grel): bo dri med de ni nam mkhar thim/ /? dra ba yi sems can don du byas/ /don dam 'di ni gdams ngag pa rnams nyon/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal bairU pas mdzad pa'i tshig rkang brgyad cu ba rdzogs so// //yul lho phyogs ko sA lar sku
138b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sh+rI bai ro tsa na badzra'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du mdzad nas gsungs pa'o// // * / /do ? mdzad rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi birU pas mdzad pa 'thugs so// /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ do ha koSha nA ma/ bod skad du/
138b3(rgyud 'grel): do he mdzod ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o/ /srid dang zhi ba phyag rgya chen po ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mkha' ltar rnam par dag/ mtshon bya'i gnas lugs med par tha snyad tshig la mchad/ /rang

143a1(rgyud 'grel): yang longs sku las dbang bzhi bzhi bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa'i lam nas/ /longs sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed pa/ dag dag pa gsang ba'i dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags dbang po
143a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang dangs ma'i rlung lnga la mnga' brnyes/ nus pa lnga dang lha stangs rnams la thogs pa med/ lha ga'i dkyil 'khor du rigs drug gis sa bon mthong/ /sa bco drug la mnga' brnyes/ sems can rnams kyi skad du chos ston cing chos

143a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga gar bdu mthong na sangs rgyas rnams gzhan don mdzad pa mthong/ sbrul pa bde chen thig le 'du ba mthong/ sangs rgyas rnams 'og min gyi gnas na zab mo la bzhugs pa mthong/ /lte ba sprul bar bdud rtsi lnga dang rlung lnga 'dus pa
143b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong na/ longs sku'i rigs lnga yum gyi b+ha ga na bzhugs nas skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' la gsang ba sgrogs pa mthong/ phyag rgya ma'i dangs ma'i dangs ma mthong na mngon shes la thogs pa med /rtsa yig rnams su dangs ma 'drongs na rdzu 'phrul
143b2(rgyud 'grel): la thogs pa med/ de nyid slar spos na sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran/ nang rtags rlung sor bcu gnyis 'gags/ phyi rtags spyi gtsug h+ril thig les brtan/ sa bcu gnyis so// //yang dbang bzhi bzhi mthar phyin gyi lam nas mthar thug/?
143b3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'drel mthar thug 'da' ba rje'i? rlabs kyi lam gyis phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub rig ma'i skyes bu /srid pa rnam par dag pa'i lam/ ngo bo nyid kyi sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed pa/ bzhi pa lus ngag yid kyi dbang mthar phyin/
143b4(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid kyi rtags 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni/ rnam shes brgyad 'dag kar 'bras bu gnyis 'thob ste/ sa chen 'di ni dga' zhing rangs la mgu/ de rnam pa drug du g.yo/ bdud gnas su sgra grag /phyag rgya ma'i gnas
143b5(rgyud 'grel): su khams gsum mthong/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams ring nas 'du/ ha ri ma la sogs pa dbang phyug gi don brgyad 'char/ nang rtags srog rtsol a ba d+hu tIr 'jug /phyi rtags gtsug tor phyed thig las brtan/ sa phye dang bcu gsum mo// //
143b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa yid kyi dbang mthar phyin /de kho na nyid kyi rtags 'bras bu'i phyogs gcig 'thob ste/ 'bigs byed gzhon nu'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings /byang chub sems kyis ni 'bigs/ 'bras bu lngas sku'i zhing khams rab bkram la sogs pa
143b7(rgyud 'grel): sgul ba la sogs pa nus/ sa bcu gsum thob kar sa bcu ma la sogs pa yid kyis bkug ste /slob dpon dus gsum bde bar gshegs bcud 'dus yin/ /yi dam lha dang bla ma dbyer med la/ /b+ha kar dngos grub len pa'i rten 'brel gyis//
144a1(rgyud 'grel): srid pa rnam par dag pa'i lam/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par byed pa/ 'bras bu longs sku'i zhing khams ma lus pa la sogs pa bskul ba la sogs pa nus/ nang rtags srog rtsol a/
144a2(rgyud 'grel): ba d+hu tir 'gags/ phyi rtags gtsug tor h+ril thig les brtan/ /phyi nang gi rten 'brel 'gros bzhi thim pa rnams kyis sgom nyams skyon yod med phyed pa sa bcu gsum pa'o// //thams cad mkhyen to/ /bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin
144a3(rgyud 'grel): sar rten 'brel 'grig pa lhar snang 'tshad rgya kar 'khor tshom bu cig 'tshang rgya'o/ /gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa ni/ /rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i dbang/ /rtogs pas brtags pas rtog med rtogs/ /ye shes snang ba re bzhin no/ /lam zab
144a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma/ dam tshig lus so sor bshags pa'i 'gog pa/ lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag dang man ngag du bcas pa rdzogs so// //sa ma pa tha mi ti/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mu tra u ba de sha/
144a5(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag/ dpal lhan cig skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag rgya chen po bstan du med gyur kyang/ /dka' ba spyod cing bla ma la gus pa'i/ /sdug bsngal bzod ldan blo ldan nA ro pa/ /skal ldan khyod kyi snying la
144a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar byas/ /kye'o 'jig rten chos la legs ltos dang/ /rtag mi thub ste rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra/ /rmi lam sgyu ma don la yod ma yin/ des na skyo bskyed 'jig rten bya ba mthong/ /'khor g.yogs chags sdang nye 'brel kun spongs la/ /gcig
144a7(rgyud 'grel): bu nags? 'dag ri khrod dgon par bsgoms/ /bsgom du med pa'i ngang la gnas par gyis thob med thob na phyag rgya chen po thog /'khor ba'i chos 'di don med chags sdang rgyu/ /byas chos snying po med pas don dam snying po ltos/ /blo yi chos kyis//
144b1(rgyud 'grel): blo 'das don mi mthong/ /byas pa'i chos kyis byar med don mi rnyed/ /blo 'das byar med don de thob 'dod na/ /rang sems rtsad chod rig pa gcer bur zhog /rtog pa dri ma'i chu de dangs su chug/ snang ba dgag bsgrub mi bya rang sor zhog/ spong len med na
144b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen por grol/ /dper na ljon shing yal ga lo 'dab rgyas/ /rtsa bcad yal ga lo 'dab khri 'bum bskams/ /dper na bskal stong bsags pa'i mun pa yang/ /sgron me gcig gis mun pa'i tshogs rnams sel/ /de bzhin rang semS
144b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal skad cig gis/ /bskal par bsags pa'i sdig sgrib ma lus sel/ /blo dman skye bo don la mi gnas na/ /rlung gi gnad bzung rig pa bcud la bor/ /lta stangs dang ni sems 'dzin du ma yis/ /rig pa dang la mi gnas bar du bcun//
144b4(rgyud 'grel): dper na nam mkha' i dkyil ni brtag byas na/ /mdza' dang dbus su 'dzin pa 'gag par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sems kyis sems la brtag byas na/ /rnam rtog tshor 'gag sems kyi rang bzhin mthong/ /dper nas rlangs sprin ni nam mkhar dengs/ /gar yang
144b5(rgyud 'grel): song med gang yang gnas pa med/ /de bzhin sems las byung ba'i rtogs tshogs kyang/ /rang sems mthod pas rtog pa'i rba rlabs dengs/ /dper na nam mkha' kha dog dbyibs las 'das/ /dkar nags dag gis gos med 'gyur ba med/ /de bzhin rang
144b6(rgyud 'grel): sems 'od gsal kha dog dbyibs las 'das/ /dge sdig dkar gnag chos kyis gos mi 'gyur/ /dper na gsal dag nyi ma'i snying po de/ /bskal ba stong gi mun pas sgrib mi nus/ /de bzhin rang sems snying po 'od gsal de/ /bskal pa'i 'khor bas/
144b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrib par mi nus so/ /dper na nam mkha' stong pa rab brtags kyang/ /nam mkha' la ni 'di 'dra brjod du med/ /de bzhin rang sems 'od gsal brjod gyur kyang/ /brjod par 'di 'dra grub ces gdags gzhi med/ /dper na nam mkha' gang la gang gis brten 
145a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rang sems phyag chen rten yul med/ /ma bcos gnyug ma'i dang du glod las zhog/ bcings pa glod gyur grol bar the tsom med/ /de ltar sems kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra/ /chos rnams ma lus de ru ma 'dus med/ /lus kyi
145a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yo thod rnal mar zhog /dag gi smra brjod ma mang brag ca 'dra/ /yid la mi sems la zla'i chos la ltos/ /lus la snying po med pas sdug sdong 'dra/ /sems ni nam mkha' i dkyil ltar bsam yul 'das/ /de dang btang gzhag med par glong?
145a3(rgyud 'grel): las zhog/ sems la gtad so med na phyag chen yin/ /de la goms pas bla med byang chub 'thob/ /dmigs pa'i yul med sems kyi rang bzhin gsal/ /bgrod pa'i lam med sangs rgyas lam sna zin/ /bsgom med goms pas
145a4(rgyud 'grel): bla med byang chub 'thob/ /bzung 'dzin kun 'das lta ba'i rgyal po yin/ /bya brtsol med na spyod pa'i rgyal po yin/ /de dogs med na 'bras bu mngon du 'gyur/ /kun gzhi skye med bag chags sgrib g.yogs bral/ /mnyam rjes mi bya skye med sting?
145a5(rgyud 'grel): bor zhog/ snang ba rang snang blo yi chos rnams zad/ /mu mdza' yongs grol lta pa'i rgyal po yin/ /mu med gting yangs bsgom pa'i rgyal po mchog/ byar med rang gnas sbyod pa'i rgyal po mchog/ re med rang gnas 'bras bu'i rgyal po mchog/
145a6(rgyud 'grel): las ni dang po gcod dong chu dang 'dra/ /par nu? chu bo gang gla dal bus 'bab/ /tham chu bran ma bu phrad pa 'dra/ /sngags su smra dang pha rol phyin pa dang/ /'dul ba'i sde snod la sogs chos rnams dang/ /rang rang gzhung dang grub pa'i mdza' yis kyang//
145a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal phyag rgya chen po mthong mi 'gyur/ /yid la mi byed zhe 'dod kun dang bral/ /rang byung rang zhi chu yi rba rlabs dang 'dra/ /zhe 'dod byung bas 'od gsal ma mthong sgribs/ /rtogs pa bsrung sdom dam tshig don las nyams/ /mi gnas mi
145b1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs don las mi 'da' na/ /dam pa nyams len mun pa'i sgron me yin/ /zhe 'dod kun bral mdza' la mi gnas na/ /sde snod chos rnams ma lus mthong bar 'gyur/ /don 'dir gzhol na 'khor ba'i btson las thar/ /don 'dis mnyam gzhag
145b2(rgyud 'grel): ma lus sdig sgrib sreg /bstan pa'i sgron me zhes su bshad pa yin/ /don 'dir mi mos skye bo blun po rnams/ /'khor ba'i chu bos rtag tu khyer par zad/ /ngan song sdug bsngal mi bzod snying re rje/ /sdug bsngal thar 'dod bla ma mkhas pa
145b3(rgyud 'grel): bsten/ /byin brlabs zhugs pas dang sems grol bar 'gyur/ /las rgya bsten na bde stong ye shes 'char/ /thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs snyoms par zhugs/ /dal bar dbab cing dkyil bzlog dwang ba dang/ /gnas su bskyal dang
145b4(rgyud 'grel): lus la khyab par bya/ /de la zhen med bde stong ye shes 'char/ /tshe ring skra dkar med cing zla ltar rgyas/ /bkrag mdangs gsal zhing stobs kyang seng ge 'dra/ /thun mong dngos grub myur thob mchog la gzhol/ /phyag rgya chen po gnod kyi
145b5(rgyud 'grel): gdams pa 'di/ /'gro ba skal ldan snying la gnas par shog/ dpal te lo pas nA ro pa la chu bo gang ga'i 'gram du gsungs pa legs par rdzogs so// //*/ /bdud rtsi grub pa bzhugs so/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/
145b6(rgyud 'grel): a mri ta sid+d+hi mU la nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan gsum rab ldan dbu bcad sku mdog dmar/ /'chi ba'i 'jigs sel rnal 'byor pho mo yi/ /phyag rgya 'dzin cing b+hi ra ba
145b7(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin gyis/ /skyob mdzad phyag rgya'i zhabs la bdag 'dud do/ /rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa'i don/ /phyag rgya chen po rnam bshad bya/ /mi ni gang gis thos pa la/ /lha rnams kun gyis bkur sti mdzad/ /skye ba bye ba stong dag tu/ /legs
146a1(rgyud 'grel): las rgya chen rnam byas pas/ /de thob 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /pha rol tu ni rnal 'byor 'gro/ /g.yon pa'i rting pas bshad lam dgag/ g.yas pa cung zad brkyang byas la/ /'thib chen po la gong lag pas gzung/ /
146a2(rgyud 'grel): snying ga lkog mas mnan pa ni/ /sgo dgu dgag pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /de yi rtsa gsum dag la ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bsnun bar bya/ /'di ni las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa gcig par sems bsdu zhing/ /rlung rnams gcig tu bsdus bya ste/ rlung gi
146a3(rgyud 'grel): bsdam pa brtsam par bya/ /nyi zla gnyis ni gcig par bya/ /de ltar byas na rlung ni 'gag/ 'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya'o/ /bshad lam 'khor lo gyen du bzlog/ thig le sga bcas gyen du bslang/ /rtsa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yo/ /mchog
146a4(rgyud 'grel): gi rtse ni gyen du 'od/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgrubs par bya/ /goms pa brtan par gyur pa yis/ /rang gi me ni gsal ba'o/ /phyag rgya 'di yis thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nges par 'gro/ 'di
146a5(rgyud 'grel): ni kha sbyor sbyor ba ste/ /rtsa ba'i gdams par 'dod pa'o/ /'di ni rlung gi sbyor ba yin/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di bsgrub po/ /phyag rgya gnyis su shes par bya/ /ji bzhin bsdam pa'i cho ga shes/ /dza ni lha mo'i phyag rgya yin/ /ling ga'i phyag
146a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya lha yin no/ /pho dang mo yi sbyor ba las/ /phyi rol tu ni skye ba 'byung/ /ji bzhin sbyor ba 'di gnyis kyis/ /skye ba nang du bsod par bya/ /rtsa ni bud med gzugs can te/ /skyes pa med na 'bras bu med/ /phyag rgya che dang bsdams pa che/ /dbye ba
146a7(rgyud 'grel): med na 'bras bu med/ /rlung ni 'khor lo gcig tu bsdu/ /ji srid bsdam pa bzhin du bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gshig par bya/ /rang gi rlung sems gshig par bya/ /sbyor ba'i rim pas gshig par bya/ /rlung ni stobs dad ldan byas la/
146b1(rgyud 'grel): dbu ma'i sgo ru gzhug bya ste/ /'khor lo bzhi po rlung gis dbug/ lag gnyis ling ga'i phyag rgya bcad/ /de ni sa la gzhag nas su/ /rkang pa'i rtse mo sa la gzugs/ /brla ni brdab par bya ba yis/ /rlung gis rlung ni gsheg par bya/
146b2(rgyud 'grel): rlung gis rlung la bteg par bya/ /rlung gis rlung ni bsad par bya/ /rlung gis yongs la khyab pa yis/ /rlung gis dngos grub thams cad sbyin/ /rlung gis 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /des ni bdud rtsi grub par ni/ /bi rba nga yis yang dag
146b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /legs par bsdams pa lus kyi las/ /rdo rje rlung rtse bye ba yis/ /lhun po yi ni bar dag tu/ /dgug pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /tshangs sogs mdud pa bshig par bya/ /lhun po'i steng du lha rnams 'gro/ /lhun po dag
146b4(rgyud 'grel): ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /des ni thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams bsad/ /dang po yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /tshangs pa'i mdud pa bshig par bya/ /de nas dbang phyug mdud pa bshig/ de bshig nas ni biSh+Nu
146b5(rgyud 'grel): bshig/ de nas gti mug la sogs spangs/ /gtsug tor sgo ni sbas pa la/ /rlung gis sgo ni rnam par dbye/ /de ni 'bigs pa chen po'o/ /bsdam pa che dang 'bigs pa che/ /phyag rgya che ni gsum pa yin/ /'di ni gsang dbang gsum yin
146b6(rgyud 'grel): no/ /'di dag gis na sbyor grub grags/ /de nyid gsum ni gang rig pas/ /de ni 'jig rten gsum rig go/ gang gis 'di la gom byas na/ /thams cad kyis ni mnga' bdag 'gyur/ /gsang ba lha yi lha rnams dang/ /mi yi bdag po'i
146b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag por 'gyur/ /dbang bskur kun la dbang ba yin/ /thams cad ma lus lhag par 'gyur/ /des na lha rnams kun gyis 'bang/ /chos kyi phyag rgyar 'dod pa'o/ /phyag rgya che la goms par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di las thams cad 'byung/ /grub
147a1(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po 'byung ba yin/ /phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa/ /rnam gnyis de ni dam pa dang/ /'ching ba las ni grol ba dang/ /lus sems dag la bde ba 'byung/ /sems la gnas pa tsam gyis kyang/ /mngal du skye
147a2(rgyud 'grel): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dang po'i ming ni yi ge yin/ /sbyor ba ldan pa bshad par bya/ /dad dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yin/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nges par ni/ /phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa yin/ /phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya/ /rkang pa lag pa bsdom
147a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /rlung ni lan gsum 'thungs byas la/ /rtsa rnams thams cad 'then par bya/ /langs pas rtsa rnams gyen du phyogs/ /nad rnams thams cad bcom nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don yang rdzogs/ /ji ltar nam mkha' bar snang la//

147a5(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /lag pas 'byung ba lnga dag kyang las kyi bya bas mnye bya zhing/ /bsdams pa chen pos gnas pa yi/ /stobs kyis 'khor lo 'di yis ni/ /steng du lha yi 'jig rten skrag/ lag pa brkyang bskum 'di yis ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag
147a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang g.yo bar byed/ /rkang pa 'og tu brkyang ba yis/ /klu rnams thams cad skrag par byed/ /dbang po ngal zhing dub pa'i tshe/ /rtse cig sems kyi dang la gzhag/ bsdam pa'i sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /rlung gi lus ni 'dzin par 'gyur//
147a7(rgyud 'grel): bskam pa gnyis ni shes bya ste/ /'ji ltar thig le gnas pa dang/ /dzo ni b+ha d+ha'i lha mo yin/ /mgrin pa bsdams pa lha yin no/ /dgang ba can dang bun pa can/ /phyag rgya gzung ba rnam par bya/ /lha dang lha min kun la gsang//
147b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bsdam par bya ba yis/ /dbu ma'i sgo ru gtad par bya/ /lam gsum rnam par bkag byas la/ /rlung ni nang du gzung bar bya/ /srog ni rlung yang blan par bya/ /de ltar byas pas 'og tu 'bab/ /skad cig nyid la bsdam par bya/ /steng 'og rlung

147b3(rgyud 'grel): tu bsdoms par bya/ /zung 'jug lam gsum bsgom par bya/ /'di ltar mi yi lus la ni/ /grub pa'i lam ni rab gsal ba/ /nyams myong skye zhing lus rgyas 'gyur/ /rgas par yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ /rtsa rnams rgyun gyi 'bab pa dang/ /rtag par 'og
147b4(rgyud 'grel): tu 'gro ba de/ /bsdams pa chen po 'di yis ni/ /rnam par ldog cing 'gyur ba yin/ /gshibs ni thur du 'gro ba yin/ /yur ba'i nang du chu 'bab pa/ /de ni bsdams pas ldog par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nang gi lus la yang/ /lus kyi phyi rol
147b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba de/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu shes par bya/ /lus kyi rtsa ni ma lus pa/ /'dis ni bsdams par rab tu grags/ /bsdams pa 'di yi mthu yis ni/ /lha rnams kun kyang gsal bar 'gyur/ /de ltar phyag rgya bzhi yis ni/ /lan gsum rnam par
147b6(rgyud 'grel): bkag pa'o/ /lam cig pa ni gsal ba'o/ /grub pa lha yi lam du 'gro/ /skye dang 'chi ba'i lam gnyis po/ /'og ni lam du bshad pa yin/ /bsod nams dang ni sdig rgyu yi/ /de phyir skyon gnyis rnam par spangs/ /rlung gi de nyid bum pa can/ /
147b7(rgyud 'grel): de ni rab tu mnyam par bya/ /snying gi lam du rnam byas pa/ /rlung dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis/ /bsdams pas chu rgyan 'gag pa ltar/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par 'gog/ des na de'i bka' drin gyis/ /dzo ni gdams pa zhes grags so/ /grub pa'i
148a1(rgyud 'grel): lam dang yang dag ldan/ /mi ni 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /phyag rgya 'di ni shes pa yis/ /dregs pa yod kyang don dang lhan/ /des na thams cad shes pa yin/ /bdud rtsi grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po bi rU pas mdzad pa rdzogs
148a2(rgyud 'grel): so// //rgya gar gyi rnal 'byor pa las grub pa thob pa'i rgya gar e de bas bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ /DA ki na u pa a sh+rI d+ha ra mi sa ra b+hi ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkhA 'gro ma'i man dag snyad nas snyan du brgyud pa gdud
148a3(rgyud 'grel): ba gcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ba/ /bla ma rje btsun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tal lo/ /bla ma rje btsun mchog dang byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la//
148a4(rgyud 'grel): gus pa mchog gis rab tu rtse gcig 'dud par byas nas kyang/ /skal ldan gdud ba gang zag gdud ba bcad pa'i phyir/ /bla ma rnams kyi brgyad pa'i man ngag bri/ /de la rten gyi gang zas skal pa dang ldan zhing tshogs chen po bsags pa des/
148a5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa rnams yun ring par brten cing gdams pas rgyud yongs su bsgos par gyur kyang/ /gdams dag gis goms par ma gyur cing/ /yid gdud ba mchad pa dag la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis/ /slob dpon chen po DoM d+hi he ru ka
148a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams la brdar gsungs pa de dag bdag gis bstan par bya'o/ /de 'ang mkha' 'gro ma ro mas/ /slob dpon DoM b+hi he ru ka la lta ba'i gnas lugs brdad gsungs pa/ /til 'bru dang ni sgron mas phyogs kun gsal bar byed/ /sngags kyis
148a7(rgyud 'grel): btab pa'i dug ni smon gyi mchog tu gyur pa ste/ /rma bya'i zas ni gzhan du gyur pa yod ma yin/ /tsan dan dri dang ri gdags gla rtsi'i dri bzhin no/ /chu zla dang ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni tha dad cung zad med/ /sol ba'i rang bzhin gang gi kha dog nag po dag
148b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshungs/ /ri chen po gang gis bskyod par mi nus pas/ /gangs ri'i chu ni gzhan du gyur pa yod min no/ /dper na dri dang sgog skya tha dad gyur pa med/ /nyi ma zla ba'i yon tan gsal ba yin/ /mkha' la bya 'phur rjes ni tshol bas rnyed mi
148b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /nam mkha' i khams ni rtog ge'i sbyod yul ma yin no/ /maN+Dal dag ni phyogs las thams cad rab tu snyoms/ /dper na ro langs dang ni sa bra ko ne bzhin/ /dpa' bo ngo mtshar nor bu shel bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs te/ de dag
148b3(rgyud 'grel): ni gnas lugs kyi gdud ba gcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ste dang po'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma sib ha d+ha ras/ /slob dpon Do ma b+hi he ru ka la bsgom pa'i don brdar gsungs pa ni/ /gnas ni chang ching dag gam dur khrod
148b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ /bdag med mi yi mdza' mo dag dang phrad byas la/ /yid ni rab dga' i bsam pa yis/ /dper na las zin? pa'i skyes bu bzhin/ /dman pa'i don stor nam mkhar khyer bar bya/ /chu bo chen po rgyun du bab pa bzhin/ /drang srong ku sha gtsang
148b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i steng du bzhag/ mar me'i rtse mo rlung gis mi bskyod dang/ /me long g.ya' med bzhin du gsal bar phyi/ /bu ni yid 'ong bral ba'i ma bzhin du/ /rus sngal dang ni mkhar gzhong nyi ma la/ /rtsal dang ldan pa'i 'phong slob brtson pa
148b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /bsdams pa'i btson ni nges par grol bar 'gyur/ /sa le sbram las byas pa'i rgyan bzhin du/ /bu ram dag gi ro la myang bar bya/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni bsgom pa'i gnas lugs kyi gdud ba bcad pa'i gdam pa zhes
148b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma mA las slob dpon he ru ka la spyod pa'i don brdar gsungs pa ni/ /bag ma dang ni smyon pa'i tshul bzhin te/ /glang po btsongs la phag dgod bsad par bya/ /nya ni rgya mtsho chen por
149a1(rgyud 'grel): yangs pa che/ /nags rnams me yi phung por rab tu bsreg/ spyan gzigs zas la rtag tu longs spyod bya/ /des 'ga' mgyogs pa'i rta la bzhon pa bya/ /gri gug rnon po'i mtshon cha dag gis ni/ /lce sbyang dur
149a2(rgyud 'grel): khrod dag tu rnam par rol/ /'dab chags khra yi rtsal ni shin tu drag/ wa ni dur khrod nyid du shin tu gzhol/ /chang 'thungs pa dang yul rnams gzhol ba 'dra/ /me tog dag la bud ba rgyu ba bzhin/ /bu chung dang ni seng ge me long
149a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs/ /stag ni 'jigs pa med par kun tu rgyu/ /lkugs pa dag ni kha las khyod ma 'da' / /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni spyod pa'i gnas lugs kyi gdud ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste gsum pa'o// //
149a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas mkha' 'gro ma ki ka ro ma has/ slob dpon Dob+haM? ha ru ka la nyams su myong ba'i don brdar gsungs pa ni/ /dkar po tshes ni zla ba'i rim pa ste/ de dag ni spyod pa'i gnas lugs kyi gdud pa bcad pa'i gdams pa ste gsum pa'o// //
149a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khur ba chus bkang ba ni sma mi byed/ /khug rna lta bu rna ba'i rnam pa yin/ /dbul po'i rang bzhin gter ldan shin tu ngo mtshar che/ /lan tshwa chu nyid la ni rab tu thim/ /nam mkha' i nyams las 'da' bar mi byed do/ /bslus pa'i
149a6(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams la ni re bar mi byed cing/ /ral gri'i ngar ni snam gyis nyams par 'gyur/ /rgyal po dag ni rkun pos 'jigs mi byed/ /wa yis seng ge skrag par 'gyur ma yin/ /mkha' lding rnams ni mkha' las dbangs mi
149a7(rgyud 'grel): dma'/ /'di nyid yin dang ma yin gang yang min/ /sus byas gang yin go ba su zhig yin/ zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni nyams su myong ba'i gnas lugs kyi gdud ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas mkha' 
149b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma ma tre yis slob dpon DoM b+hi he ru ka la 'bras bu'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba bcad pa'i brdar gsungs pa ni/ yi ge bzhi pa dag gis zla ba rgyas/ /he ru ka'i nam mkha' i dang nyid de/ /rdo rje dang ni pad+ma yi ge bral/ /kha
149b2(rgyud 'grel): Ta'M ga ni nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin/ /rdo rje dang ni ljon shing 'bras bu ste/ /bya ni dang ba chu na rtag tu gnas/ /pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dab ma ra tu rgyas/ /Da ma ru ni bung ba'i rtsi dang mtshungs/ /bdud rtsi skal ldan rnams la chu shel te/ /rin chen bdun la rgyal
149b3(rgyud 'grel): pos mnga' yang mdzad/ /rnam grangs rnams na ris kyis shes la bkab/ /kun 'dar ma la bye brag gang yang med/ /rtsal rdzogs pa yi seng ge gangs la gnas/ /shel ni phyi nang med par shin tu dag/ btso ma'i gser ni dri ma'i g.ya'
149b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bral/ zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag 'bras bu'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste lnga pa'o// //mkha' 'gro ma ma ha las/ /slob dpon DoMb+hi he ru ka la/ /gong du gsungs pa de dag kyang/ gnyis med kyi rnal 'byor
149b5(rgyud 'grel): du bya ba'i brdar gsungs pa ni/ rgyal po rnams ni rin chen skal dang ldan/ /sman pa bzang dang phrad par gyur pa las/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mun pa sel ba ltar/ /rus sbal rgya mtsho dag tu 'gro mi 'gyur/ /stobs ldan gyad kyis pha rol
149b6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms par byed/ /ri bo 'gyel na chu rnams 'grub par byed/ /nags khrod dag na rdon pa glu rnams len/ /me shel ras bal 'dus pas me 'byung 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsi ni shin tu ngo mtshar che/ /chu dang bcas pa'i skye shing lo 'dab
149b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas/ /sbur len nor bu dag ni sdur rnams sdud/ /shes pa rnams ni gzhan gyi lus la 'jug/ sgre'u rnams ni dran par ldan pa ste/ /mnyan pas 'gro ba dag ni sgrol bar byed/ /ga bur sbyor bas tshad pa'i nad rnams sel/ /dge slong
150a1(rgyud 'grel): bag dang ldan pa gso sbyong byed/ /rigs ngan rgyal po'i khab tu mi gnas te/ /bcad par gyur na ta la'i lo 'dab med/ /sgyu ma mkhan po sgyu ma'i longs spyod mkhas/ /rgyal po'i bu mo rgyan dang rab tu ldan/ /gar
150a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhan rnams ni gar gyi rnam pa byed/ /sgrang ma rnams na ngan skyugs nang du rgyug/ zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas lugs kyi gdud ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste drug pa'o// //
150a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas mkha' 'gro ma ba tos/ /bla ma zangs glod pa na ga bur la/ /zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor gyi brda gsungs pa ni/ /khri snyan sa le snying rje ldan pa ste/ /ma ni bu la rab tu chags pa'o/ /bu ram shing las bu ram 'byung ba ltar/ /rgya mtshor
150a4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pas nor bu rnyed par 'gyur/ /chu yi nang gi zla ba sel mi byed/ /nor bu me shel rtsol sgrub dag dang bral/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal po nyid kyang yin/ /tshong pa chod 'dus dag tu gnas par byed/ /rdza mkhan dag ni so btang rdza la
150a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod/ /sprin dang bral ba'i nam mkha' rab tu dangs/ /dmu rgod mi srun brtul bas zhon par byed/ /mdza' bo dag gis bsrungs pas re ba med/ /rmi lam sang pas dgra dang yongs su bral/ /khyim bdag mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rab
150a6(rgyud 'grel): tu rno/ /chem rkun rab tu mang bas mel tshe mkhas/ /chu rnams ma lus rgya mtsho ro gcig 'gyur/ /pha lam rdo rjes dngos po thams cad 'bigs/ /smig rgyu'i chu yis gdud bar mi byed do/ /gzha' tshon yal ba dag la sdug bsngal
150a7(rgyud 'grel): med/ rmi lam rmis pa'i nor la ster mi byed/ /brag ca'i sgra la rang nyid dga' ba ste/ /bram ze chang 'thung ba ni shin tu gsang/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor rnal 'byor shin tu che/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor gyi
150b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas lugs kyi gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bdun pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma khaN+Da ro has/ /slob dpon DoMb+hi he ru ka la/ /padmo kha 'byed pa'i gdams pa brdar gsungs pa ni/ /dbul po rnams ni nor med sdug bsngal de//
150b2(rgyud 'grel): nam phyed mtshan mo dag gi dus su ni/ /rgyal po'i bang mdzod bdag nyid brku bar bya/ /ma skyes dpe med mdzes pa'i grogs brkus la/ /shin tu mgar ba mkhas pa'i lde mig gis/ /gze ma bzhi bsten sgo lcags dbye bar bya/ /slar yang sgo
150b3(rgyud 'grel): de dam du bcad par bya/ /rked stan gzhug cing skad gzer bsdam par bya/ /sgo ba po de yongs su bsad bya zhing/ /'bru mar 'bar ba bstegs byas la/ /btsa' med lcags la byas pa dag gi gros/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa mgo bcad
150b4(rgyud 'grel): de/ /dmag dpon chen po dug gis bsad par bya/ /mal tse ba dang blon po rnams kyang bsad/ /de nas rgyal po'i bang mdzod kha phye la/ /gos bzang dag gis yongs su dril ba yi/ /gser dang dngul gyi ga'u kha phye la/ /phyogs med pa yi nor bu rin chen
150b5(rgyud 'grel): blta/ /mar me dang ni dang ni nam mkha' i bu mo'i tshul/ /nyi m dang ni zla bas bdud rtsi 'thigs/ /che bas che ba'i rab tu che ba nyid/ /rma bya khyi dang phag dang smyon pa nyid/ /sha za bung ba shin tu rol par byed/ ces gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni padmo kha dbye ba'i man
150b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag gi gnas lugs brdar gsungs pa'i gdams pa ste brgyad pa'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa tai lo pas dpal nA ro pa la/ /bla ma'i chos bcu drug pa zhes bya ba'i gdams pa brdar gsungs pa ni/ /sa gzhi bzang po dag gi padmo kha dbye ba'i man
150b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis las la ma zhugs shing/ /sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir ba bsal ba'i phyir/ /ded dpon lta bu dag gis sems bskyed la/ /mu tig 'phyang ba chen po gzung byas la/ /'byung ba sa chu me rlung dbang du bsdus/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi nas
151a1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen btsa/ /sbrang rtsi'i bcud ni mar gyis snying por ldan/ /goms par bya zhing bzo la byang bar bya/ /phye ma lab dang ri dags bud ba dang/ /nya dang glang chen dag las rab tu grol/ /dug med sa? ma phogs
151a2(rgyud 'grel): phog kyang slar la gso/ /tha rgod chu yis rab tu bangs par bya/ /rab tu nor mang phyug cing shin tu phyug/ zhing pa'i las la rab tu gus par 'gyur/ /ma yis bu ni rab tu smin par byed/ /'joms byed seng ge'i bla ma de dag la/ /lus ngag yid
151a3(rgyud 'grel): gus yo byad ci dgos dbul/ /gus par ldan pas de 'dra yang dang yang/ /brtsal med bsten cing bsnyen bkun rab tu 'bad/ /ces gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni bla ma chos de rnams dang ldan pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po spang ba ste dgu pa'o// //
151a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas rnal 'byor pa tai lo bas/ /dang la nA ro pa la slob ma'i chos bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i brdar gsungs pa ni/ /gcan zan mche ba dag gis ma rungs rma med pa/ /sdug bsngal btson ra 'di na yun ring nad kyis thebs/ /khang bzangs
151a5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa nad med bde ba yon tan ldan/ /klu yi rgyal po 'gro la char rgyun rtag tu 'bebs/ /dug sdong lo 'dab rgyas pa'i lo 'dab 'bras bu chags pa med/ /spu gri'i sor chags sbrang rtsi'i do rnams rtag tu spong bar byed/ /bde ba'i chos kun gsod par ldan
151a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skyes bu sems stobs ldan/ /rma yod bag yod gnas mi byed/ /mi bzod nad kyis gzir ba sman pa dag la rab tu gus/ /skom pas rab gdungs nges par btung ba 'ba' zhig sgrub par byed/ /rlan bral dus spal rgya mtsho chen po mthong
151a7(rgyud 'grel): na rab tu dga' / /mgo la me lces zin pa myur du sel bar byed/ /rin chen snod mchog de dag tu/ /ro mchog bcud kyis nges par 'gengs/ /mun pa dag la sgron mi bzhin/ /skal ldan bya ba gsal bar byed/ /slob ma chos de rnams dang ldan
151b1(rgyud 'grel): pa bsten/ /de las zlog pa spang bar bya'o/ /slob ma bsten pa'i gdud ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma kaM ka ro ma ha sa/ bla ma zangs gling pa nA ga pu ra la/ /'khrul pa'i shes pa gcad pa'i brda
151b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad gsungs pa ni/ /byis pa chu dud gyur pa rnams kyis ni/ /me long bzhin la tha dad dag tu rtogs/ /shin tu blo gros dman pa'i ri mo mkhan/ /rang gis bris pa'i ri mo dag la sgrag/ mkhris pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i mig can dag/ mthong ba'i
151b3(rgyud 'grel): yul rnams dag la chags sdang skye/ /ji ltar dar gyi srin bu dag gis ni/ /rang gi kha chu'i rnam pas 'ching bar byed/ /mi mkhas dman pa'i gang zag la rje? ni/ /sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyi rnam pas bslus pa yin/ /rgya dang snyi la sogs pas ri dags
151b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rang dbang med par rab tu bsdams par 'gyur/ /mi mthun dgra yis zin par gyur pa'i btson/ /lcags sgrogs dam pa dag gis bcings gyur la/ /rmi lam na ni khri mun dong bcug pa/ /de tshe sdug bsngal mi bzod skye ba yin/ /bla ma bsten cing
151b5(rgyud 'grel): des shes bskyed/ /gnyug ma goms par bsten par bya/ /'khrul pa yi ni shes pa nyid/ /rig pa nyid de ye shes nyid/ /'khrul pa'i shes pa spang byas la/ /gnyug ma'i ye shes goms par bya'o/ /'khrul pa'i shes pa ngo shes par bya ba'i gdud
151b6(rgyud 'grel): ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu gcig pa'o// //lho phyogs kyi grong khyer du mkha' 'gro ma pi la de wis/ /rnal 'byor pa'i smon pa'i brtul zhugs la ri ta pa la la/ de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor nyi shu brdar gsungs pa ni/ /zhing
151b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams ni rim gyis las la 'jug/ shing rta dag ni 'khor lo gnyis dang ldan/ /dpe med nam mkha' nam mkha' nyid du gnas/ /rig pa'i mdas ni thams cad 'bigs par byed/ /chu'i nang du utpal shin tu mdzes/ /rtog pa bral ba
152a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho chen po nyid/ /mun nag rab tu spangs pa nam mkha' ste/ /drang srong nags khrod gnas pa shing lo'i gos/ /rtsal rdzogs seng ge gangs la dud gnas/ /'dab ldan bya ni mkha' la mthon por gcod/ /sman mchog
152a2(rgyud 'grel): pe ta'i 'bras bu gdod nas grub/ /'bru mar sdod khyer skad cig tsam mi yangs/ /dka' grub can ni shin tu bag dang ldan/ /ri yi khrod na ljon shing rab tu rgyas/ /bram ze 'jug dogs dag ni dri ma 'khru/ thag pa'i 'gyur ba lhod par lhod
152a3(rgyud 'grel): gang gA'i chu ni rgya mtsho chen por 'bab/ /gdol ba dag ni rtag tu slong mos 'tsha/ /mdzes pa rtag tu mo long lta bar byed/ /? rgyal ri bo mchog ri ba rtag tu brtan/ zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor nyi shu brdar gsungs
152a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor shes par bya ba'i gdud ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor rtsi te mas/ rje btsun ri khrod pa la/ /cag bcas kyi bde ba las su rung byar bya ba'i phyir/ /gdams
152a5(rgyud 'grel): pa brdar gsungs pa/ rten cing 'brel pa dag gi las rnams ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par byed/ /dus rnams kun dang zla brgyas pa yin/ /mun pa'i tshogs rnams des ? bsel byed na/ /che ? pa'i zhing pa dag gis
152a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'bras bu'i nus pa yongs su skyed par byed/ /'khor lo gnyis dang rab tu ldan pa yis/ /shing rta mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis pha rol 'gro/ /rten thabs mkhas pa rnams kyi chu lung kyis/ /zhing pa'i myu gu rab tu rgyas par byed//
152a7(rgyud 'grel): ji srid 'dab ma rdzogs pa'i bya/ /de srod 'jam pa'i tshad na rten par byed/ /tshang pas gdungs pa'i dug gis sbrul rnams ni/ bya ba gzhan dag btang nas tsan dan steg/ zo chu rgyun mkhan 'dod par ni/ /chu rnams ji ltar srid par byed/ /'dini
152b1(rgyud 'grel): thun mong ma yin gdams pa ste/ /rtag tu bla ma mchog la grus pa dang/ /tshogs bsags rgyud sbyangs pa yi spyod yul te/ /skyal ba dang ni ldan bas 'bad par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs stobs yan lag
152b2(rgyud 'grel): brdar gsungs pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// //dur khrod chen po ha har sgrogs pa zhes bya bar slob dpon chen po Dob+hi he ru kas/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i dus su/ 'du bar 'os pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'di skad
152b3(rgyud 'grel): ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje slob dpon du gyur pa rnams kyis ba bcol du bdud rtsi chu bo lta bu'i gdams ngag mi bya bar/ /gdam pa bran ltar rang dbang med pa'i mi rnams la/ /rje bo bzhin du bde ba'i dus skabs med/ /g.ya' ma phyis pa'ime
152b4(rgyud 'grel): long ngos dag la/ /bzhin ni gzugs brnyan gsal bar 'gyur bamed/ /rgyud dang bral ba'i gzhu dang 'phongs mkhan dang/ /rtsal dang ldan yang srid mi byed/ /stod nang ma bkus shin tu btsog pa'i nang/ /ro mchog zas pa dang dag gis
152b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gengs ba med/ /tshad ldan zhing pa mkhas pa dag rnams kyis/ dus min sa bon 'debs pa yongs su spongs/ /rkun po blo gros gzhan la gtams bas na/ /brkus par gyur kyang sdug bsngal rtag tu skyed de/ /btsung shing yan lag rdzogs par
152b6(rgyud 'grel): ma gyur pa/ /me ni 'byung bar rung ba nam yang med/ /bag yod blo ldan mkhas pa gang zhig gis/ /zhabs med snod du bcung rnams blugs mi byed/ /'bru mar 'bar mi 'dod skyes bu ni/ /rtag tu rlung rnams g.yo bar byed cing gnas/ /dug
152b7(rgyud 'grel): can sprul ni mkhas pa dag rnams kyis/ /mthong bar mi 'dod thag ring yongs su spod zhes gsungs pa ste/ /de dag ni slob dpon DoM b+hi he ru kas rdo rje slob dpon du gyur pa rnams la bdud rtsi lta bu'i man ngag snod ma brtags pa rnams la mi
153a1(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //rje btsun nA ro pas/ bla ma gangs gsed ba la/ /nor bu rin po che nges gzung ba'i gdams ngag bstan pa ni/ nang gi mun pa'i rgya mtsho chen po ?/ /rin thang med pa'i nor
153a2(rgyud 'grel): bu rab stor bas/ /ze ma lnga dang rab tu ldan pa yis/ /mche ba gnyis gtsigs phag pa zos par 'gyur/ /lcags sna gsum la brdungs pa'i ral gri yis/ /phag pa'i sha dang rus pa so sor dbye/ /de nas nor bu rin chen
153a3(rgyud 'grel): btsal bar bya/ /rnyed par gyur na chu yis bkru/ /de nas rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar bar bya/ /'dod pa'i don le gsol ba gdab pas 'byung/ /dri ma med pa'i nor bu rin chen de/ /nges par nam mkha' i dkyil du sba par bya//
153a4(rgyud 'grel): nor bu lhun po ri yi rtse la gzhag/ nor bu me dang chu yis rab tu gdul/ /nor bu bya yi 'dab pa gdags par bya/ /nor bu chu bo chen po'i gzhung la bskur/ /nor bu mar me'i ngos la bstan par bya/ /nor bu smon pa'i lag
153a5(rgyud 'grel): tu gtad la gzhag/ nor bu me long ngos la bstan la bzhag/ nor bu ngas pa la phung po'i steng du gzhag/ nor bu rin chen dri za'i grong du bcol/ /nor bu rin chen rgyal po'i gter du ? bar bya/ /nor bu rin chen me dpung dkyil du sla//
153a6(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rin chen rkun po'i nor nyid yin/ /nor bu rin chen shel gyi steng du bzhag/ nor bu nor can bstan pa'i nor/ /nor bu'i nor ni btsa' zhes gsungs pa ste/ /de dag ni ye shes kyi nor bu ngos bzung ba'i thabs brder gsungs pa'o/ /rangs
153a7(rgyud 'grel): gi gnyug ma'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes ngos gzung ba'i gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa ste bco lnga pa'o// //slob ma skal ldan tshogs bsags rin chen lta bu'i gang zag 'di dpag tu med pa'i gdams ngag rnams kyis
153b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ngag yongs su sbyangs gyur kyang/ /gdung ba chad par ma gyur bla ma rnams kyis yongs su gdungs gyur pa/ /gdams ngag rnams dang bla ma'i gdung ba bcad phyir brgyud pa'i man ngag bkod/ /rje btsun mchog dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams
153b2(rgyud 'grel): bzod mdzod la/ /de las byung pa'i dge ba zla ba lta bu'i dri ma med pa nges/ 'gro ba ma lus yid kyi gdung ba yongs su bcad par gyur nas kyang/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dri med sa la ma lus yongs su rdzogs gyur cig/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gdams
153b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya'o/ /sprul pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzhung du bkod pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mu drA badzra gI ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu
153b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo d+harma kA ya mahA su kha ye/ kye 'o gnyis med rdo rje 'di ltar nyon/ /gang zhig mig med pa yis lam mkhan bsten/ /bu chung dpa' bo ma la rag lus te/ /me long bstan pas
153b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal/ /ngang pa'i mchu yis chu dang 'o ma 'byed/ /bskal pa'i mun pa sel byed sgron me ste/ /gter gyi bang mdzod 'byed pa'i lde mig mchog/ mi zad gter chen 'byin pa'i rgyal po bsten/ /dbul po bsten pas bdag
153b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid dbul por 'gyur/ /nam mkha' rgya mtsho nyi zla gsum ldan bsten/ /ne tso'i kha thon snyan pas ci zhig phan/ /'dab chags bu ni mkha' la spur na bde/ /dud 'gro g.yang la bskyur na gson mi rung/ /nyi zla gza' bral sprin pa rlung btab gsal//
153b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin? sangs gyur kyang ? zin snang ba med/ /chu skyes pad+ma'i bcud ni bung bas len/ /'di sbal drung na gnas kyang de lta min/ /chu shel chu ni rkyen dang 'jom pa ces/ /seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan phal par ma ni/ /oM A:hUM e ma ho/ /snang ?
154a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nam mkha' nyid las byung/ /nam mkha' yod med phyogs rgyu kha dog bral/ /thog ma bar dang tha ma 'gro 'ong med/ /'byung bzhi rab tu 'khrugs kyang 'gyur mi srid/ /rkyen gyis dkar nag snang yang dkar nag med/ /rgyal mtsho gting zab
154a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya che sna tshogs 'tshar/ /rba rlabs ri bo 'dra yang rgyu mtsho'i dang/ /'khyag rom brag 'dra chu las yongs ma 'das/ /sa la sna tshogs 'khrungs kyang zad pa med/ /bsregs bcad bdar yang gser gyi ngo mi 'gyur/ /me ni tsha zhing chu ni rlan mi 'bral/ /sprul pa drug ni rab
154a3(rgyud 'grel): tu rtogs par gyis/ /nam mkha' stong las stong pa 'byung ba ste/ /rkyen gyis me chu 'byung yang shel gyi ngo mi 'gyur/ /bka' rtags phyag rgya gnyug ma zhes brjod do/ /sa 'og gseng dang gyad kyi nor bu dang/ /dbul po'i gter dang bum pa'i mar me
154a4(rgyud 'grel): ltos/ /nor bu rin chen mi gtsang 'dam du bying?/ /sgyu mar ma shes rgyal po a thang chad/ /thag ba sprul du mthong bas brgyal nas shi/ /mar me nyi ma dmus long mun par snang/ /mi gtsang dri za tsan dan sgril 'phros?/ /mig skyon can gyis zla ba
154a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su mthong/ /glang po bzhag nas glang po'i rjes tshol ba/ /bu chung me long gzugs brnyan mthong bas dga' / /ri dags 'khrul pa smig rgyu chu la snyeg /gser ma shes pa dag na phye ma 'chang/ /sko chu glang rjes chu ni myung du skam/ /rgyal med
154a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dag rgya mtshor zhugs na 'bying/ /lam mkhan med par dmun long lam 'gro dang/ /'dab gshog med pa'i bye brug 'phur na ltung/ /dug lo bregs nas bskyur byang ci zhig phan/ /mun khrung? dag tu sgron ma bteg pas bsal/ /thag pa gcig
154a7(rgyud 'grel): chod mdud pa brgya srol? te/ /thag pa mes tshig dag gis 'ching mi nus/ /gser 'gyur rtsi yis zangs lcags gser du 'gyur/ /rma bya bcan dug zos bas spu thog rgyas/ /mig dang ldan pas rkang pa gar bzhag phyin/ /dbang gi rgyal po gcig
154b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'dod dgu rdzogs/ /khyung phrugs gshog rdzogs mkha' la spur na bde/ /mar me bteg pas mun pa'i lam gsal zhing/ rung? shes sgrag tu bcug pa phye bas grol/ /dang pa chu la 'o ma len pa ltos/ /dgra skugs btsal bas 'jigs
154b2(rgyud 'grel): pa sangs nas 'gro/ /nam mkha' i ma mthong nam mkha' mthong ba ste/ /rgya dang rgya'i 'bung ni log par 'byung/ /mar me bsad pas lus dang grib ma med/ /sgyu ma bshig pas 'du shes rnam lnga spangs/ /chu la chu bzhag de nyid dbyer med 'gyur//
154b3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i me tog ri bong rwa zhes bya/ /gzings la 'phung ba'i bya ni slar la ldog/ gang zhig 'khyag? rom spangs nas chu tshol pa/ /rgyu rkyen rtsol bas byas pa rang 'byung min/ /dbul po mi nor rgya yis 'debs pa dang/ /sa bon 'bras bu tha dad 'dzin
154b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'khrul/ /rkun mo ngos ma zin par ? mnga' spron/ /kye ma 'di ni sprul? dang rigs sngags mtshon cha 'dra/ /rta rngas? sgral? la mdud pa brgyal bgrol/ /mkha' la mdung bskor las zin skyes bu bde/ /khyung chen mkha' lding nyam pa 'jigs pa
154b5(rgyud 'grel): med/ /ri mthon kha na yul khams sna tshogs gsal/ /bu yi sdug bsngal ma yis mthong mi bzod/ /ral gri bar mas dngos po ma lus gcod/ /smyon par gyur kyang dug la reg mi byed/ /bu chung yon yang gtsug gi nor mi 'bral/ /a:
154b6(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM/ a ma ho/ /me don gnyer bas du ba shugs kyis 'byung/ /nor bu rnyed na so nam 'bad mi dgos/ /mi gcig skyes pas shing la 'dod lnga 'byung/ skyur bo zos na mthong pas nyams su myong/ /sngar 'dris mi dang phrang na the tshom med/ /
154b7(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu nam mkha' bzung pa thar mi srid/ /rmi lam sgyu ma'i mtshon gyis gnod pa med/ /dngul rdo 'o ma bur shing til mar ltos/ /chu ni mthong dang thos pas skom mi sel/ /sman pa'i dag mi nyan pa'i nad pa de/ /zas nor byin pas rang nyid bkres nas shi//
155a1(rgyud 'grel): gter mdzod bgrangs pas rang gi thob pa med/ /'o na pa sil snyan long pa ri mo mkhan/ /byis pa man gtam dmus long yul khams ston/ /sgo da ma yis gab na byi phrug smin/ /rdo la gzhu brtul byas na rin chen nor/ /sbang
155a2(rgyud 'grel): ma mnan nas bsings pas gar chang 'byung/ /bu chung gsos pas dpa' po'i las rnams nus/ /rgyal bu tshar nas yul khams dbang thob ste/ mkha' la sprin dengs 'khyag pa chur thim 'gyur/ /mkha' ldings rgyal po spro bsdu med par
155a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /chu ni ma rnyogs rang dangs nyid du zhog/ ji ltar mkhas pa ba lang skyong ba bzhin/ /brtan gsal rno ba mar me'i snying po ltos/ /sgyu ma'i skyes bu chags zhen rtsis gdab med/ /bya ni nam mkhar rten med gnas par byed/ /chos ma rnams kyis
155a4(rgyud 'grel): ras gos dag par bkru/ /mkhar sbe rtsi gsan 'gram gzhi legs par thim/ /ma yi sdug bsngal bu yis mthong bar gyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag/ nam mkha' lnga na 'ja' tshon lus su bsgyur/ /dmu rgod rta ni
155a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis zung la tshos/ /ri gzar 'bab chu yang yang brdabs na drungs/ /spre'u zin na kun la yang rtsal sbyangs/ /bsags pa'i yo byad chags med kun la sbyin/ /bying zhing rmugs na 'dab chags mkha' la sbur/ /yang na bung pa kha
155a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod rlung gis khong/ rgod na khang stong rkun ma sbrin la ltos/ /rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs chu zlar shes par bya/ /rkun ma mthong zhing tshor na ldog par nges/ /rtsa ba sman na thams cad sman zhes bya/ /nor bu rin chen sa yi gter du sba/ /yang na ri
155a7(rgyud 'grel): dags gar song dad la gsod/ /ltogs na dugs la sngags kyis btab la bza' / /snyoms las byis pa'i nyam da g.yang sa ltos/ /snying la gces pa dur khrod gnas su skyol/ /na tsha byung na rgyal pa stong par gyis/ /de la bu ga thod la
155b1(rgyud 'grel): mes chig me la gdungs/ /sman ma zhun slar yang nad du 'gyur/ /rtsa dang gsar gnyis 'ching byang khyad par med/ /shes pa 'thums na yul khams skor zhing blta/ /rkang 'gros bul na 'og rta rol la sbos/ /dpa' rtsal zhan na dpa' rtsal? kun la
155b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyang/ /me don gnyer bas gtsub shing drag tu bsrub/ /ri bo mi bskyod chu bo rgyun chad med/ /gser gling phyin nas sa rdo btsal mi rnyed/ /shing bal 'dab ma shin tu yang la sogs/ /yid bzhin nor bu yod na dgos 'dong 'byung/ /AM(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM/
155b3(rgyud 'grel): e ma ho/ /bya 'phur nam mkha' dag las mi 'da' ste/ /sna tshogs nang bu chen gyi kha dog snang/ /gser dang gser gyi rgyun la 'gyur ba med/ /'dam skyes pad+ma 'dam gyis mi gos so/ /gang dag 'jigs sar skyel ma sangs nas 'gro/ /rgyal
155b4(rgyud 'grel): po gang zhig rgyal srid por nas 'khyam/ /sum cu rtsa gsum thos pa ne tso'i chos/ /chu la mar khu blugs pas 'dre bar min/ bya rgod snyis zin glang chen 'dam du bying/ /nor bu rin chen lung khung dag tu bor/ /rgyal blon 'dzom na rgyal sris mnga' 
155b5(rgyud 'grel): thang 'phel/ /mig dang rkang par ldan pas don sar phyin/ /dpa' po'i go mtshon blon po bka' rtsags khyer/ /rtsis med smyon pa zhen med bu chung dang/ /rtog med phag dang glang chen chur 'jug ltos/ /phag rgod rnams ni du ka sbrul mi gtong
155b6(rgyud 'grel): za/ /dbul po rin chen rgyal po'i mkhar du sba/ /gso sbyong sbyad rnams rig pa mda' yis bsnun/ /yul khams kun gyi dgra rnams srid du bcad/ /dpa' bo gang yin de yis dgra rnams 'dul/ /mkha' lding rgyal po phye leb spyod yul min/ /
155b7(rgyud 'grel): rigs ban rgyal po wa yis seng pags gyon/ /nags la me mched ?  du gar bab sreg/ me 'bar ba la rlung gis bskyod na 'bar/ /rin chen snod sbyar phyis pa bsad/ /smyon pa bu chung khyi phag seng ge bzhin/ /a:aoM hUM/ e ma ho/ /chu rnams thams
156a1(rgyud 'grel): cad rgya mtsho chen bor gcig/ gang zhig ltogs pa'i dus su zas ster ba/ /nad rnams gso ba sman pa'i rgyal bo ste/ /chu bo chen po sgrol ba'i mnyan pa mchog/ gnod pa'i dgra rnams 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ste/ /dge bshes
156a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po phyogs med kun la snyoms/ /mkhas pa dag gis 'cha' tshon lta bar bya/ /gnang du bsnun pa'i tshor ba spongs pa med/ /bung ba me tog dag la chags zhen bral/ /nya ni rtag tu chu las yong mi 'da' / /rtsi sman yod kyang dug la reg
156a3(rgyud 'grel): ni byed/ /ji ltar phyug po so nam byed pa ltos/ /seng ge'i 'o ma klugs pa'i kha bzhin bsdams/ /smon pa rang gi snying la mtshon bsnun dang/ /gshed mas zin pa'i chad pas bcang pa'i mi/ /sa bon rul ba myu gu yong mi skye/ tshe lo sum cu nyi
156a4(rgyud 'grel): shu bcu ba bzhig /gang zhig ye shes nyi ma shar nas nub/ /dbul pos nor bu rin chen rnyed nas bor/ /gang dag cang shes rta lo zhen nas 'bab/ /ji ltar dbul po'nor bu rgyal pos phrogs/ /yid bzhin nor bu mchod na dgos 'dod 'byung//
156a5(rgyud 'grel): dngul dkar me long yang yang phyis na gsal/ /brgya byin lha yi longs spyod 'bad ba med/ /me tog pad+ma bung pa'i tshogs rnams 'du/ /a oM hUM /e ma ho/ /po ta la la nam langs nyi shar mnyam/ /'jim pa'i logs la gtab pa'i bde
156a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs sku/ /myu gu me tog 'bras bu rim gyis smin/ /dbang po skyon dang bral na gzugs rnams mthong/ /shel gong dri ma med pa phyi nang gsal/ /sgyu ma mkhas ba sbrul ba sna tshogs ston/ /rdo rje pha lam gang gis gzhom par min/ /yid bzhin
156a7(rgyud 'grel): nor bus mi mthun gnod pa sel/ /seng ge mngal rgya khyung phrug sgong rgya bral/ /mkha' la nyi shar 'od zer phyogs bcur khyab/ /srin bu bud pa gnas gyur mkha' la 'phyo/ /yid bzhin nor bu rtog med dgos 'dod 'byung/ /rang gi grib ma mthong

156b2(rgyud 'grel): ho/ /de ltar bstan pa'i don de thams cad kyang/ /rang bzhin las dang 'bras bu gsum de gnas/ /gzhi la chos sku lhun gyis grub pas na/ /de phyir sku gsum gyis grub par gnas/ /rang bzhin stong pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ /lam ni mtshan med rnam
156b3(rgyud 'grel): par thar pa'i sgo/ /'bras bu smon med rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ /sgo gsum phyed pas sku gsum zhal mthong 'gyur/ /'on kyang thams cad brdzun pa'i rang bzhin la/ /don la ched du bya bci yang med/ /shin tu gsang ba rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag/ khyod kyi ye
156b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rig pas rtogs par gyis/ /dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug dang/ mkha' 'gro ma ye shes kyi spyan dang/ /pad+ma'i spyan gyi zhal snga nas snying po'i don mgur du bzhengs pa phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu/ brda rgyud gsang ba'i sgron me rdzogs so// //
