251b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum ma lus spro zhing yang der bsdu/ zhes gsungs te khams gsum ni sku dang gsungs dang/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /ma lus pa ni so so'i ba sdu'i bu ga'i bar du/ gnyid sad pa'i gnas skabs su dga' ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyi byang chub
251b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems rnam par spros nas/ yang der sdud pa ste/ steng du song nas bzhi ba zad cing rgyu mthun pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis/ a ba d+hu tIr sdud pa ste/ cha dang thig le phra mo las 'das shing thams cad stong pa nyid kyi khams la zhugs te/
252a1(rgyud 'grel): des rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mngon du byed ces bya ba'i don to/ /de nyid kyi phyir bde gshegs lha mo khro bo'i tshogs/ /srid pa ci phyir byed ces gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ lha mo dang/ khro bo'i
252a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs la sred pa ci'i phyir byed ces bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dag spangs la/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su gnas so/ /zhes dgongs so zhes bya ba la dgongs pa 'di yin te/ phung po dang skye mched la sogs pa dang/
252a3(rgyud 'grel): lus dang ngag dang yid dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gdams ngag gis bde ba chen po ro gcig par gyur pa de ltar na'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa las/ de las gzhan du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor med de?
252a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /de ltar yang gsang ba'i rgyud las/ yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing/ rtog dang rtog byed rnam par spangs/ /cha dang thig le yang dag 'das/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /de nyid gzhan gyi sgo nas dkyil
252a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du bstan pa ni/ gang gis lhan cig skyes pa brtan byas te/ zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa ni lhan cig byung ba'i shes rab ste/ brtan pa ni phyir 'byung ba med par bya'o/ /mnyam par ro gcig pa ni dga' ba bzhi po gcig pas rang
252a6(rgyud 'grel): gi yid kyi rgyal po ni yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'o/ /de'i dbus nyid du ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /grub pa ni phyag rgya chen po grub ste/ rdo rje 'chang chen po thob bo/ /de'i dus nyid dus ma yin pa rgyud la gcig ces
252a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de skad du yang dpal bde mchog las/ /mtho ris mi yul sa 'og gi/ skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur/ /rang dang gzhan du rtogs pa yis/ /skad cig tu ni gdon mi 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de nyid kyi phyir/ rga dang
252b1(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dag ni med/ ces gsungs so/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa ni/ /mi g.yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ mi g.yo ba ni byang chub kyi sems phyir mi 'byung ba'o/ /mi rtog pa ni nyams su myong pa ?
252b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig pas/ de dang 'di ni rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /'gyur ba med pa ni 'dod chags dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dag gis ci bya zhe na/ de dag las grol ba'i phyir ro/ /skye 'jig spangs pa ni/ zla ba dang nyi ma bkag pa'i
252b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro/ /mdzes pa ni shin tu mdzes pa ste/ bde ba chen po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /snying po ni 'od gsal ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /deng 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di nyid kyi phyir mya ngan las 'das par brjod de/ mya ngan las 'das pa'o
252b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes/ /sgras smras pa la/ yang dag pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de ji lta bu'i khyad par dang ldan zhe na/ gang la sems dang sems las byung ba med/ ces gsungs
252b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ gang la ji srid sems ni rnam pa gsum ste/ sems las byung ba ni sems kyi rang bzhin brgya drug bcu dang/ thig les kyang ci 'ang mi byed de de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa cung zad kyang mi 'byung ngo/ /zhes pa'i don to/ /de nyid bstan pa'i
252b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ gang gis e bam rnam par shes gyur ?/ /zhes gsungs te/ de'i don ni 'di yin te/ de yang ji skad du/ lta'i dbang pos yongs su zhus pas/ e ni stong pa'i rang bzhin te/ bam ni thugs rje chen por brjod/ /thig le gnyis
252b7(rgyud 'grel): med sbyor ba'o/ /'di yi zung 'jug dran par bya/ /e ni ma ru brjod pa ste/ bam ni pha ru shes par bya/ /thig le gnyis med sbyor bar 'gyur/ /de yi sbyor ba ngo mtshar te/ e ni ? gnyid du gsungs/ /bam ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin no/ /de
253a1(rgyud 'grel): las thig le'i sa bon 'gyur/ /de las srid gsum yang dag 'byung/ /e ni shes rab nyid du 'gyur/ /bam ni thabs su yang dag brjod/ /thig le de nyid mi shigs pa'o/ /de las yi ge ma lus byung/ /gang gis
253a2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi phyag rgya ni/ /yi ge gnyis ni de nyid shes/ /de yi sems can thams cad la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba gang gis yi ge gnyis/ /de nyid mi shes rtag tu 'don/ /sangs rgyas chos la phyir 'byung ste/ /phyug
253a3(rgyud 'grel): po longs sbyod spangs bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /'dir de lta bu'i e baM yi ge shes pa ni rtogs pa ste/ gang gis shes pa de ni sangs rgyas rtogs pa'o/ /ma lus ni e bam gi yi ge sna tshogs lus pa med pa ste/ de nyid ni sna
253a4(rgyud 'grel): chogs gcig gi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de ji lta bur gyur ba zhes na/ de nyid chos kyi za ma tog yin te zhes gsungs te/ chos rnams ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams te dga' ba la sogs ba'o/ /de rnams kyi za ma tog ni
253a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas so/ /de nyid bod pa'i tshig go de ni rang gi bdag po'i cha lugs so/ /zhes gsungs te/ rang gi bdag po ni thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ /cha lugs ni rgyan no/ /de nyid kyis 'khyud par skyes pa'i phyir ro/ /yang de nyid kyis sgrub pa'i
253a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs mdor bstan pa ni/ rlung ni 'gro ba'i sgo rnams la yang zhes gsungs te/ rlung 'gro ba'i sgo ni steng dang 'og go/ dam por bcings pa ni de la brtan zhing mi phyed ba'i/ /lcags ni sgo drug gi rlung kha sbyor du bya ba ste/ /zla ba dang nyi
253a7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i lam bkag pas dus kyi me yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di'i lus kyi 'ching ba'o/ /gal te nang gi mun pa nag po la zhes gsungs te/ gal te de la mi zad pa'i mun pa ste mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin rlung bum pa lta
253b1(rgyud 'grel): bu'i ngo bo nyid gzhom du med pa'i sgra/ chos kyi dbang phyug yid kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi de'i tshe nyid bde ba chen po gsal bar byed pa'i phyir mar me'o/ /byed gyur na ni du ba la sogs pa'i rtags kyis gsal bar byed ba'o/ /de skad du
253b2(rgyud 'grel): yang/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sems kyi rdo rje 'gog pa las/ /mtshan ma la sogs mthong bar 'gyur zhes gsungs te 'dis ni dag bcings pa'o/ /rgyal po'i rin chen steng gi nam mkhar bzhugs zhes gsungs pa ni/ rgyal
253b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rin chen ni gzhom du med pa'i sgra de nyid do/ /steng gi nam mkhar bzhugs pa ni gang gis tshe rten du gyur ba drug pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi thig le la reg pa ste/ de la 'khyud pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar yang/ mkha' 'gro rdo rje
253b4(rgyud 'grel): nor bu ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni spyi bor gnas zhes gsungs te/ 'dis ni sems kyi bcing ba'o/ /de ltar yang dpal kha sbyor thig le las/ /rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor las/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i sa bon bskul/ /thig le sgra yis
253b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag mnan/ char rgyun 'bab pa dag tu dran zhes gsungs te/ de ltar yang thig le'i sgra dang yang dag ldan/ /gang tshe rnam pa kun 'gyur ba/ /de tshe 'bras bu zhes brjod par/ /mchog gi rnal 'byor pa yis bshad ces gsungs
253b6(rgyud 'grel): so/ /des cir 'gyur zhe na/ ji srid longs spyod pas thar bsgrub nag pos gsungs te nag po rdo rje srid pa la spyod pa ste/ /shes rab ni bde ba nyams su myong zhing 'dod chags bral ba thams cad las log pa'i phyir/ thar pa
253b7(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang thob pa ste mngon du byed pa'o/ /de ltar dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas las/ /srog ni dbus su bcug pa ste/ zla pa nyi ma 'gro ba g.yas dang g.yon bcing ba byang sems phyag rgya 'grogs pas mchog tu dga' bar
254a1(rgyud 'grel): 'grogs shing rdo rje bslang bar bya/ /chu skyes rdo rje sgra'i rang lag pad+ma'i rol pas bde ba phyir gsor ba'am/ /sa bon mi 'khor ba bde bcas shing 'jigs pa spong byed de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal/ /zhes gsungs so//
254a2(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi bcing ba nyid kyis ma thams cad 'grub par bsams nas sems brtan pa nyid gsal bar ston te/ bstan pa'i yid kyis sbyor bas na/ zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba'i sgo nas byang chub sems brtan pa'i sbyor ba byed
254a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de gang du zhe na/ chos kyi yi ge'i nang du ni/ zhes gsungs te/ chos kyi yi ge'i gzhom du med pa ste/ bdag med pa'i sa bon te/ de'i nang du ni de la zhes pa'i don to/ /des cir 'gyur zhe na/ skad cig de las rlung ni 'gags 'gyur
254a4(rgyud 'grel): te zhes te/ rlung ni srog gi rlung ste skad cig de la 'gag pa'o/ /gzhan yang ci zhe na/ yul rnams la yang chags pa med par 'gro zhes gsungs te/ yul rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams/ /nye bar longs spyod pa ni mngon par
254a5(rgyud 'grel): zhen pa med par 'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'on te chos kyi yi ge gang du shes par bya shen/ gang la mchog dang dga' bral dag thob na zhes gsungs te/ mchog dang dga' bral ni zla ba dang nyi ma'o/ /de gnyis
254a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis dbus mthong ba ni de la chos kyi yi ge ste/ sngon bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dbus su mtshon par bya'o/ /gang la 'di lta bu'i gdams dag gsal grub na/ zhes bya ba smos te/ 'di lta bu'i gsang sngags ni tshul gyi gdams dag
254a7(rgyud 'grel): gis gsal bar grub ste/ yongs su rdzogs pa grub pa de'i tshe khyim bdag mo ? mi g.yo bar bcings shes gsungs te/ khyim bdag mo rlung gi sngon du bstan pa mi g.yo zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gal te 'di de la rtsol rlung bcings pas chos
254b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi yi ge bde ba chen po'i ngo bo rdo rje lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du gyur ba gang la gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ ri bo mchog gi rtse thang spangs pa la zhes gsungs te/ ri bo mchog ni rin po che'i ri bo ste/ de nyid sngon du bstan ba'i ri bo'o/ /de'i rtse mo ni rtse mo ste/ ma lus pa'i rgyu ba dang
254b2(rgyud 'grel): mi rgyu ba'i bde ba chen po nyid gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/ /thad spangs pa ni yan lag mchog gi thang ste spyi gtsug ste/ ri khrod ma'i sa der gnas bcas la zhes pa ni ri khrod ma de lta bu'i bdag nyid grub pa'i yi ge/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gnas byas pa
254b3(rgyud 'grel): de/ de ni gnas byas pa'o/ /khyad par ji lta bu zhe na/ seng ge yis kyang mtshong par mi nus zhes gsungs te/ mchod mi nus pa ni gzhom par mi nus pa'o/ /gang gis zhe na/ seng ge'i ni gdong pa lnga pa ste/ de nyid dkyil 'khor lnga'i bdag nyid kyi
254b4(rgyud 'grel): srog gi rlung seng ges gnon par mi nus te/ drug pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /glang po che yis kyang smos ci dgos zhes gsungs te/ glang po che ni phyugs te/ nyi ma dang zla ba ste/ de dag gis thag ring por bsgoms
254b5(rgyud 'grel): dang gsal bar ga la nus zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de ltar zla ba nyi ma phyugs chen po/ /zhes gsungs te/ 'dir dgos ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du rgyu ba'i rlung la zhon pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyis thams cad las thams
254b6(rgyud 'grel): cad du/ /thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje gnas kyang mo rtogs pa'o/ /de ltar yang lus skyes pa'i lus la nges par gang du gnas shes na/ 'di'i rigs mchog dag tu 'di'i sa bon bstan zhes bya
254b7(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs pa tshigs bcad byed dang gnyis ni rtogs par bla bas 'dir ma smos so/ /gong du ji skad bstan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya gang du mthong pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po rdzogs pas/ de bstan pa'i phyir/ sngags dang
255a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud ni gcig kyang mi bya zhes gsungs te/ gcig kyang mi bya ste/ gang mi bya zhe na/ sngags kyi bzlas pa ni gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa'o/ /rgyud ni rgyud klog pa'o/ /ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhe na/ rang khyim bdag mo zhes
255a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ rang khyim bdag mo ni lhan cig rang snang ba'i ye shes kyang phyag rgya ste/ bzung ba ni bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis so/ /grol 'gyur ni yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyag rgya dang lhan cig skyes pa rnams kyis byed de zhes bya ba'o/ /de ltar
255a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dpal dus kyis 'khor lo las sems kyi snang ba tsam du yid las skyes pa'i me long gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug bsten bya ma lus sangs rgyas lnga dang sras bcas rnams kyi sten de'i ye shes 'od zer
255a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /rang gi lus dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams sgrib pa ma lus sreg/ 'dod chags la sogs bsreg cing lo gcig sbyor bas lus la ro mnyam bde ba ster zhes gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la mngon du zhen pa'i rnal 'byor ba
255a5(rgyud 'grel): des/ sngags dang rgyud la 'dzin cing zhen par mi bya'o/ /'di'i don ni 'di yin te de nyid gang ste/ byang chub kyi sems kyi yid yin par sngags so/ /de nyid dung tshogs pas rgyu yin pas na skad kyi dbyings kyi rgyal po nye bar 'khor 'dzin pa'i phyir
255a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud do/ /de la mngon par dga' bas thams cad byas pa yin no/ /zhes pa'o/ /de ltar yang dgyes pa'i rdo rje las/ sngags bzlas dka' thub med cing dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg med/ /de nyid sngags bzlas dka' thub sbyin sreg de nyid
255a7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor ba dang dkyil 'khor nyid ces gsungs so/ /de nyid kyi don gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ /de srid khyim bdag mo ni rang gi khyim gnas ma gyur zhes gsungs so/ /rang gi khyim ni thams cad stong pa nyid//
255b1(rgyud 'grel): sdig spangs kyi gnas ni rang khyim mo/ /phyag rgya chen po ni khyim bdag mo ste/ /ji srid du gnas par ma gyur pa ni thim par ma gyur pa'o/ /de srid 'dod yon lnga ste/ /re zhig mngon par byang chub pa lngas sems can mang pos bsam pa'i bya brag
255b2(rgyud 'grel): gis zhal dang/ /phyag rgya dang kha dog dbyibs la sogs pa sna tshogs kyi de ltar/ /ji ltar gnas te mi gnas so zhes bya'o/ /de yang dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las/ las kyi phyag rgya mnyam sbyor zhing/ /ye shes phyag rgya
255b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs dmigs nas/ phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas/ /'byung med bde ba de 'phel 'gyur/ /kun tu zhal dang phyag la sogs/ /kun tu dbu dang spyan dang gdod/ /kun tu 'jig rten thos par ldan/ /thams cad khyab nas gnas
255b4(rgyud 'grel): Fba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nyid lha rdzas kyi phyag rgya de nyid kyi 'bras bu'i phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i gdams dag nges par bstan cing yang de nyid bstan pa ni/ bzlas dang sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las 'di yin zhes gsungs te/
255b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol du gyur ba'i bzlas ba dang/ dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg gi las 'dis ni nyi ma re re zhing ci'i phyir gnas zhes bya ba ste/ steng du kha bltas shing ci'i phyir ku re'i ngo bo nyid 'bras bu med ces bya ba'i don to/ /'di rnams ci'i
255b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir don med pa yin zhe na/ de lta bu'i gzhon nu ma dang rtag tu ma mjal na zhes gsungs te/ de nyid rtag tu gzhon nu ma la 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ de nyid lha rdzas kyi phyag rgya ste/ de la rba rlabs med ba'i rtag tu dga' ba
255b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rim pa gang gi rjes su chags pa skye ba de rba rlabs med pa'i mdza' bas so/ /lus 'di yin te/ /byang chub ji ltar 'grub ces bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyag rgya chen po ste/ de ji ltar 'grub ce na/ sngon du bstan pa'i e baM gis
256a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge'i lus med na mi 'grub ces pa'i don to/ /gang gis rtag tu lhan skyes bde rtogs na zhes go bla'o/ /gang gis rin chen sems ni brtan byas pa zhes gsungs te/ rab tu gtum pa'i gtum mo mes zhu bar
256a2(rgyud 'grel): byas/ /bskyod par mi nus pa'i phyir gang gis brtan par byas pa'i sems rin po che byang chub kyi sems so/ /ci byas nas zhes pa la/ rang gi khyim bdag mo blangs nas/ 'di zhes bya ba gsungs te/ rang gi khyim bdag mo ni lha
256a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyi phyag rgya de nyid de/ /de la e bam gi yi ge de la bde ba chen po'i gzugs bzung nas de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po ste/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gtso bo ste/ /de nyid ni bod pa'i tshig go/ mchog gi don ni bdag
256a4(rgyud 'grel): gis rab brjod na/ bdag nag po rdo rjes mchog gis don ma bcos pa 'di brjod do zhes pa ste/ don 'di las gzhan med do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nyid dpes bstan pa'i phyir/ tshwa ni chul zhugs pa zhu ba de bzhin du ni zhes gsungs te/
256a5(rgyud 'grel): tshwa chu la zhugs pa de bzhin du khyim gyis bdag mo ye shes kyis phyag rgya'i rang bzhin blangs ba'o/ /sems ni byang chub kyi sems te/ ro gcig par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las/ khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'das/
256a6(rgyud 'grel): de yis bde ba 'dod mar brjod ces gsungs te/ /khu ba dang bde gnyid kyang rten dang brten pa ngo bo nyid de dag thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du brjod pa bde ba mnyam zhing ro gcig pa de'i skad cig las 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yang
256a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas las/ /ji srid rten dang brten pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de srid 'gyur med bar du'o/ /sems ni 'gog pa nyid mnyes nas/ /rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid ces gsungs te/ de ltar yang kha sbyor thig
256b1(rgyud 'grel): le las sna yi bu gu gnyis nas ni/ /'jug pa bde ba dus shes brjod/ /'byung ba bde ba dus yin te/ /de gnyis nyid ni gcig par grags/ /grogs med dag ni gcig bu ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dus nyid 'gro/ /srog dang bur sel mnyam gnas dang/ /
256b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung dang 'jug pa rnam par spangs/ /'gro dang 'ong ba rnam grol ba/ /dus cig tu ni de brjod do/ /'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags ma yin chags bral lam/ /gnyis po 'dres pa
256b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhom du med/ /mar ni mar du zhu gyur pa/ /'dres par gyur pa rtog med ltar/ /de bzhin 'dod chags bral ba lta/ /skad cig la ni ro gcig 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /gang gis de dang rtag tu gnas na ni/ /zhes gsungs te/ gal te gnyis
256b4(rgyud 'grel): phan tshun du'o/ /rtag tu gnas pa ni rgyun mi 'chad par de'i tshe yang 'di ltar 'gyur zhes pa'o/ /'di'i don ni de ltar bstan pa'i khams kyi khu ba dang ngo bo dag phan tshun rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o/ /gal te gzhan du 'gyur na/ khu ba'i
256b5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid zla ba'i rang bzhin no/ /longs spyod ba'i sku'o/ /khrag gi rang bzhin nyi mar snang bas sprul ba'i sku nus par gnas pa'o/ /bde ba'i ngo bo nyid du gnas pa'i khyim bdag mo dang lhan cig tu byang chub kyi sems 'di gnyis ka'i sbyor bas gong bur
256b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'khor ba'i lam nas 'das nas/ ro gcig pa rgyun 'byung ba'i dpal he ru kar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yang dpal la sbyor thig le las/ /gang tshe mgron gnas chags chen po/ /zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas gyur bas/ /
256b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku mchog yin/ gang tshe rdo rje rtse gnas pa'i/ /de tshe rdo rje spyod rdzogs pa yi/ /sku yang nus par 'gyur ba yin/ /pad+ma'i nang du gnas gyur 'dod/ /yungs kar du ni rnam par grags/ /nyi ma'i gzugs su yang dag grags//
257a1(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'i sku ru brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /de la spro zhing skye ba yi/ /pad+ma gar dbang rgyal po ni/ /pad+ma'i gtso bo ru ni 'byung zhes gsungs so/ /dpal nag po rdo rje'i do ha mdzod kyis 'grel pa paN+Di ta
257a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ saM sa ra mA na ni ya Ni ka ra NA ma sing+gA te/ bod skad du/ 'khor ba las yid nges par 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu/ /bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon
257a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o/ /'du byed sdug bsngal 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ sdug bsngal sdug bsngal la sogs brgya rtsa dgu/ /sdug bsngal kun las skyob par mdzad pa yi/ /sman pa'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo//
257a4(rgyud 'grel): kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag 'khor ba'i rgyu ni nyon mongs pa dang las/ /nyon mongs khams gsum gnas ni dgu bcu brgyad/ /zag pa'i chu bo sbyor ba nye bar len/ /rgyu dang yul dang sbyor ba'i stobs kyi byung/ /kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag/ /sna tshogs
257a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag las la byung/ /de yang nyon mongs stobs las byung/ /dge dang mi dge lung ma bstan/ /mthong la myong dang skyes nas myong/ /gzhan du myong dang ma nges pa'i/ /dkar dang gnag dang 'dren mo'i/ /'khor ba'i las ni lci gang dang/ nye
257a6(rgyud 'grel): ba gang dang goms pa gang/ /sngon byas gang yin de las ni/ /snga ma snga ma rnams smin 'gyur/ /grogs dag soms shig thog ma med pa nas/ /ma rig la sogs bcu gcig rga shi'i mdza' / /yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum zo chun tshul/ /nang gi rten 'drel
257a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dang yang du 'khor/ /tshe rabs tshe rabs grangs med de dang der/ /skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba yi/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyis yang dang yang du gdungs/ /'khrul nas 'khor gyur 'khrul cing 'khor bar 'gyur/ /kye hud srid pa'i lam gyis dug pa'i
257b1(rgyud 'grel): mgron po snams/ /sdug bsngal bde bar gzung nas mi skyob pa/ /khyed yid de la rtag tu chags byed pa/ /phyugs dang khyad par med par bla ma gsungs/ /bla mas zin pa'i skye bos mkhas pa dag/ skad cig skad cig 'gro ba lnga po kun/ /'khor ba'i sdug
257b2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal cher ma zug 'dra la/ /rus pa'i gting nas snying rje su mi skye/ /las ngan dbang gis 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir/ /yang yang skye zhing yang yang rga dang na/ /yang yang 'che 'gyur 'di ni mi sems par/ /yul la chags byed bdag gis ji ltar bya/ /gogs
257b3(rgyud 'grel): dag srid pa gsum nang gnas pa kun sdug bsngal/ /de yang mi'i sdug bsngal bdag gis mthong/ /mngal gyi sdug bsngal 'di lta bu ru gnas/ /nur nur mer mer gor gor nar nar po/ /ltar ltar mkhrang dang rkang lag rim gyis rdzogs/ /nu zho mar
257b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gso byed cing/ /shin tu nyams chung gis rgyal nayl/ /byis pa dar ma lang tsho dang/ /rgas pas slar yang byis par 'gyur/ /tsho ni mi rtag shin tu g.yo ba ste/ /yud tsam sdong pa'i mthu yang yod ma yin/ /bdag ni nges par 'chi
257b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur mi sems pa/ /grogs bdag skyes bu de ni ngo mtshar che/ /'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmigs mi shes pas/ /phyin ci log pa bzhi la gnas nas su/ /bdag ni nges par 'chi 'gyur mi sems par/ /yul la mngon zhen nyin mtshan
257b6(rgyud 'grel): don med 'das/ /'dzam bu'i gling pa dus min 'chi bas te/ /des pa can yang zad par 'gyur bas na/ /yang dang yang du des par 'chi bo zhes/ /bsam par rigs so kwa'i bzhin bzang dag/ so ka me tog rgyas pa'i dus 'di byung bar 'gyur//
257b7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gsal bas mtshon pa'i ston dus 'di 'byung zhes/ /skye bo thams cad dga' 'gyur bdag gi tshe 'di ni/ /zad par 'gyur zhes shin tu mi dgar 'gyur ba med/ /de ring 'di byas sang ni 'di bya de nas 'di bya zhes/ /srid pa g.yo ba'i rang bzhin
258a1(rgyud 'grel): ma shes don med yid brtan tshol byed pa'i/ /skye dgu 'ching/ dag gi ni chu srin khar ni gru ni zhugs pa ltar/ bya ba mthar ma phyin par yul gyi chu'i bra klong nang du lhung/ /'di ni sang bya 'di ni thang cig 'og tu bya/ /'di ni de'u re bya zhes
258a2(rgyud 'grel): skye bo sems pa na/ /gshin rje bo chen lag thogs zur gyis lha byed cing/ /mig rtsa dmar khros ma rangs gad mos re snyam 'debs/ /rnal 'byor bstan chos thams cad dang/ /sbyor ba du ma rab shes kyang/ /deng bya sang bya zhes smra zhing/ /bsam
258a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /tshe ni gnod ma rlung gis btab 'dra yi/ /chu yi chu bur bas kyang mi rtag na/ /dbugs 'byung dbugs rdub gnyis kyis log pa las/ /sar khong gang lags de ni ngo mtshar che/ /kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag/
258a4(rgyud 'grel): tshe ni yun thung shes bya'i rnam pa mang/ /tshe yi tshang kyang ci tsam mi shes pas/ /ngang pa chu las 'o ma len pa ltar/ /rang gi 'dod pa dang la blang bar gyis/ /kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag/ 'jig rten spyong ba dag la phar ltas na/ /byas ba thams
258a5(rgyud 'grel): cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu/ /ci la bsam kyang phan par mi 'byur bas/ /rang gi sems la lta ba goms bar gyis/ /kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag/ tshad ma bdun dang brda' spro rnam pa bzhi/ /mngon pa dang ni yi ge tsarya'i sa/ /mdo sde dang ni 'dul ba
258a6(rgyud 'grel): mngon pa dang/ /gzhung du bkod pa ma lus thams cad kun/ /ma mthong ma mnyan ma bshad ma bris zhes/ /de la gdung ba ma bskyed bzhin bzangs dag/ bla ma'i man ngag ces bya ba bdud rtsi'i ro/ /gang gis sems mnyam 'jog pa de tsam zhig/
258a7(rgyud 'grel): yongs su btsal gyi gzhung mang ba ci zhig dgos/ /thams cad yid ni 'khrul par byed pa'i rgyu/ /'khor ba'i gnas 'di nges pa med pas na/ /pha ma la sogs pha mar nges pas/ /nye du 'brel ba dag la chags ba spang/ /dgra/
258b1(rgyud 'grel): yang ma des de la sdang ba spang/ /nad med mang co phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'dod yon lnga la rang bzhin gyis chags spang/ /rnyed pa dang ni bkur bsti grags pa dang/ /rigs dang rus dang tshigs su bcad pa spangs/ /kye kye kwa'i ri grogs po dag
258b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten rtag sprul me dang dug 'dra bar/ /bsam nas spangs te dben par gnas par bya/ /bud med mtshan nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ /sman dang glang chen brtag pa'am gza' skar rtsis/ /mtshon cha brtag pa'am rta dpyad rang
258b3(rgyud 'grel): bzo'am/ /bstan chos ngan pa slob dang klog pa spangs/ /yul la mngon dga' i sems ni byung ba dang/ /rnam rtog de dag rnams ni byung ba na/ /bdag na des par 'chi ba dran byas la/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i gnyan po rnams kyis bzlog/ rnam
258b4(rgyud 'grel): rtog mang ba dbugs bgrang pa yis gzhil/ /'dod chags sems byung rnam par rtog pa de/ /rang bzhin mi gtsang keng rus blta bas bzlog /zhe sdang la ni byams pa'i chu yis btab/ /gti mug la ni rten 'brel lam gyis so/ /mi gtsang
258b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang byams pa rten 'brel gyi/ /man ngag bla ma'i zhabs nas 'byung bzhin bya/ /'khor ba la yid nges par 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu/ /slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
258b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar mkhan po de nyid dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rgya ba rtson seng ges 'bri ka mA la shI la'i gtsug lag khang du ba sbyar ba'o/ /slad nas bla ma de nyid dang/ lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o// //
258b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ d+harmmA d+hA du sang gla ti/ bod skad du/ chos kyi dbyings lta ba'i glu/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig kun tu ma shes na/ /srid pa gsum du rnam 'khor ba/ /sems can kun la des gnas pa'i//
259a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal nas/ /chos dbyings lta zhing gzhan min pa/ /de dag rim bzhin brjod par bya/ /zab zhi spos bral te bzhin nyid/ /'od gsal 'dus ma byas pa gang/ /ma skyes ma 'gags
259a2(rgyud 'grel): gzod nas dag/ rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yis/ /chos dbyings mdza' dang dbus med pa/ /blo mig zhi ba mo rtog bral ba/ /byings rgod rab rib med pas lta/ /gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /de nyid sbyang ba byas pa las//
259a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa de ni mya ngan 'das/ /chos kyi sku yang de nyid do/ /ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres pas/ /mar gyi snying po mi snang ba/ /de bzhin nyon mongs dang 'dres pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo/ /ji ltar 'o ma rnams spangs pas
259a4(rgyud 'grel): mar gyi snying po dri med 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyon mongs rnam sbyangs pas/ /chos dbyings shin tu dri med 'gyur/ /ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas/ /cung zhig snang bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin nyon mongs bum nang gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mi snang
259a5(rgyud 'grel): ngo/ /phyogs ni gang dang gang dag gnas/ /bum pa bu ga gtong gyur pa/ /de dang de yis phyogs nyid nas/ /'od kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba 'gyur/ /gang tshe ting 'dzin rdo rje yis/ /bum pa de nyid bcag gyur pa/ /de tshe de yi nam mkha' yi/ /
259a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug bar du snang bar byed/ /chos kyi dbyings ni skye ma yin/ /nam yang 'gag par 'gyur ba med/ /dus rnams kun tu nyon mongs med/ /thog ma bar mdza' dri mkhral/ /ji ltar rin chen bai DUrya/ /dus rnams kun tu 'od gsal yang//
259a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo yi nad na gnas gyur na/ /de yi 'od ni gsal ma yin/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis bsgribs pa'i/ /chos dbyings shin tu dri med pas/ /'khor bar 'dod ni gsal ma yin/ /ji ltar spun pas g.yogs gyur pa/ /so ba 'bras nyid mi 'dod
259b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pas/ /de ni sangs rgyas zhes mi rtags/ /ji ltar spun pa las grol na/ /'bras nyid snang bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin nyon mongs las grol na/ /chos kyi sku nyid rab tu gsal/ /ji ltar sbrum ma'i
259b2(rgyud 'grel): lto na bu/ /yod kyang mthong ba ma yin pas/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong ma yin/ /chos dbyings gang phyir bdag ma yin/ /bud med ma yin skyes pa min/ /gzung ba kun las rnam grol bas//
259b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar 'dzin par brtag par bya/ /mi gtsang mi rtag sdug bsngal zhes/ /bya ba gsum pas sems spyad byed/ /stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i med/ /rgyal bas ji skad gsungs pa ste/ /de dag kun gyis nyon mongs ldog/ /khams de nyams par bye'am
259b4(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /mchog tu sems ni sbyang byed pa'i/ /chos ni rang bzhin med pa yin/ /ji ltar ri bong? mgo yi rwa/ /brtags pa nyid de med pa ltar/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyang/ /brtags pa nyid de yod ma yin/ /phra rab rdul gyi ngo bo nyid
259b5(rgyud 'grel): glang gi rwa yang dmigs ma yin/ /ji ltar sngan bzhin phyis de bzhin/ /de la ? zhig brtan par bya/ /brtan nas gag par 'gyur ba dang/ /gnas pa dag kyang yod min na/ /byis pa ji ltar rtog par byed/ /chos
259b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings rang bzhin nam mkha' yin/ /khams ltar rgyu med rkyen med de/ /skye dang rga dang gnas pa dang/ /'jig pa med par 'dus ma byas/ /sangs rgyas chos dbyer med pa dang/ /de rigs de bzhin thob pa dang/ /brdzun med slu med 'tshe med pas/ /gdod
259b7(rgyud 'grel): nas rang bzhin zhi nyid do/ /gang phyir de ni rgya mtsho ltar/ /sgra dang dpe dang blo rnams gyis/ /gting ngad pha rol mi rnyed pa/ /de phyir rab tu zab pa nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/ /lta ba tha dad rung ma yin/ /'on kyang blo yi bya brag
260a1(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /lta ba tha dad cung zad brjod/ /dbu ba nyid du spra ba rnams/ /de don bden pa gnyis su 'dod/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam mo/ /bden gnyis rnam dbye shes pa dag/ thub pa'i bka' la mi rmongs te/ /de dag ma lus
260a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bsags nas/ /phun tshogs pha rol 'gro ba nyid/ /bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang/ /nyon mongs rnams byang rgyu 'bras dang/ /bzung dang 'dzin par gang spros pa/ /'di ni kun rdzobs bden pa'o/ /stong nyid bdag med zhi ba gang spros
260a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/ /tha dad don min rnams mi rtog /'di ni don dam bden pa'o/ /yang dag yang dag ma yin dang/ /rnam grangs rnam grangs ma yin pas/ /de gnyis so sor dbye ba byas/ /gtags tsam snang grags dngos po dang/ /tha
260a4(rgyud 'grel): snyad 'khrul pa sgyu ma dang/ /kun rdzob nyid ni rnam grangs so/ /stong pa nyid dang yang dag mdza' / /mtshan ma med dang don dam dang/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rnam grangs so/ /gang phyir sgrib pas kun rdzob ste/ /'gyur ba med phyir don dam mo//
260a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag yang dag ma yin pa'i/ /shes pa gnyis phyir bden pa gnyis/ /yang dag shes pa med ce na/ /bden te tha snyad tsam du yod/ /de nyid tshol la thog mar ni/ /thams cad yod ces brjod par bya/ /don rnams rtogs shing
260a6(rgyud 'grel): chags med la/ /phyis ni rnam par dbyen don nyid/ /bden gnyis gcig dang tha dad min/ /nyes pa bzhi bzhi gsungs phyir ro/ /gcig dang tha dad gang rtogs pa/ /de ni tshul min zhugs pa yin/ /dngos por khas len yod na ni//
260a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags zhe sdang mi zad 'byung/ /lta ba ma rungs yongs su 'dzin/ /de las byung ba'i rtsod par 'gyur/ /dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la ni/ /thob pa med cing mngon rtogs med/ /rjes mthun bzod par 'ang yod min na/ /mya ngan
260b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa 'ang smos ci dgos/ /stong pa nyid la lta nyes na/ /shes rab chung ldan phung bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sprul la bzung nyes dang/ /rig stags log pa bsgrubs pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba kun gyis stong nyid ni/ /lta kun nges bar 'byin par gsungs//
260b2(rgyud 'grel): gang dag stong pa nyid lta ba/ /de dag bsgrub tu med par gsungs/ /gang dag rang dngos gzhan dngos kyis/ /dngos dang dngos med nyid mthong ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /yang dag mthong ba ma yin no/ /med pa yod pa'i zlas grangs
260b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ yod pa 'ang med pa'i zlas grangs pa/ /de phyir med par brjod mi bya/ /yod pa nyid duAng mi brtag go/ /yod pa pa ni bde 'gror 'gro/ /med pa pa ni ngan 'gror 'gyur/ /yang dag ji bzhin yongs shes phyir/ /gnyis la mi brten thar par
260b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /tshul gnyis shing rta zhon nas su/ /rigs pa'i srab skyogs 'jugs byed pa/ /de dag de phyir ji bzhin don/ /theg pa chen po ba nyid 'thob/ /gzugs sogs ji ltar snang ba nas/ /bde gshegs bar gyi chos rnams kun/ /ri bong
260b5(rgyud 'grel): ba lang rwa yi dpes/ /dbu ma nyid du goms par bya/ /yod min med min yod med min/ /gnyis min bdag nyid du yang med/ /mdza' bzhi las ni nges grol ba/ /de nyid dbu mar mkhas rnams bzhed/ /dbu ma mdza' las rnam grol na/ /mdza' 
260b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bral phyir dbu ma 'ang med/ /mdza' dbus med par gang lta ba/ /de ni yang dag lta ba ste/ /bla na med pa'i lta ba yin/ /blo ldan rnams kyis rtag tu bsgoms/ /gang zhig lta ba 'dir zhugs pan/ /des ni thams cad mkhyen pa thob/ /rnam rig cam
260b7(rgyud 'grel): du smra ba rnams/ /ngo bo nyid ni gsum du 'dod/ /kun brtags gzhan dbang yongs grub po/ /brtags dang rgyu las skyes pa dang/ /mi 'gyur phyir na go rim bzhin/ /rnam par rtog pa gang grang gis/ /dngos po gang gang rnam brtags pa/ /de nyid
261a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu brtags pa yi/ /ngo bo nyid de de med do/ /gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam rtog yin te rkyen las byung/ /grub ni de la snga ma po/ /rtag tu med par gyur pa gang/ /yod dang med pa'i mdza' gnyis kyis/ /
261a2(rgyud 'grel): de phyir de nyid gzhan dbang las/ /gzhan min gzhan pa yin pa 'ang min/ /mi rtag la sogs bzhin du brjod/ /chu shel bairU rya yis dpes/ /ngo bo nyid gsum shes par bya/ /bdag dang chos su brtags pa dang/ rnam par dag dang
261a3(rgyud 'grel): ma dag dang/ /'gyur med phyin ci ma log pa/ /rim bzhin re re 'ang gnyis gnyis so/ /blo gros bzang po thams cad ni/ /nang sems pa la brtson pa yin/ /bzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba'i/ /rnam shes dam pa'i don du yod/ /chos rnams
261a4(rgyud 'grel): 'ba' yang skye ba dang/ /'gag pa cung zad yod min te/ /skyes pa 'ba' zhig kho na ni/ /skye ba dang ni 'gag par 'gyur/ /yod min chos rnams de dag snang/ /bems po las min gzhan las min/ /med pa las min nyes gnyis phyir//
261a5(rgyud 'grel): de phyir shes pa'i bdag nyid yod/ /rnam shes bems po'i rang bzhin las/ /bzlog par rab tu skye bar gsungs/ /bems min rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /de 'dir bdag nyid rig par 'dong/ /nam mkha' sa rlung nyi ma dang/ /rgya mtsho phyogs dang
261a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bab chu ni/ /nang gi shes pa yang dag gis/ /cha yin phyi rol ltar snang ngo/ /gsal ba'i rang bzhin du snang bas/ /de dag 'brel pa lkog gyur min/ /gang dang 'brel pas gang rig pa/ /de yis rig bya de rig 'gyur/ /ral gri'i so dang so rtse bzhin/ /blo yis rang
261a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dor zhe na/ rang nyid snang ba dor min par/ /dgongs pa nges par 'grel las gsungs/ /de'i phyir blo yis mtshan nyid ni/ /rang rig par ni grub pa yin/ /de nyid rtogs par dka' bas na/ /'di yi ngo bo dpyad mi nus/ /rang rig de yang phra ba'i
261b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis phra bar gzigs/ /rang la gnas kyang bdag 'dra pas/ /rmongs pa'i phyir na mthong ba med/ gsal dang blo ni bdag nyid kyis/ /'brel pa yong phyir don tsam yin/ /shes pa'i rang bzhin bden pa ste/ /rnam pa brdzun
261b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'khrul pa yin/ /sems ni rnam par bslad pa'i phyir/ /gcig nyid gnyis su snang ba yin/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dbye ba las/ /shin tu mkhas pa cis ma yin/ /gzung ba'i rnam pa mi g.yo'i phyir/ /phyi rol lta bur snang pa yin/ /'dzin pa'i rnam
261b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rab g.yo bas/ /nang lta bur ni snang ba nyid// mtshan ma de ni spangs nas su/ /ye shes nam mkha' lta bur bsgom/ /sems kyis rang bzhin zag pa med/ /zag bcas sa bon ma zad par/ /kun zhi gnas skabs de dag nyid/ /zang nas zag pa med pa'i dbyings
261b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grol ba'i sku dang ni rtag? tu nyi zer nyi ma bzhin/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams gnas yin pas/ /skyob pa rnams kyis chos sku'o/ /nyan thos theg par thugs pa rnams/ /bdag dang bdag gis dben pa yi/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /bzhi lnga 'das
261b5(rgyud 'grel): dus ni gsum yang rung/ /yod pa thams cad gzung bya yin/ /dmigs dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed/ /de gnyis dam pa'i don du 'dod/ /bden pa mthong dang goms pa las/ /nyon mongs spangs pa zhes bshad pa/ /bden pa dag ni rnam bzhi ste//
261b6(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal de bzhin kun 'byung dang/ /'gog pa lam ste de lta na/ /de dag ji ltar mngon rtogs rim/ /sdug bsngal nyer len phung po'o/ /kun 'byung las dang nyon mongs te/ /'gog pa mya ngan 'das pa gnyis/ /lam ni phyogs mthun sum du
261b7(rgyud 'grel): bdun/ /tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pa/ /bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor/ /dge sbyong tshul ni de med lam/ /'bras bu 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/ /de dag brgyad cu rtsa dgu'o/ /grol lam zad pa rnams dang bcas/ /'bras bu bzhin rnam gzhag pa
262a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rgyu lnga dag ni srid phyir ro/ /nyan thos rnam bzhi sprul pa dang/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gyur ba dang/ /zhe bgrod grub mdza' 'dzin pa'o/ /de ni gnyis bzhi bco brgyad de/ /gnyis ni bye brag smra ba dang/ /de bzhin mdo sde
262a2(rgyud 'grel): smra ba'o/ /rnam pa med pa'i shes pa yis/ /gzugs la sogs pa don thig 'dod/ /de ni bye drag smra ba yin/ /gang zhig don gyis phan gtags pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan rnams la nyams myong bas/ /don rig 'dod pa mdo sde pa'o/ /gzhi ni
262a3(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun phal chen dang/ /thams cad yod smra gnas brtan pa/ /mang pos bkur ba bco brgyad ni/ /shar dang nub dang gangs rig gnas/ /'jig rten 'das par smra ba'i sde/ /rtag par smra ba'i sde pa dang/ /lnga tshen dge 'dun phal chen pa/ /gzhi kun
262a4(rgyud 'grel): yong smra 'od srung sde/ /sa ston sde dang 'od srung sde/ /mang thos gos dmar slob ma dang/ /rnam par phye ste smra ba'i sde/ /thams cad yod par smra ba yin/ /rgyal byed tshal gnas 'jigs med gnas/ /gtsug lag khang chen gnas brtan pa/ /sa sgrogs
262a5(rgyud 'grel): ris dang srung ba pa/ /gnas ma bu yi sde pa ni/ /kun gyis bkur ba rnams pa gsum/ /yul don slob don bye brag gi/ thA dad rnam pa bco brgyad do/ rang rgyal byang chub don gnyer bas/ /gzung ba'i rtog pa spangs phyir dang/ /'dzin pa ma
262a6(rgyud 'grel): spangs phyir na ste/ /rten gyi bse ru lta bu'i lam/ /bskal pa brgya yi mthar thug par/ /bsgoms pas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/ /yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum mo/ /sngon dang phyi mthar gnyis
262a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang/ /bar du brgyad yongs rdzogs ldan la/ /ma rig nyon mongs sngon gnas skabs/ /'du byed dag ni sngon 'das kyis/ /rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin/ /ming dang gzugs ni de phan chad/ /skye mched drug dad tshun chad do/ /de ni
262b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum 'dus tshun chad do/ /reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyis/ /rgyu shes nus pa tshun chang do/ /tshor 'khrig tshun chad sred pa ni/ /longs spyod 'khrig pa chags bcas kyi/ /nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams/ /thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'o/ /de
262b2(rgyud 'grel): srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /las de nyid ni srid pa yin/ /nyid mtshams sbyong ba skye ba yin/ /tshor ba'i bar ni rga shi yin/ /'di ni gnas skabs bar 'dod lo/ /gtso bo'i phyir na yan lag bsgrogs/ /sngon dang phyi mdza' bar dag la/ /rmongs
262b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro/ /nyon mongs gsum mo las gnyis so/ /bzhi bdun de bzhin 'bras bu yin/ /gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras mdor bsdus pa/ /bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las/ /'dir ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te/ /'byung ba 'bras bu nyid du 'dod//
262b4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag bcu gnyis de dag las/ /rgyu ni rnams lnga 'bras bu bdun/ /'phan par byed dang 'phangs pa dang/ /mngon par 'grub byed grub pa dang/ /nyes dmigs kyis ni yan lag ste/ /gsum bzhi gsum gcig gcig rim bzhin/ /'du byed sdug
262b5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal 'gyur ba yis/ /sdug bsngal la nyid na rim bzhin du/ /lnga dang gnyis dang lnga yin no/ /khams gsum na ni rim bzhin du/ /bcu gnyis bcu gcig bcu yis 'jug/ brdzus skyes yan lag bcu gtsig gis/ /mngal dang sgong skyes
262b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis kyis/ /drod gser las skyes ci rigs 'jug/ de bzhin 'gro ba lnga la skyar/ /gsum po dag las gnyis 'byung ste/ /gnyis las bdun 'byung bdun las kyang/ /gsum 'byung srid pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /nyid ni yang dang yod du 'khor
262b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i ngo bo rnams pa dang/ /gang zhig gang du gang gis dang/ /ji ltar ji srid nyes dmigs ni/ /mdza' yas tshogs kyis rab tu 'jug/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim na glang chen bzhin//
263a1(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bdag sngon? gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/ /chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'byung ba/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /mya ngan gang las 'da' ba dang/ /gang
263a2(rgyud 'grel): zhig gang gis gang gi tshe/ /gang du gang phyir ji lta bur/ /ji srid ngo bo rnam pa dang/ /thob bya dbye ba phrin las dang/ /yon tan tshogs kyis ldog pa'o/ /mu stegs pa ni rnam pa gnyis/ /sprul pa pa dang rang rgyud pa/ /de yang skyes thob
263a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor 'byung ngo/ /skyes thob rigs chad log sred can/ /sbyor byung bsam gtan rtog ge ba/ /bsam gtan pa ni mngon shes mthus/ /lta ba drug cu gnyis su rtogs/ /rtag par smra ba rnam bzhi dang/ /kha cig rtag par smra ba bzhi//
263a4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' yod sogs bzhi mi spong bzhi/ rgyud med gnyis ni sngon mthar rtog /'du shes yod smra bcu drug dang/ /med smra brgyud dang de bzhin du/ /yod min med min smra ba brgyad/ /chad smra bdun dang tshe 'di la/ /mya ngan 'da' bar smra ba lnga/ /phyi
263a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i mthar rtog lta ba'o/ /rtog ge pa ni grangs can sogs/ /tshad mas grub mdza' 'dzin pa'o/ /grangs can yon tan gsum du brjod/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun pa'o/ /rangs dang mgu dang kun dga' dang/ /bde bzhi ba yi sems nyid dag/ res
263a6(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' yang ni snang gyur pa/ /de dag snying stobs yon tan no/ /mi dga' ba dang yongs gdung dang/ /mya ngan 'dod dang mi bzod dag/ gang du snang ba'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /de dag rdul gyis rtags su 'dod/ /rmongs pa de bzhin gti mug dang/ /bag med
263a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyid dang ga re? la ba dag/ de dag mun pa'i yon tan no/ /yon tan gsum gyi rang bzhin mchog/ mthong ba'i lam du 'gyur ma yin/ /mthong pa'i lam du gang gyur pa/ /sgyu ma bzhin du shin tu gsog /rang bzhin las ni chen po ste/ de la sangs
263b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal rnams su 'byung/ /de las dbang po bcu gcig dang/ /de tsam lnga'o de lnga las/ /'byung ba lnga ste nyi shu bzhi/ /gtso bo nyid dang rnam 'gyur ro/ /de dag sems pa yod ma yin/ /skyes bu kun rigs sems pa can/ /de dag nyi shu lngas shes na/ /ral pa 'ang byi
263b2(rgyud 'grel): po gtsug pud kyis/ /bsti gnas gang du dga' ba der/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /bye brag pa ni don drug 'dod/ /rdzas dang yon tan las dang spyi/ /bye brag 'du ba rnams pa drug/ rdzas dgu yon tan nyi shu bzhi/ /las lnga spyi gnyis bye brag gnyis/
263b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin 'du ba'ang rnam gnyis te/ /de nyid drug shes rig pa'i mchog/ /rig byed kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /gcer bu pa rnams don dgu sma/ /srog dang zag pa snom pa dang/ /nges rang rga dang 'chi ba dang/ /las dang sdig dang bsod nams dang/ /thar pa zhes
263b4(rgyud 'grel): bya don dgu po/ /gang gis mthong ste rnam par dag/ rigs pa can don bcu drug 'dod/ /tshad ma gzhal bya the tshom dang/ /dgos pa dpe dang grub mdza' dang/ /cha shes rtog gi gtan la dpag/ rtsod dang rdzod dang rgol ba dang/ /rgyu skar snang ba'i tshig dor ba?/ /ltag
263b5(rgyud 'grel): char chad pa'i gnas rnams te/ /bcu drug gis ni nges par 'gyur/ /spyod pa ba ni don bzhir brjod/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /de dag 'dus ma byas pa ste/ /rtag tu skye 'gag med par gnas/ /de bas las 'bras yod ma yin/ /sngon dang phyi mdza' de bzhin
263b6(rgyud 'grel): med/ /gang zhig de ltar rnam dpyod pa/ /mthong ba tsam gyis rnam grol 'gyur/ /khyab 'jug byed rgyur smra ba rnams/ /nyi ma'i nang na khyab bdag 'jug/ skar nang 'od gnas zla ba yin/ /rlung nang ba ni 'od zer can/ /snang ba can ni nyi ma yin/ /rig byed nang
263b7(rgyud 'grel): na snyan tshig dang/ lha nang ba ni brgya byin te/ /dbang po'i nang na yid yin no/ /'byung ba'i nang na sa yin zhing/ /nga ni bde byed drag po'ang yin/ /srin po gnod sbyin nang rol bdag/ /nor lha'i nang na me lha nga/ /ri bo'i nang na nga ri rab/ /nga ni yi ge'i nang na
264a1(rgyud 'grel): a /nya dang rus sbal phag dang ni/ /mi yi seng ge mi shung dang/ /dga' byed ra ma na nag po/ /sangs rgyas ci rti ka dang bcu/ /gang gis khyab 'jug yon tan rnams/ /rtag tu bsgoms na bde thong 'gyur/ /dbang phyug byed rgyur 'dod
264a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /byed pa po ni dbang phyug yin/ /de ni yon tan brgyad dang ldan/ /rab phra yang ba mchod par 'os/ /bdag por gyur dang dbang du gyur/ /gar yang phyin dang 'dod dgur ldan/ /de bzhin dga' mgur gnas pa'o
264a3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa dag dang rkang pa dang/ /mig dang gdong dang lus rnams kyi/ /mang po bskyed cing 'jig byed pas/ /des na phra bar brjod pa yin/ /mnga' dang rlung dang sa dang ni/ /chu dang me dag gnas byed cing/ /sdud pa dang ni rgyas byed pas/ /des na
264a4(rgyud 'grel): yang bar brjod pa yin/ /'jig rten gsum na mchod gyur cing/ /gnas pa dag dang rgyu ba dang/ /'byung po kun gyis brjed pas na/ /des na mchod par 'os pa yin/ /'byung po kun la dbang byed cing/ /gnas pa dag dang rgyu ba dang/ /gang dang
264a5(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod de byed pas/ /des na bdag por khyur ces bya/ /bdag la rag las rang dbang can/ /dga' la 'ang 'jigs pa yod min te/ /thams cad dbang du gyur bas na/ /des na dbang du gyur ces bya/ /mtho ris ngan stong kun khyab pas/ /des na gang
264a6(rgyud 'grel): yang phyin zhes bya/ /snying stobs rdul dang gun pa gsum/ /de dag gang la gnas gyur pa/ /mig 'byed tsam gyis byed gyur pas/ /des na 'dod dgur ldan zhes bya/ /thar pa'ang yang na lha yis lus /gang du bdag nyid thar 'dod pa dag/ thams
264a7(rgyud 'grel): cad 'dod pas thob 'gyur bas/ /des na dga' dgur gnas shes bya/ /gang zhig bu gyur cig bu kyes nas 'dug/ /de yis 'di kun skyes shing 'jig par byed/ /de ni dbang bdag mchog sbyin lha mchog sbyin lha mchog bya/ /yon tan byed po shin tu zhi ba 'thob
264b1(rgyud 'grel): skye ba po 'di shes pa yod min te/ /bdag gis bde sdug bdag la rang dbang med/ /dbang phyug gis btang yang na mtho ris sam/ /g.yang sa dag tu 'gro ba kho nar 'gyur/ /dbang phyug rdza mkhan lta bur sna tshogs 'di sprul byed por ma gyur na/ /ri rab 'di
264b2(rgyud 'grel): mi grub cing sa gzhi 'di min rgya mtsho 'ang ma yin te/ /nyi zla skar ldan 'di ltar bkod pa 'di dag mig yul du med 'gyur/ /yod pa'i phyir na dbang phyug 'gro ba'i byed po yin zhes 'ga' zhig smra/ /phra zhing bsam gyis mi khyab rab srab byed pa kun rig kun byed pa//
264b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor goms pas thob pa blo can bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan yul/ /nyi ma zla ba sa chu me rlung phyogs dang nam mkha' i lus can te/ /zhi ba'i bde dga' 'dod pa rnams kyis dbang phyug rtag tu bsgoms/ /dus la bltos par smra ba rnams//
264b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos kun dus kyi bsgyur ba ste /gang gi zhang po nor lha dang/ /gang pha nor rgyas yin pa yi/ /'jigs med khro bo 'ang bsang gyur pas/ /dus ni 'da' bar dka' ba yin/ /'byung ba rnams ni dus kyis 'byin/ /skye dgu rnams spud dus kyis byed//
264b5(rgyud 'grel): dus kyi gnyid logs gsad par byed/ /dus ni 'da' bar bka' ba yin/ /bsrung ba gsum rtseg 'obs ni rgya mtsho dang/ /dmag mi srin po nor ni nor sbyin sbyor/ /gang gis bstan bcos pa sangs tshad mnyam pa'i/ /sgra sgrogs bu de 'ang dus kyis dbang
264b6(rgyud 'grel): gis nyams/ /ngo bo nyid rgyur smra ba ni/ /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub/ /me yi dmar ba nyid dang ni/ /dam pa gzhan rab gdung ba/ /drug po 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ /gang rno bar gyur pa su yis byas/ /ri dags bya yi ri mo su yes byas/
264b7(rgyud 'grel): bu ram shing mngar ni ma? kha ba dag /'di dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ /nyi ma tsha zhing zlar ba bsil ba dang/ skye bo chags shing thub pa de min la/ /bde ba rab sil sdug bsngal rab gdung ba/ /drug po 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ /gang dag rgyu
265a1(rgyud 'grel): med smra ba ni/ /thams cad rgyu la bltos med par/ /dngos po rnams ni skye ba ste/ nyi ma pad+ma'i gser sogs/ /sna tshogs gang gis byas pa yin/ /rma bya'i mdongs la sogs pa yang/ /sna tshogs gang gis sprul pa yin/ /ji ltar
265a2(rgyud 'grel): char rlung la sogs pa/ /glo bur 'byung phyir rgyu med ltar/ /sdug bsngal la sogs rgyu med nyid/ /shin tu rgya chen rab zab la/ /sgyid lug shin tu ma sbyangs la/ /bdag bzhin sgra dag gti mug gis/ /de ltar theg pa che la smod/ /tshul khrims las
265a3(rgyud 'grel): ni nyams bla yi/ /lta las cis kyang ma yin te/ /tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris 'gro/ /lta bas go 'phang mchog tu 'gyur/ /gti mug dbang gis bsgribs gyur te/ /gang zhig yang dag bgegs byed pa/ /de la dge ba'i 'gro ba'ang med/ /thar
265a4(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa/ smos ci dgos/ /gnod pa'i sa bon gyur pa yi/ /mu stegs byed mang mthong nas ni/ /thar 'dod skye bo 'dod rnams la/ /snying rje mi 'gyur su zhig yod/ /de phyir thar pa don gnyer rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings su lta bar gyis/ /chos kyi
265a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyings su lta ba'i glu/ /slob dpon chen po'i dI? paM ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ u pa de sha
265a6(rgyud 'grel): gA ya bra di ba nA ma/ bod skad du/ man ngag sku'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i sku ni gcig nyid la/ /gdul bya'i mos pa'i dbang gis ni/ /phyi nang gsang ba gsum du gnas/ /bde gshegs
265a7(rgyud 'grel): sbrul pa sna tshogs ston/ /yab ni thabs kyis rang bzhin la/ /yum ni shes rab rang bzhin te/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bo yin/ /las dang thugs rje'i dbang gis ni/ /la la zhi zhing la la khro/ /zhi bas
265b1(rgyud 'grel): phan par ma gyur na/ /khro bo de bzhin gshegs pas bstan/ /gdod nas ngag pa'i snying po la/ /gzugs sku mtshan dang dpe byang ldan/ /rang rgyud dngos po ma yin par/ /rang dbang can gyi sku nyid do/ /skye dang 'chi ba'i cho 'phrul rnams//
265b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can lta bu ma yin te/ /skye rga na 'chi rang gis shes/ /zhen pa rnams las 'da' tshul ston/ /skye dang 'chi ba mi dmigs pas/ /bag chags lus las grol gyur nas/ /rdo rje lta bu'i sku yin pas/ /bltas pa tsam gyis dri ma tha ?
265b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshon gzhi dri med me long la/ /mtshan bcas 'dzin med gzugs brnyan 'char/ /zung 'jug blo gros ngo bor rtogs/ /gnyug ma par ldan me long la/ /bcud dang rtsal spyod gzugs brnyan 'char/ /ltan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor rtog/ 'khor
265b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das gzhi med me long la/ /'gro ba drug gis gzugs brnyan 'char/ /bsgom du med pa'i ngo bor rtogs/ /shes rab gsum gyi me long la/ /yon tan mdza' dang gzugs brnyan 'char/ /yongs su med pa'i ngo bor rtogs/ /bcu gcig ldan pa'i
265b5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa la/ /brgyad dang ldan pa'i slob ma yis/ /zhabs kyi pad+mar rab tud nas/ /ma nyams gsum gyis mchod pa dbul/ /nges pa'i shes pa skyes gyur nas/ /spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ni/ /ma 'dres gcig tu rtogs pa yis/ /dus 'di nyid la
265b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ma ni dag sku'o sgron ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ yA na bA ka pra dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ theg pa gsung gi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ khams gsum sems
265b7(rgyud 'grel): can ma lus kun/ /ma rig mun pas 'thebs pa la/ /ston pa bcom ldan shAka? thub kyis/ /gsung gi sgron ma 'di bstan pas/ /dam chos rim pa gsum du gsungs/ /rgyas par gsung dang 'bring du bshad/ /bsdus pa'i don du bstan pa'o/ /de la
266a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par gsungs pa ni/ /dug gsum nyon mongs cha mnyam pa'i/ /gnyen po brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ /theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o/ /'bring ni gsung rab bcu gnyis dang/ /mod dang dbyangs bsnyad lung bstan dang/ /tshigs bcad ched
266a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod gleng gzhi dang/ /rtogs brjod de byung skyes pa'i rabs/ /rgyas dang rmad byung gtan la dbab/ /bsdus pas sde snod gsum dag ste/ /mdo sde 'dul ba chos mngon no/ /lta ba gtsor ston mngon pa ste/ /bsgom pa gtsor ston mdo sde yin/ /spyod pa gtsor
266a3(rgyud 'grel): ? 'dal ba'o/ /de yang rnam pa gsum yin te/ /che dang chung dang khyad par ro/ /dang po lnga ni me do yin te/ /de rjes drug ni 'dul ba yin/ /nangs kyis tha ma mngon pa'o/ /de ni theg pa chung du'i gzhung/ /rgyas dang rmad byung med yin te/ /med? sogs dgu
266a4(rgyud 'grel): ni? 'dul ba la/ /gtan la dbab pa mngon pa'i sde/ /de ni theg pa chen po'i gzhung/ /mdo sogs rim lnga mdo yin te/ /de rjes rnam bzhi 'dul ba la/ /tha ma gsum ni mngon pa'o/ /de ni khyad par bla med gzhung/ /de bzhin sbyor ba shes par bya/ /khyad par
266a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang du byas nas ni/ /mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa dang/ /'bras du rdo rje'i theg pa'o/ /de gnyis rgyu 'bras khyad par yang/ /don cig la yang ma rmongs te/ /thabs mang dka' ba med pa yis/ /dbang po rnon pos dbang byas te/ /pha rol phyin pa'i theg
266a6(rgyud 'grel): pa pas/ /sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags /sngags la rgyud sde bzhir gsungs te/ /bya ba'i rgyud dang spyod pa'i rgyud/ /rnal 'byor rgyud dang bla med pa'o/ /dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud?/ /bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la/ /rab la rnal 'byor bla med
266a7(rgyud 'grel): do/ /yang na mi rigs bzhi las ni/ bram ze'i rigs la bya ba'i rgyud/ /dmangs rigs la ni spyod pa yi/ /de bzhin rje'u rigs rnal 'byor rgyud/ /rgyal rigs rnal 'byor bla med do/ /'di ni bla med rgyud du grags/ /rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu
266b1(rgyud 'grel): las/ /'di ni thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs/ /zab cing rgya re'i zhi byed 'di/ /rgyud pa rnams pa bzhi ru bshad/ /rig gi rgyud dang don gyi brgyud/ /byin rlabs brgyud dang brda yi brgyud/ /ma zhugs rnam bzhi shes par bya/ /theg pa gsung gi sgron ma rdzogs so// //
266b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sam darsha pra dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ yab dag lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra pa'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhan skyes ye shes ster mdzod pa/ /dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud/ /mtshon chod lta ba ma 'gags pas/
266b3(rgyud 'grel): grub mdza' kun dang phyogs gcig mthun/ /yin lugs lta ba mdza' dang bral/ /grub mdza' kun gyi blo ma shor/ /lta ba rgya che mdza' bral ni/ /mdza' bzhi'i skyon dang bral bas na/ /grub mdza' kun la mi gnas pas/ /yang dag lta bar yid ches bya/ /blta
266b4(rgyud 'grel): bya blta byed gnyis dang bral/ /lta ba med pa'i lta ba ni/ /lta ba'i dam pa kho na yin/ /dngos 'dzin lta ba kun las grol/ /ma rig pa yi mig phye nas/ /ye shes mig gis bltas pas ni/ /rig pa dri ma med pa lta/ /dri med mthong zhes lta ba yin/ /mthong bya mthong
266b5(rgyud 'grel): byed gnyis bral nas/ /zung 'jug lta ba gza' gtad med/ /phyag rgya chen po lta mchog yin/ /de nyid rtog pa'i yon tan ni/ /mtshan nyid bzhi ru shes par bya/ /rig pa dri ma med pa la/ /rnam dag sgrib g.yogs med pas na/ /gzung 'dzin g.ya' yis ma gos pa'o//
266b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig gi sangs rgyas e ma'o/ /rig pa gcer bur gnas pa la/ /mtshan ma'i gos kyis ma g.yogs par/ /rang 'byung ye shes drod po che/ /chags sdang mtshan ma me bzhin sreg/ kun shes rig pa rten med pa'o/ /bag chags srubs su ma zhugs par//
266b7(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal mkhar pa gzugs mi dgos/ /'dod yon so nam rang sar grol/ /'dzin med rig pa brlings pa ni/ /dngos 'dzin yu ba bud pas na/ /snang grangs 'dzin pa nus pa yin/ /phyogs cha med pa'i blta ba'o/ /yang dag lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
267a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du /ratna? na b+ha ba dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ rin po che sgom pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal sma ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma rig mun pa sel mdzad pa/ /dam pa skyes mchog/
267a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la 'dung/ /dang po zin par bya ba dang/ /bar du brtan par bya ba gces/ /tha me bogs kyis dbyung thabs so/ /mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob dang/ /ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang/ /rtags dang nyams myong yon tan dang/ /tshad dang skyon dang
267a3(rgyud 'grel): bcos thabs so/ /ma zin zin par byed pa la/ /lus kyi gnad dang dmigs pa'i nad/ /rlung gi gnad ni shes par bya/ /zin pa brtan par byed 'dod na/ /rtsal sbyong gsum la mkhas par bya/ /brtan pa gong du bogs 'byin na/ /bogs 'byin
267a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum la goms par bya/ /mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob la/ /ngo sprod bzhi bzhir shes par bya/ /dang po mnyam gzhag do sprod? ni/ /rig pa mdza' rkyang ngar dang chos/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon/ /rig pa thang sha gcad pa ni/ /gzhu bzangs
267a5(rgyud 'grel): gdungs pa'i dpe yis mtshon/ /de nas rig pa rtsal sbyang ni/ /dar chen rlung gis spyod pas mtshon/ /rig pa rjen par gzhag pa ni/ /gnyug ma lta bu'i dpes yis mtshon/ /rjes thob la yang ngo sprod bzhi/ /mnyam gzhag rjes thob med par sprad/
267a6(rgyud 'grel): rkyen la drag zhan med par sprad/ /dbang po thogs rdugs med par sprad/ /rang bzhin gsal ba dri med yin/ /mtshan nyid nyams su myong ba'o/ /rtags la rnam pa bzhir gsungs te/ /btang na 'gro la gzhag na sdod/ /dgos pa'i dus su slegs? pa dang//
267a7(rgyud 'grel): shes bzhin gnad du tshud pa'o/ /nyams myong la yang de bzhin te/ /bde ba dang ni gsal ba ngang/ /mi rtog pa dang mi g.yo ba'o/ /yon tan mngon par shes pa 'char/ /tshad ni rtsa ba brtan pa dang/ /de bzhin rtse mo rno ba nyid/ /bar ni gsal ba bar
267b1(rgyud 'grel): dang chas/ /dmigs pa sna tshogs sgyur shes pa'o/ /skyon ni bying dang rmugs pa dang/ /de bzhin rgong dang g.yeng ba'o/ /bcos pa la yang rnam gsum ste/ /rin chen gser ltar bcos pa dang/ 'tsho mdzad sman pa lta bu dang/ /bi shwa kar ma'i bzo bzhin no/ /
267b2(rgyud 'grel): man ngag bsgom pa'i sgron ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sa ma tA wa stu pra dzI pA nA ma/ bod skad du/ mnyam nyid gzhi'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang snang me long ston mdzad pa/ /dam pa skyes mchog rnams
267b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud/ /gzhi la rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /spyi yi gzhi dang bye brag gzhi/ /spyi? ni gnyis su lung ma bstan/ /gzhi nyid ming 'dogs bral ba yin/ /dper na ga bur sman bzhin no/ /ma bcos khas len bral ba yin/ /nus pa sna tshogs 'char bas na/ /gzhi nyid
267b4(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'i nus pa yin/ /sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes 'byung/ /de ma rtogs pa'i sems can ni/ /lus dang bag chags gnyis su snang/ /bye phrag bzhi la gnyis yin te/ /'khor ba'i gzhi dang 'das pa'o/ /'khor ba'i mtshan nyid 'dus byas pa/ /rgyus
267b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rkyen gyis bskyed pas na/ /snod dang bcung ni mi rtags so/ /bus pa'i la sogs 'gyur bas na/ /de ma shes pas yang yang 'khor/ /'das pa'i gzhi la gnyis yin te/ /dran pa bzhi yis dos pa zung la/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab bo/ /thabs
267b6(rgyud 'grel): shes gnyis kyis gtan la dbab/ /A li thabs kyis rang bzhin la/ /kA li shes rab rang bzhin no/ /skye med mtshon bas a zhes bya/ /'phag med mtshan pas ka yin no/ /ri ri li li zung 'jug go/ zla ba dang ni nyi ma gnyis/ g.yas dang g.yon par
267b7(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /des nas dus tshod 'pho ba dang/ /chu tshod dbyug gu skad cig dang/ /lte ba dang ni snying ka dang/ /mgrin pa dang ni spyi bo dang/ /'khor lo bzhi ru shes par bya/ /'byung ba lnga dang phyi nang gnyis/ /ri snyoms ma zhu shes par bya/ /phyi nang gnyis su
268a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa bya?/ /rten 'brel chos rnams ma shes na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams mi shes so/ /lte bar a gnas gsang bar spro/ /snying khar raM gnas 'bar ba ni/ /mgrin par h+ri las gsal ba ni/ /spyi bor haM du bsgom par
268a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /bde stong gnyis su gsal bas ni/ /mtshan par phyag rgya chen po yin/ /spong dang sbyor dang skyur dang grol/ /zad dang 'phen dang tshigs dang don/ /sde snod gsum gyi don yang ston/ /dus tshod 'byung ba bzhi yis mtshon/ /ma nor
268a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ru shes par bya/ /sde tshan lnga yis nang rnams 'joms/ /A li krA? li mgrin par gnas/ /nam mkha' i yi ge nga rgyal 'joms?/ /tsa yi sde tshan rkan las 'byung/ /me yi yi ges zhe sdang 'joms/ /Ta yi sde tshan lce las byung/ /rlung gi yi
268a4(rgyud 'grel): ges phrag dog 'joms/ /ta yi sde tshan so nas 'byung/ /sa yi yi gis gti mug 'joms/ /pha yi sde tshan mchu nas 'byung/ /chu yis yi ges 'dod chags 'joms/ /hUM gi 'og gis rlung rnams sbus/ /a yis steng gi bde ba gsal/ /has?
268a5(rgyud 'grel): yis bde ba 'tshal bar byed/ /hi ka gis bde ba gnas nas 'dren/ /phyi nas 'byung ba'i dgra gshed dang/ /nang nas 'byung ba'i ro snyoms dang/ /phyi yi dus tshod g.yon nas bzung/ /nang gi rus 'tshod g.yas nas gzung/ /lo yi mgo bo byi ba yin//
268a6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i mgo bo stag yin pas/ /lho dang byang dang shar dang nub/ /'byung ba bzhi ru shes par byas/ /shes na thams cad 'grub par nges/ /tshig cig stan pas sangs rgyas dang/ /rdzas cig rnyed pas don yod 'grub/ /sngag gcig bzlas pa la nus
268a7(rgyud 'grel): ba 'byung/ /mnyam nyid gzhi'i sgron ma rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ko Ti naShtha pha la cI? pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ /'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i chu las
268b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol mdzad pa/ /dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud/ /sgrub pa'i chos la don yod pas/ /dam pas gsungs pa yid ches gyis/ /mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma ni/ /rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya/ /gnas skabs rgyu yi 'bras bu dang//
268b2(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug rtog pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /rgyu 'thun 'bras bu mi stor bas/ /byas pa'i chos la nan tan skyed/ /nam mkha' rdo rje grong 'jug gsum/ /las su rung ba'i 'bras bu yin/ /rtog pa'i 'bras bu sku lnga ste/ /ngo bo stong pa chos sku la/ /rang bzhin
268b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba longs sku yin/ /mtshan nyid nyams myong sprul pa'i sku/ /zung 'jug ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ /rang grol rang dag bde chen sku/ /don la mtshon du ci yang med/ /tha snyad blo la rgyu 'bras gnyis/ /zhen pa bzlog phyir bstan pa las/ /don dam brjod
268b4(rgyud 'grel): du med pas na/ /rgyal bas chig? gcig gsungs pa med/ /mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la sh+ris mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ho d+hi tsarya dI paM nA ma/ /bod skad du/ /byang chub spyod pa'i sgron
268b5(rgyud 'grel): ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal gdungs pa la/ /shi byed bsil ldan dri med bshad/ /'jig rten khams 'di mi rtag ste/ /dper na
268b6(rgyud 'grel): 'ja' tshon yal dang 'dra/ /lo zla chos grangs 'chi dang nye/ /bu tshal sogs grogs rnams dang khor nas gcig pu 'gro dgos na/ /bar do bzhi las 'chi ba'i tshe/ /sdug bsngal ri bos mnan pas sdug/ bdun tsho bdun du bar do ru/ /gshed pos 'tshe zhing
268b7(rgyud 'grel): sdug re bsngal/ /ma rig 'khrul pas lus blangs te/ /nyon mongs lnga yi sems kyang dkrugs/ /dper na shing rta'i 'khor lo gzhin /'gro ba drug gis sdug bsngal myong/ /sdug bsngal bzhi sogs sdug bsngal bas/ /de phyir byang chub bsgrub par bya/ /le 'o
269a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng bar ba spangs te/ /shes rab gsum la blo sbyangs la/ /rtag tu dur khrod gnas su 'dug/ dran pa bzhi dang ldan pa yis/ /tho rangs 'das te khrus byas la/ /dang dang mos gus sngon btang ste/ /byang chub sems dang rab ldan
269a2(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /'gro ba bu bzhin gdung par bya/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro ma nyams bya/ /bden pa'i chos la the tshom spang/ /'dod pa spel phyir chu sbyin gtang/ /mchod gshags la sogs kha don bya/ /gru yi tshul du lus kyang btsal/ /bag yod spyod lam blo gros
269a3(rgyud 'grel): zab/ /lha dang mi 'bral bsam pa bzang/ /dang po khyud pas dkon mchog mchod/ /kha zas kun la rnal 'byor bya/ /lhag ma 'byung po rnams la bsngo/ /bshad gci rnams kyang sbyin par gtang/ /smon lam rgya chen gdab pa'o/ /chos su 'gro ba'i tshig kyang brjod//
269a4(rgyud 'grel): tsha tsha gdab cing srog kyang gdon/ /bsod nams tshogs ni ci nus bsags/ /ye shes tshogs kyang de bzhin te/ /sdom pa gsum dang ldan par bya/ /pha rol phyin pa drug spyad de/ /dbang bzhi rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bya/ /bskor ba bya zhing lus kyang bcag/
269a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba bzhi ni ro bsnyams te/ /mtshan mo nang gi spyod pa bya/ /srod la gtor tshogs chen po gtang/ /nam phyed tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /phyi bcud nang bcud rang sor bzhag/ nam smad dge pa'i gnyid kyang yog?/ spyod lam rnam bzhi'i chos la
269a6(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ /ma yengs chu bo'i? rgyun ltar spyad/ /sgyu lus 'od gsal bsre ba yang/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi'i gdams pa'i don/ /sems nyid las su rung bas ni/ /rang dbang rgyal po sems la thob/ /de phyir rnal 'byor brtson par spyod/ /byang chub spyod pa'i sgron ma
269a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la sh+ris mdzad pa rdzogs sto// //paN+Di ta kha che dz+nyA na gu rgya dang/ ong po lots+tsha bas bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ pA da yag pra d+hi po nA ma/ bod skad du/
269b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor lam gyi sgron ma 'di/ /stan pas legs pa'i lam mi 'jug/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad pa/ /dam pa skyes mchog de la 'dud/ /A li kA
269b2(rgyud 'grel): la'i sgra don rtogs/ sde snod gsum gyi don yang shes/ /bdag dang skye 'gro'i sems can rnams/ /ye nas skye med 'od gsal yang/ /ma rig pa yi rlung gis 'khrul/ /'khor pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong/ /de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal
269b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor lam pas 'di ltar bya/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rab spangs te/ /dge ba'i chos la brtson par bya/ /dka' la som nyi mi za zhing/ /rtag tu skyabs 'gro ma nyams bya/ /byams pa'i sems dang rab ldan zhing/ /'gro la snying rje ci nus bya/ /'dod ?
269b4(rgyud 'grel): yon dngos po mi rtag pas/ /gzung 'dzin chags sems rnam par spangs/ /gzhan la smad par mi bya zhing/ /'gro ba'i bla ma spyi bor bkur/ /log pa'i lam du mi 'jug cing/ /mthu dang ngan sngags spel mi bya/ /longs spyod 'du 'dzi rnam spangs te//
269b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu nags su 'dug la sgom/ /'jig rten 'chal tshig ma brjod par/ /sngags dang snying po mdo yang brjod/ /yang na lkugs pa'i tshul du bsdad/ /dang byung dri ma med pa'i brda/ /lus la gru yi blo bzhin la/ /bcud len gyis ni zungs kyang
269b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ /gtum mo yis nor? bsnyams te/ /'byung ba bsnyams?  zhing nad rnams dbyung/ /gnod sbyin par chad byed pa la/ /brtul zhugs gdams pa'i spyod pa bya/ /mi ngal gsum dang 'du ba gsum/ /'khor lo gsum dang rtsa ba gsum/ /'bar ba
269b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang ? mi tha?/ /thim pa gsum dang rgyas gdab po/ /mdor na thams cad sems yin te/ /sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med/ /sems su 'dzin pa la drul pa'i blo/ /blo las grol na gnyis su med/ /gnyug pa'i dang las ma g.yengs
270a1(rgyud 'grel): par/ /dngos por snang par sgyu mar blta/ /sgyu ma brdzun pa rmi lam tshul/ /rmi lam tshul sogs rab shes nas /dpe brgyad bzhin du shes par bya/ /rnal ma'i chos la rab gnas na/ /gang ltar spyad kyang bde ba thob/ /nges
270a2(rgyud 'grel): na rnal 'byor brtson par bya/ /rnal 'byor lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la sh+rIs mdzad ba rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta gu hya pra dI paM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gsang ba'i thugs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ /'jam dpal smra pa'i seng+ge
270a3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam pa lnga bcu rtsa lnga yis/ /zhabs kyi pad+mar rab btud nas/ /sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /khyad par lnga yis gdams pa bstan/ kye ma rnam shes rlung gis 'khrug/ rlung ni las su rung ba dang/ /gtum mo rlung gis sbyar bar
270a4(rgyud 'grel): byas 'du ba'i nad kyang rlung gis bcos/ /'byung ba ro ni mnyam pa dang/ /btul zhugs spyod pas par chod sel/ /'tsho ba'i bcud ni len pa dang/ /e bam bde ba'i rlung gis bskyed/ /rten 'brel shes pa 'char ba dang/ /rdo rje rkang mgyogs
270a5(rgyud 'grel): grub par 'gyur/ /d+hU tir tshud de phyag rgya che/ /'dab ldan pad+ma ge sar dbus/ /rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni/ /chags dang 'bri ba bcu gnyis brgya/ /la lar sa d+hu tir bsdu/ /rlung dang byang chub sems kyang
270a6(rgyud 'grel): de/ /'khor lo bzhi la srog shing tshul/ /mi 'dra sbyar pas haM las 'dzag/ bcu drug phyed phyed thig le ni/ /bskyil dang bzlog dang dgram zhing bstim/ /dga' bzhi khyad par phyag rgya che/ /skye ba dang ni 'gag pa'o/ /shes pa kho na 'ba' 
270a7(rgyud 'grel): zhig yin/ /sems ni kun gyi sa bon te/ /rang sems rtags na sangs rgyas la/ /bde ba gzhan du mi btsal lo/ /sems nyid las su rung bdag rnam par mi rtog yang dag don/ /gnyis med gnyis su med pa las/ /gnyis su byar med spros
270b1(rgyud 'grel): bral mkha' / /srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol/ /don gyis dbu ma phyag rgya che/ /snying po'i don las ma yengs bar/ /gnyug ma'i yid ni gcig tu gtad/ /rnal ma'i don la rab gnas nas/ /yid la mi byed bde ba che/ /lhan cig skyes pa
270b2(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i ro/ /mtshon du yod pa ma yin te/ /ston ka'i zla ltar dri med 'od/ /bde gsal stong pa'i ye shes can/ /rang la spas pa mig ltar dbye/ /bde ba che las gzhan med pas/ /phyag rgya'i mchog de phyag rgya che/ /sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba
270b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /lus sems 'phan du gzhugs dang/ /'bras bu blo yis ma grub pa/ /shes rgyud nam mkhar 'phang pa dang/ /dmigs pa sna tshogs bsgyur shes so/ /chos dang chos min sel ba dang/ /rig pa dangs snyigs dbye ba dang/ /rnam shes rlung yang
270b4(rgyud 'grel): bstims pa'o/ /sgyu lus 'od gsal bsre bar bya/ /bag chags sbubs su grol ba dang/ /phyag rgya chen po dus 'dir thob/ /des na rnal 'byor brtson par bya/ /sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang
270b5(rgyud 'grel): phyug chen po ka ma la sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nya na gu hya dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba lo btsun chung gis bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ maN+Dal la bi d+hI nA ma/ bod skad du/ maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhis bya
270b6(rgyud 'grel): ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma mnyes par byed pa yi/ /maN+Dal cho ga bshad par bya/ /maN+Dal la ni rnam lnga ste/ /ngo bo nges tshig dbul thabs dang/ /dbye ba dang ni phan yon no/ /jo bo dbul bar 'os pa
270b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /sngags dbang rdzas su bcas pa'o/ /maN ni skyed pa'i sa bon te/ bsod nams 'phel bas Dal zhes bya/ /dbul thabs dang gus mos pa yis/ /gong ma mnyes par byed pa'o/ /man Dal dbye bas rnam gnyis te/ /dngos dang yid kyis
271a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa'o/ /yid ni las su rung ba ste/ /dran pa tsam gyis gsol pa'o/ /dngos pa rnam pa bzhir gsungs te/ /dbul ba dang ni sgrub pa dang/ /mchod pa dang ni mdzes pa'o/ /sa yang rung ste gzhi la ni/ /gang yang ched?
271a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa la /oM badzra yaSha ka hUM/ /zhes pa de yis byug par bya/ /rnam pa nyi shu dgram bya ste/ /haM las 'og gi ri rab bsam/ /rang gi ngos kyi shar byas pa'i/ /ya las shar gyis lus 'phags bsams/ /ra las byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /la
271a3(rgyud 'grel): las lhe? yi 'dzam bu'i gling/ /sha las nub kyis ba lang spyod/ /yaM las byang shar mtshams su bsam/ /gling g.yog nyi shu byed na yang/ /g.yas g.yon sngags kyang de bzhin no/ /ri las nub byang gling phran bsam/ /shaM las lho nub mtshams
271a4(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /laM las lho shar gling phran bsam/ /tsa las btsun mo rin po che/ /tsha las blon ? po che /dza las dmag dpon rin po che/ /wa las glang po rin po che/ /tsam las rta mchog rin po che/ /tsham las 'khor lo rin po che/ /dzam las nor bu
271a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che/ /wa las gter chen rin po che/ /mi las nyi ma shar du bsam/ /a las zla ba nub tu'o/ /oM las steng gi ri rab bo/ /gling bzhi gling phran bcas pa dang/ /rin chen bdun dang gter dang brgyad/ /ri rab nyi zlar bcas pa rnams/ /bla ma dang
271a6(rgyud 'grel): ni dkon mchog gsum/ /yi dam mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i 'os/ /dad pa'i stobs kyis 'bul lags kyis/ /bla ma dkon mchog bzhes su gsol/ /maN+Dal phul ba'i yon tan ni/ /maN+Dal gcig phul drug dang ldan/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bsam mi
271a7(rgyud 'grel): khyab/ /des na de la brtson par bya/ /gcig phul yon tan drug dang ldan/ /gling bzhi phul pa'i yon tan gyis/ /bdud bzhi ma lus zhi bar 'gyur/ /gling phran phul ba'i yon tan gyis/ /tshad med bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rin chen sna
271b1(rgyud 'grel): bdun phul ba yis/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun thob par 'gyur/ /gter chen phul pa'i yon tan gyis/ /mi zad longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /nyi zla phul ba'i yon tan gyis/ /lta bsgoms sems la gsal bar 'gyur/ /ri rab phul ba'i yon tan gyis/ /
271b2(rgyud 'grel): rang 'byung ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal dbul ba'i cho ga rje btsun ka ma la sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du /mahA mu dra tad twa nA k+Sha ro ba de sha/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po yi ge med pa'i man ngag
271b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /grub thob dam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las/ /skyes bu khyad par rig 'dzin lnga yi gzhung/ /mchog gyur rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul la reg/ de phyir dpe bral phyag rgya chen po bshad/ /rnam gcod dang ni yongs gtsong?
271b4(rgyud 'grel): rang/ /phung po gsum pa sel ba dang/ /don dam 'jal ba'i tshad ma yis/ /yang dag yid la blta bar bya/ /yang dag don la yi ge med/ /gang gis yi ge med shes pa/ /de yis yi ge thams cad shes/ /yi ge a nas k+Sha la rdzogs/ /sde tshan brgyad
271b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgra sbyor ni/ /A yi kA lir shes par bya/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gagS pa/ /zung 'jug mdza' bzhi bral ba yi/ /bde ba chen po rgyun chags su/ /bla ma'i brda yis mtshon par bya/ /kha don mar me me long rgya/ /me shel sa bon skyar dang sgra/ /brgyad pa 'di
271b6(rgyud 'grel): ru don bsdus pa/ /go ba cig shes skye bar 'gyur/ /in+d+ru? b+hU ti bdag med ma/ /lhan cig skyes sbyor 'dod yon grol/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /bden don rtog pa 'phags ba lta/ /srog dang rtsol ba nA ga pa/ /phyi nang rlung gsum tshangs par 'dren/ /kha sbyor
271b7(rgyud 'grel): thig le pad+mar byung/ /bde bas rgyas pa'i za me tog/ sku gsum mnyam gzhag mda' bsnun na/ /dran med skye med blo las 'das/ /mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob dang/ /rmi lam dang ni bar do la/ /zin dang brtan dang po gsal? byin pa/ /byas gdab pa dang
272a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhi/ /dang po dus bzhi mnyam sbyar la/ /gnad gsum zer bzhi gdab par bya/ /lus kyi gnang dang dmigs pa'i gnang/ /rlung gi gnang ni shes par bya/ /rig pa bcur la gdab pa dang/ /shes pa srang
272a2(rgyud 'grel): du gzhug pa dang/ /sems ni rus dmigs 'dren pa dang/ /rten dang dbral zhing bsgom pa gces/ /e paM brgyan pa'i bde pa la/ /bde bas byang chub lam du kyer/ /snang srid brda ru spong ba dang/ /gang mthong phyag rgya chen por shar/ /thams cad
272a3(rgyud 'grel): ro mnyam de bzhin nyid/ /gcig zos pa yis gzhan kun grol/ /ji ltar chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor ma yengs rgyun du bsgom/ /gzung ba dang ni sbyang pa dang/ /sgyu ma dang ni kho na nyid/ /nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las/ /rmi lam
272a4(rgyud 'grel): man ngag shes par bya/ /da lta 'chi kha bar do la/ /rten dang 'od dang thig le sems/ /grong 'pho'i man ngag shes pa yis/ bde ba can du da 'gro'o/ /don mthong ba yis sgro 'dogs chod/ /nyams su glangs na byin brlabs 'byung/ /drod rtags nus pa
272a5(rgyud 'grel): tshod zin pas/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o/ /rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad/ /mtshon dang 'tshe ba 'byung ba 'khrugs/ /dal yams 'brum po chu ser la/ /ting 'dzin me btsa' skyugs kyis zhi/ /bdud dang mu stegs tsho 'phrul gtong/ /gdon
272a6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'byung po bzhugs pa 'dren/ /gnod sbyin 'khru ldog byed pa'i tshe/ /mi g.yo rgya mtsho lta bu bzhag/ me dang chu dang dug sprul dang/ /bse dang chom rkun rgyal po'i chang/ /stag dang dred mo can zan khro/ /de tshod yis 'dod pa yin/ /rgod dang rtsed
272a7(rgyud 'grel): mo byed pa dang/ /dal dang drag dang shin tu drag zang zing longS spyod mang po la/ /sbyor ba 'di yis khyab na bde/ /ro snyoms gtum mo mkha' spyod dang/ /sman dang bcud len bdud rtsi brten /ro langs mkha' gro dngos grub ster/ /blang
272b1(rgyud 'grel): ngor med pa'i sems kyis 'bad/ /mdza' rgyas gnyis kyis shan phye la/ /khar phog car phog thogs babs su/ /thun dang bcud kyis rtsal sbyangs te/ /snang gsum sbyor pa skad pa'i phyir/ /dbang po gsum gyis dam mi 'da' / /ma 'khru?
272b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis so thub ste/ /srog 'dzin gsum gyis brtan pa 'thob/ /grol lugs gsum gyis tshad bstan no/ /la zla gsum gyis zad sar bskyal/ /'gro bsdug bsngal 'khor bas bying pa la/ /ma rig mig 'byed 'di bkod pas/ /phyi nang
272b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba kho na nyid rtogs te/ /kun gyis phyag rgya chen po thob par shog /de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po yi ge med pa'i man ngag rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ka ma la sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //
272b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gu hya dang/ zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba bla ma lo btsun chung gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nya pA ra mi tA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ shes rab
272b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yum gyi sgrub pa bshad par bya/ /shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i/ /gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa//
272b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /sku mdog dkar zhing yid 'ong ma/ /skra bcings pa la cung zhig 'phyang/ /chu skyes dkar la legs gnas pa/ /phyag g.yas su ni pad+ma ste/ /kha dog dmar ba'i rnam par bsgoms/ /shes rab pha rol phyin
272b7(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yon/ /rdo rje skyil krung legs par bcas/ /rgyan kun gyis ni legs par brgyan/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom/ /a yig yi ge la zhugs shing/ /mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'o/ /dam tshig sems dpa' rnam pa skyed
273a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /zla ba drug gi sbyor ba yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma bdun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bstan bcos kun la mkhas par 'gyur/ /zla ba shar ba'i rim gyis ni//
273a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba phyed ni bsgom par bya/ /bzlas pa 'bum byas sbyor ba yis/ /nyin re bzhin du tshigs bcad brgya/ /'bad pa med par sbyor ba 'byung/ /gzhung yang brgya tsam 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de la sngags ni 'di yin te/ /oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA brdya?  ni/
273a3(rgyud 'grel): dzwa la dzwa la me d+ha bard+ha ni/ /d+hi ri d+hi ri bud+d+hi bard+ha ni swA hA/ bya rog gi skad mi grag par sngags 'di lan bdun du mngon par sngags par byas nas/ ma rlengs? pa'i bskyur po'i khu ba 'thungs na zla ba drug du gang 'thung bar byed pa de shes rab chen
273a4(rgyud 'grel): po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun ka ma la sh+ris mdzad pa rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya d+hA ri sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/
273a5(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrubs thabs/ smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes dri med sgrol ma gsal ba'i thugs/ /smra bsam brjod med shes rab phar phyin gsungs/ /stong nyid snying rje'i phag mo'i sku/ /sgrol ma'i sku
273a6(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs la 'dud/ /sgrol ma gsum dang tshul mthun rnal 'byor pas/ /rtag tu lha mo 'di bsgom bya phyir bshad/ /dang po rten gyi gang zag gis/ /gdong la sogs pa khrus byas naS/ /yid du 'od ba'i gnas de ru/ /maN+Dal byi dor legs
273a7(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /snying gar zla dkyil yi ge dAM?/ /lcags kyu 'dra ba'i 'od 'phros pas/ /bla ma lha mo spyan drangs la/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags/ /rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol/ /
273b1(rgyud 'grel): dge ba cung zad ci bsags pa/ /byang chub thob phyir bdag gis bsngo/ /de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom/ /sngags 'di bzlas pas stong par bsgom/ /oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konya haM/ paM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad steng/ /hAM las rje
273b2(rgyud 'grel): btsun sgrol ma ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ldang/ /g.yas na mchog sbyin phyag rgya can/ /g.yon na utpal sngon po 'dzin/ /rin chen rgyan rnams mdzes pa'i tshul/ /smra pa'i seng ges dbu brgyan pa/ /zhabs gnyis skyil krung phyed par
273b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /dar gyi stod g.yogs smad g.yogs byas/ /de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas la/ /thugs ka'i tAM las 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ /dang pa'i stobs kyis phyag byas te/ /de nas mchod pa sngags 'dis
273b4(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ /oM badzra puShpe pU? dza hUM/ /oM badzra d+hU pe pU dza hUM/ oM badzra dI pe pA dza hUM/ /oM badzra gand+he pU dza hUM/ oM badzra nai pe dya pU dza hUM /oM badzra arg+haM pra tIts+tsha pU dza hUM/ oM badzra gI rta pU dza hUM / ji srid mi skyo'i bar du bsgom/ /skyo na bzlas
273b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di ltar bya/ /oM tu re tut+tA re tu re swA hA / sngags phreng snying gnas phyung ste/ /ye shes thugs la mnyams pas mchod/ /byin brlabs tshur 'dus zhal nas thon/ /bdag la thim zhing 'od 'phros pas/ /bar chod sel dang sgrib sbyangs bsams
273b6(rgyud 'grel): nges skyo gtor ma gtang bya ste/ /mi rtog oM las rin chen snod/ /A:las bdud rtsi sna tshogs bsam/ /hUM gis thim zhing sna tshogs gsol/ /sngags 'dir snying po btags te dbul/ /ba laM?  ti pU dza arg+haM pU dza bi laM i daM grih+na kha kha khA hi khA hi
273b7(rgyud 'grel): arg+haM pra tIts+tsha pU dza khA hi swahA/ /dad pa'i stobs kyis bstod par bya/ /oM stong nyid snying rje phag mo che/ /sgrol ma'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /smra bsam brjod med pha rol phyin/ /sgrol ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de med ye
274a1(rgyud 'grel): shes gsal ba'i thugs/ /sgrol ma'i thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zla 'od srid pa'i mun sel ba/ /'joms byed nyi ma'i dkyil dang mtshungs/ /thabs dang shes rab yon tan ldan/ /sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud/ /'gro la bu bzhin rtag
274a2(rgyud 'grel): tu gdung/ /srid gsum rnam thar gsuM la 'god/ /seng ldeng nags la rab gnas shing/ /'jigs pa brgyad las shin tu skyob/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams su/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i skur ston cing/ /skye shi
274a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i chos kyang ston/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing khams su/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro'i skur ston cing/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad rnams sel/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bde ba can gyi zhing khams na/ /pad+ma'i
274a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro skur ston cing/ /bde ba chen po'i dang la gnas/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na/ /las kyis mkha' 'gro'i skur ston cing/ /phrin las bzhi yi don yang sgrub/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdza' dbus med pa'i
