274a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing khams na/ /pha rol phyin ma'i skur ston cing/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshogs dang bcas/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal stong/ /de nas nyal ba'i dus na ni/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngang la nyal/ /las dang spyod lam ci spyod pa/ /lha mo'i nga rgyal du ni sgom//
274a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di btsams pa yi dge ba gang/ /rje btsun sgrol ma'i thugs rje dang/ /dam pa rnams kyi byin brlabs kyis/ /rje btsun sgrol ma grub par shog/ rje btsun ka ma la sh+rIs? mdzad pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs sho// //rgya gar skad du/
274a7(rgyud 'grel): badzra bA rA hi swa d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/? 'khor lo'i gtso la rab btud nas/ /de yi zab mo sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dra ba sdom pa'i tshul bzhin bshad/ /de la
274b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ? mo sgrub par 'dod pas dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug la/ kha nub tu bltas te dang por sems bskyed pa sngon du song bas dang pas gzhi bzung bsod nams kyis tshogs bsag go/ de nas byin gyis snang ba 'byung ba la bla ma
274b2(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor bsgoms la/ yig ge gsum gyis chang byin gyis brlab cing/ oM baM haM yo? h+raM moM?/ /h+riM h+riM hUM hUM phaT phaT ces pas lag pa byin gyis brlabs la go bgo ste bgegs thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sngags 'di brjod do/ /oM h+riM g+ha g+ha b+hAt? ye g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TaM?
274b3(rgyud 'grel): ? swA hA/ de nas mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub 'byung bas lus dag yid gsum gyis thabs la mkhas par bya ste/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+hArmmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM zhes brjod pas lus rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang chos 'byung gi dkyil du bsam/ /
274b4(rgyud 'grel): ? badzra shud+d+ha d+ha:sarba d+harma:badzra shud+d+honyahaM zhes brjod pas dag rnam par dag pa sngags kyi 'khor lo la/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye /oM badzra war+Na nA ye/ oM badzra pai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT ces bzlas so/ /oM yo ga shud+d+ho sarba d+harma yo ga shud+d+hanya haM zhes
274b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas yod? rnam par dag pa lha'i sku zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gri gug dang thod pa dang kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa/ /sku mdog dmar ba la dur khrod kyi chas kyis brgyan ba zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ /g.yon dus mtshan ma mnan pa/ gang dgu'i nyams kyis bzhuD
274b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i gsang gnas su chu'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas phyag rgya bzhis ye shes kyi lha mo dgug gzhug la sogs pa bya/ de yang rang nyid lta bu gcig spyan drangs la phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul/ /sdig pa bshags//
274b7(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /gsol pa gdab/ /dge ba bsngo/ /byin gyis brlabs/ /dbang bskur / bdag la mkha' 'gro ma bzhis bstod/ sngags 'dis gtor ma btang ste/ oM badzra yo gi ni ka ma ru pa yo
275a1(rgyud 'grel): gi ni/ /dzha? la mu khi ni kha kha khA hi hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brjod cing rkang pa brgyad kyis bstod/ /de nas thabs bla na med pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pas yong med gnyis su med pa'i gdams ngag bla ma'i
275a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal las shes par bya'o/ /mar gyur thugs kyis dpal be'u las/ /zab mo bcud kyis thigs pa byung/ /skal ldan rin chen lta bu yi/ /rdo rje phag ma 'grub par shog /rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs rje btsun ka ma
275a3(rgyud 'grel): la sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs sto// // */ /'jam dpal khro bo bsgrubs thabs bzhugs so/ / */ /rgya gar skad du/
275a4(rgyud 'grel): many+dzu sh+ri kro d+ha sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal khro bos ra? sgrub pa/ smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan khro bo gshin rje gshed /khro rgyal gtsol rab btud nas / de yi zab
275a5(rgyud 'grel): mo sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul du bri/ /de la 'jam dpal gshin rje sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba
275a6(rgyud 'grel): las dug ste rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de'i dbus su hUM mthing nag rab tu 'bar ba bsgom/ /de las 'od 'phros pas bar chad thams cad bsrung zhing bde bar gshegs pa
275a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis thugs dam bskul te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun du spyan drangs la/ yan lag bdun pa bya zhing tshad med pa bzhi bsgom ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs
275b1(rgyud 'grel): bsag go /de nas oM sarba d+harma a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM zhes pas chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur bsgom/ /de'i ngang las rang gi rig pa hUM mthing nag rab tu 'bar bar bsgom/ /de gyur pa las rdo rje khro
275b2(rgyud 'grel): bo hUM gis mtshan pa bsam/ /de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mthing nag zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa/ khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa/ /mche ba gtsigs shing
275b3(rgyud 'grel): skra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag g.yas kyis ral gri rdo rje'i yu ba can bzung ba / g.yon sdigs mdzub utpa las mtshan pa/ /gcer bu dur khrod kyis rgyan gyis brgyan pa/
275b4(rgyud 'grel): yum rdo rje phag mo dang rol zhing ye shes kyi me 'bar ba ?  /ma he gdan du bting nas las kyi gshin skye? 'dul bar bsgom/ de'i thugs gnas hUM las 'od 'phros pas de
275b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la phyag dang mchod pa 'bul to/ oM badzra buShwe? hUM/ d+hU be hUM/ dI? pho hUM/ gand+he hUM/ ni re te
275b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM nai be dya hUM/ shapda hUM zhes mchod pa 'grul gtor ma gtang ngo/ /gtor snod mi dmigs pa las bdud rtsir bsam/ hUM zhes brjod pas bdud rtsir bsam/ /'dod pa'i don
275b7(rgyud 'grel): la gsol ba gdab par bya ste / dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:sa dgug gzhug la sogs pa bya zhing/ /yi ge gsum gyis sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab/ dbang bskur/ mi skyo bar du bsgom/ de nas bzlas pa'i
276a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di yin/ oM brI/ Sh+Ti(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA / zhes nal? bdi dkyil nas thogs babs pa ltar shin tu drag par bzlas so/ /de nas sgyu ma lta bu'i
276a2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin 'od gsal ba / zung du 'jug pa / rdo rje'i bzlas pa sems de la gtad pa'o/ /nag po thugs kyi dpal be nas/ /zab mo bdud rtsi'i bcud gtigs pas/ /skal
276a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan rin chen lta bu yis/ /'jam dpal gshin rje grub par shog / 'jam dpal khro lor sgrub pa rje btsun ka ma la sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs sho /
